comments: Good stay, a few issues with the direction instructions as they were different from where the actual property was.

The home is in a very quiet neighborhood in Flushing. The rooms I stayed in were newly renovated. I enjoyed my stay. Access to Manhattan is via one bus and the 7 train. I recommend this host and home.

Ernest welcomed us generously into his beautiful home with plenty of information about the apartment and the area. We enjoyed a wonderful stay in the comfort of all the available surroundings. We can recommend Ernest as a host and the apartment as a great Manhattan get away.

I stayed in Eli's house for a month. Instantly when I met him, he was very welcoming. Booking was easy, communication was clear and instant, and description of the place was very accurate. The house is clean, which is what initially attracted me to book the place. Location is great - in the Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn. It's safe and easy to get to and from the Subway (L) line which is literally right around the corner of the street.  Commuting was easy, only 15 minutes away from the place I needed to get to in Manhattan (14th Union Square/New York University area). Laundry is 24 hours and right across the street, grocery store next door, and plenty of options to eat around the neighborhood. I would definitely book with Eli again if it becomes an option in the future. He is kind, easy to talk to, answers any questions or concerns I had about anything (house, neighborhood, New York City, etc...). I was fortunate to have a positive experience with Air B&B as this was my first time using this service and it was great because Eli is a great host and the house was clean.

Allison's apartment was perfect! The location was great (close to cute shops and restaurants as well as the train). She responded quickly to any questions. I would have stayed longer if it had been available.
My stay at Kelli's place was perfect! She was very welcoming and easy to talk to. The house amenities fit the description described and the location is a good short walk to the subway. Thanks Kelli !

Alliot was very welcoming and accommodating, the room was extremely cozy and the bed comfortable. The place is in a convenient location in Brooklyn, next to a sweet little park. A great way to stay in New York!

The appartement was nice and well situated, very close to the subway/restaurants/etc. Good quality for the price. I did not meet Carolyn but she was helpful whenever we had questions. I would recommend this apartment for couples or singles visiting.

Have just returned from a wonderful few days in New York with my daughter, staying at Kaye's lovely apartment. Kaye was extremely welcoming and encouraged us to use the shared living area, which was elegant and comfortable. She did all she could to make our stay enjoyable. The location is ideal with so many incredible areas within a walkable distance. Whilst on a main road as such, the apartment was very quiet. I would highly recommend Kaye and her apartment.

Michael is a welcoming and extremely organized host! When I arrived someone was waiting for me with the key, and Michael explained stuff in the flat as well as all conveniences around to me. Yes, the laundromat on Vanderbilt really is the better one :) The location is great: Close to the 7th Ave and grand Army Plaza Subway, close to the park for all the runners and close to restaurants, cafes and all sorts of conveniences on Flatbush or Washington ave. I had some really nice weeks here and would definitely come back anytime!

Feliks and his girlfriend were very friendly. I was working in NYC for the weekend and the place i where i was planning on staying fell through. I looked online and found their place - they were very welcoming and made special arrangements to let me drop off my bags early before heading out to the city. 
I dare say, the things i wish were different: i wish it had been cleaner. 
and you have to be ready for the 4 story walk up. But she definitely was helpful with carrying the bags - thank you :)
el apartamento es muy comfortable, lindo y bien ubicado, y David , un muy buen  host!!
Very nice--clean, spacious, and private. Would definitely stay here in the future.
The host canceled this reservation 82 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

In order to receive (airbnb rent), you have to give (provide heating, a clean room, a working shower, a real door, locks on toilet- and bathroom doors, and of course be ready to cancel the stay  when the wrecking crew starts with heavy noise machinery on the other side of the thin wall). I'm sure this is an exception and Oscar will be the perfect hos in the future.

My mother and I stayed here for 8 days. We didn't actually meet Derrick but his friend was very accommodating, met us when we arrived, even carried with my bags! 
Derrick's studio was incredibly comfortable and clean. Located in a peaceful neighbourhood close to subway. His apartment is also beautiful as shown in the pictures. I was able to use everything, the kitchen, internet, TV and we had a key and came and went as we pleased.
If all my stays were this easy, I would never stay in hotels again!
I had a wonderful time there and thanks again.

The appartement was perfect, very clean (fresh towels, new soap, nespresso caps, etc.) and very well located. Felt like at home. Roberto is a great guest wich had an answer for each question. Enjoy your future stay at Turquoise: best place in NYC!

I had a wonderful stay in NYC thanks to Kevin. I actually had tried booking a room on this site with no luck until Kevin saved the day & was able to accommodate my boyfriend, his parents, & I on such short notice. He was very professional, courteous, and helpful with our needs. Our room was everything we expected and will definitely be returning as a guest of Kevin's in the future. Thanks again Kevin, you're thee best!!
Amazing apartment in a great location. 2 min walk from the L. Super easy check in and check out. Designer furniture. Extremely fast wifi. Would love to stay here again on my next trip to New York.

The stay at Catherine's was wonderful. I was provided the keys immediately on arrival by a friend of Catherine's. The apartment is spacious, clean, quiet and well located for me. I would definitely rent from Catherine again.

This is a terrific period apartment with lots of beautiful original features, I loved my 3 month stay here. It's a huge place, with lots of room to swing the proverbial cat. A great place to call home whilst in The Big Apple.
Erica and I never actually met face to face due to our busy work schedules, but she was always quick to respond to any query I had with efficiency and humour.
The building is full of friendly neighbours who all say hello, an asset in such a big city. There is also a concierge and a laundry room. It's is only 5 mins walk from 145th Station and it's express trains, making my work commute incredibly easy. 
I had a great stay.

We stayed for 34 days at the house and we had a great time. Carlos was having English classes I was exploring the city. Nichelle is an excellent host. She's very nice, friendly, helped us with directions, taxi and everything we needed. We felt like we were at home when we were there.
The neighborhood is very safe; people were friendly and treated us like we belonged to the neighborhood. It was amazing.
There are a lot of corner stores in the neighborhood and the subway station is not that far from the apartment. 
We absolutely recommend and if we come back to NY we'll be glad to stay with her again.
Great host and location. Very friendly and helpful. Recommended.
Very pleasant stay. Natalie's place is very nice and artistic. .she was very helpful during my stay.

Loved living in Felicia's room. The location of her apartment was wonderful- in the heart of Williamsburg and close to multiple subway lines which was easy to get to. Her roommates were easy to get along with and very friendly. Her room was clean and ready for me when I got there. Would happily stay again. Also very easy to communicate with!

We had a brilliant week at Esther's flat. She wasn't there to greet us when we arrived but we were let in and shown around by a neighbour.  Ester was very responsive and helpful all through the process of booking and accessing the flat.  The flat is small but perfectly suitable for a couple or two close friends and it is ideally located in the East Village a short walk from Soho, Little Italy, West Village.
Amazing place, location, and host. The apartment is great and so close to the train!
EXCELLENT HOST!!!!

Leah's place is in a fantastic location, near the L subway, the B43 bus up to Greenpoint, and surrounded by cafes, delis, burrito stores, you name it. The room is huge, with three windows filling the room with natural light, which I love. However, I will say that if you are a clean freak, this is not the place for you. Other than that, the apartment is cool and well decorated, and the cat is pretty friendly. Leah keeps herself to herself, and seems like an interesting woman given the art and old movie posters around the place.

Loved stay at this beautiful apartment in Brooklyn. The space is even bigger than the photos suggest, and is in the most amazing location - super close to the Barclays center, all of the major subways, and really wonderful restaurants and bars! Sai was communicative, kind and gave some amazing recommendations about places she loved in the area! Would reccomend this apartment to any guest!
Martis was so easy to communicate with and his apartment is clean and beautiful. It's also in the most convenient location for pretty much everything. I highly recommend staying!
This is the perfect location to explore the Lower East Side and a stellar apartment. Would definitely book again if possible.
really humorous guy,like you.

Very attentive, very responsive. Jean cares about her guests' experience. 

Very centrally located - a great launch pad for your time in new york.

Top floor, so no neighbors.

Recommended!

Words can't even begin to express what an AMAZING experience my daughter & I had while staying at Kimberly's space!

She welcomed us bright & early in the morning with a genuine smile, open arms, & plush fresh linens awaiting us :)

Her space was a dream!!! ... Super clean & very serene! 
A waterfall provided a calm & tranquil environment, & Kimberly's easygoing personality & authentic spirit was a "breath of fresh air" 

She was absolutely wonderful to stay with & I would recommend her space to anyone looking for a little serenity in brooklyn!
This was my first time doing this, and I am happy to report that it was a great experience. I would do it again, without question.

You will definitely enjoy staying in Williamsburg in Stephane's apartment! The building is very modern and clean, pleasant neighbourhood. It's 3 minutes walk to Subway and 10 minutes ride to centre of Manhattan. Doormen are for you 24/7. The apartment itself is very light, fully equipped and comfortable for 2-4 people staying. Special Thank You for Stephane's hospitality and openness.

My stay at Anna's place was wonderful! Everything was exactly as described. The living space and bed were comfortable, the place was clean, and the views were great! Lots of charm and character.

Location was a very nice, quiet neighborhood. I drove, so I was worried about finding a parking spot, but most days, I was able to find a spot on the same block. Shops and groceries were also within walking distance, as was the subway station, for access to Manhattan. Basic cable TV and free wifi worked great.

I had a housemate, in the form of Anna's cat. She was cute, and did not bother me except to let me know when it was time to feed her, which was an easy task. I was warned that the cat was not friendly to strangers, but we managed to coexist just fine!

I did not get to meet Anna, but she arranged for someone to meet me with the key and show me around.  Check out was also simple, and I was able to simply leave the key on the table, lock the door, and be on my way without delay.

I would definitely stay here again, and would highly recommend this listing to others.
Great neighbourhood, steps from the subway. Awesome apartment.

Very nice third-story room with full bathroom on the floor below. Justine is a very accommodating host who provided access to the full apartment (except their rooms). So it was easy to get work done at the dining table while sipping a glass of wine! She was there with her husband during my stay but we hardly crossed paths just due to different schedules. Great pets!
Had a great time in New York. The place was quiet, clean and the host was very nice.

Annie was a fantastic host and very easy to work with. She responds to messages quickly and has a nice system set up for retrieving/dropping off the keys. Her place is in an AMAZING location - less than one block to all the restaurants on Smith St., and close to the subway. Highly recommended.
Clean and very cozy room. Close to the subway. Quite safe, just be careful if you come back very late at night. Heather is nice and very helpful. It is a very good experience staying here.

Great big room that was very unique and inspired a creative headspace. Keyboard was available to use which was epic!
It's definitely not a place for someone looking for a classy hotel room, but for someone wanting to live with other people doing their thing in NY in a real home full of heaps of character and warmth. Loved it!

Loved my stay in Harlem! The apartment is beautiful, clean and comfortable. Troy was an incredible host and followed up to check on my arrival status as I was coming in late. Troy and his roommates are incredibly kind and made my friend and I feel welcomed! The location is perfect to catch the 1 subway too. I'd recommend this location- if I return to NYC, I'd definitely look to stay here again!
very nice place.clean and comfortable.I recommend this house.

We stayed in Alice's private room and it was amazing! It's a cozy townhome located a few blocks away from the subway station decorated with books and photos. The bedroom was up a short flight of stairs, and had a desk (in case you needed to get work done) as well as a bunch of lamps for good lighting. Cats roam everywhere including upstairs-which is great if you love nice kitties, but if you don't like them or are allergic to cats, this place may not be suitable for you. However, we stayed for 5 days and 4 nights and the cats were not a problem. Amenity-wise, we had everything we needed like towels and soaps, blankets and pillows, and heaters in the bedroom, and Alice even made coffee for us in the morning if we woke up late. When we checked in on a Friday night, we arrived around 1am after getting off a late flight from Newark airport. Alice stayed awake to let us in and gave us a quick tour of the house. The next morning, she knew we didn't have any breakfast foods prepared so she went out into the snow and bought us apples and pastries to eat with our morning coffee (that she also provided for us.) It was a great gesture because we were famished at that point and were meeting up with people in Manhattan which would have delayed our breakfast another 30 minutes if we were to eat there. There's no question why Alice is a super host. She's simply a delight to stay with.

Karin went out of her way to make us feel welcome at her apartment. She provided us with all of the info we needed regarding the unit and the neighborhood.

This very comfortable unit is in a nice quite area of Park Slope.  We have "hoteled"  Brooklyn for several years in a row and this stay was easily our most relaxing.

My wife and I highly recommend staying at Karin's apartment.

Enid was a great host. She made my Brooklyn experience amazing. She was very helpful with everything and the place is incredible: big, sunny and clean (3 things not always available in NY). Clinton Hill is a lovely neighborhood, perfect to escape from the noise and fast-life of the city. I would definitely recommend anyone to stay with her.

Melissa was an excellent host and was able to meet up as I arrived and  give me any information I was going to need about the apartment and the rest of the neighborhood. The apartment was really great! Really added a nice level of comfort to my trip.
It was a nice vacation in Ramon house thanks
Marina was a lovely host- flexible and accommodating.  The apartment was clean and well stocked with basic amenities.  We would return.

Viva was a consummate host!  My flight was delayed despite it being very late, she greeted us outside her building. Upon settling in, she graciously offered us a glass of wine. She made sure we were settled and felt comfortable. She really paid attention to the details, from the stack of fresh towels, to making sure we had coffee in the morning, to the croissants she had for us. Viva's apartment was sparkling clean, lots of beautiful artwork to take in and a cool 60's vibe with a sunken living room. The bedroom itself is huge with an a/c unit and lots of natural light and closet space. Viva was consistently considerate and communicative with her coming and goings and spent very little time in the apartment during our visit and always attentive to our needs. We really felt as though we were given a lot of space. The express A train makes the trip downtown/uptown bearable. I would definitely return and recommend Viva's apartment. Not to mention you are steps away from the magical cloisters and a beautiful park!
Johan was an exceptional host who made my stay at his apartment comfortable and inspiring.

Sandra's cozy unit was absolutely perfect for our New York City experience. It's in the trendiest part of town, central to all of the cutest shops, cafes,subway stations and bars! Not only was the location fabulous, but the apartment itself was well equipped, a comfortable double bed, central heating for the chilly winter months, Internet, ipod speakers, functionally stocked kitchen and hot water. Sandra was fantastic to deal with and although she was away on holidays at the time, was particularly responsive and gave us a local contact in regards to check-in/out, who was also very friendly! My friend and I would both absolutely recommend this Apartment for those looking to soak in the true NYC lifestyle, and we would hurry back in an instant as soon as the opportunity arose. I'd conclude by saying that the location, convenience and organisation of the whole apartment rental contributed to our unforgettable NYC holiday experience! Thanks Sandra :)

Chanelle es una persona muy amable. Responde correos inmediatamente. Apartamento localizado en una muy buena zona de Brooklyn. Hay paradero de metro a dos cuadras. Hay paradero de bus al frente. El ascensor facilita el subir las maletas. El apartamento es muy iluminado y ventilado. Ordenado por todas partes, muy limpio, moderno y acogedor. Recomendable totalmente

My stay at Sabrina's location was excellent. The check-in went smoothly, her instructions were clear and simple, and the apartment was exactly as advertised. Moreover, she was especially accommodating and allowed us (my wife and I) to use her apartment as if it was our own. This was my best Airbnb experience so far and I'd certainly contract with Sabrina again.
Amy had the best stocked kitchen and the place was so homely.

Can't say enough great things about Sasha and this room in Alphabet City. Extremely clean, well located room with perks like an excellent rooftop and near semi private bathroom. Roommates Ben and Chris were equally helpful and fun to stay with for the month I was here.
Excellent location and great apartment. It was clean and spacious. Niki was very responsive all the time and flexible with our requests.

The Reggae Den is in a Great community ,,,I love eating and enjoying a nice glass of wine at the end of the day and the community was well equipped with nice restaurants as well as small quaint spots to grab and go.I was able to walk from the train  or  take a short bus ride because it's a lil cold due to the fact it winter.I was worries about the noise of being in the city but the block is quiet and the apartment in nestled away in a nice Brownstown...lot of blankets and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was just relaxing ....seamless Uber and door dash deliver so if you want to stay in and just chill you have that option...its just a nice comfortable environment "No Worries"

Staying at Brittneys was lovely! When we arrived there was a cute picnic hamper with some wine and other bits along with some nyc guidebooks. Her place was very clean and conveniently close to the subway. She made us feel very welcome :)
Todo genial en el apartamento, un barrio muy tranquilo y seguro.

I went to Brooklyn because my college age daughter needed foot surgery.  What could have been a pretty miserable experience, trying to care for an 18 year old in the snow, turned into a vacation due to Michelle and Margaret's beautiful home and great energy.  Michelle even allowed us to extend our stay a few extra days.  As for the home, it was quite large on two levels, with many distinct spaces for a variety of uses.  Amazing kitchen, luxurious bathrooms and super clean. The home is even better than in the pictures. We will have to return in better weather to enjoy the large backyard.  The neighborhood was very safe, easy for walking to local cafes and shops and close to the subway.  Great experience and pretty hard to take a kid back to the dorms after that!

This was an idyllic place to come back to at the end of each day. The apartment is located two blocks from the L and there are so many lovely places in the neighbourhood. It's on a tree lined street, at the back of a brownstone and the area is so relaxed and quiet, all day and night, which is surprising given the hustle and bustle of Williamsburg these days.
Morgan and Brandon were great hosts. They have a really clean, well presented home and were very welcoming. The bathroom is wonderful, the bed is super comfortable and what the pictures don't show are the two beautiful gardens that the bedroom window looks out on to. 
I would stay here again for sure.

Excellent host, excellent apartment. I stayed here for 35 days without a single problem. The place was always clean and quiet. It is 3 minutes from the subway. Wendee is an excellent host and was always offering me home-cooked food, and she has excellent advice on what to do for fun in the local area. My stay here surpassed all expectations, and if I ever need a place to stay in NYC again I will most definitely try to stay here once more.

The location is super best to go everywhere in NYC, even to airport, very close to penn station, 3min. by walk. The host was also informative and easy to contact so I felt no inconvenience in staying. Besides, kitchen is included in the room but bathroom isn't. which is okay cause I met nobody in the hall. I strongly recommend this room to someone with need to move easily and emphasis on own's privacy!!

Thought we didn't get the chance to meet in person, Sophia was welcoming, communicative and attentive during my stay.  She put me in touch with her local friend Odai to make sure I had everything I needed to feel at home in a strange place.  Can't ask for more from a host.

LeeAnn is a great Airbnb'er, it was very quick and easy to arrange a stay at her home. Her place really is an amazing apartment just off McCaren park with lots of bars and restaurants around the corner. It's also very easy and quick to get to the island. Thanks

I stayed at Alexander's place in Astoria over 5 nights for business/leisure. The location is quiet and very safe, the people are friendly, and the neighbourhood is scenic, vibrant and full of culture.

If you're in New York, travelling by public transit is one of the best ways to get around. Alexander's place is within walking distance to the subway and also has some great places to eat if you're on-the-go in the morning, want to sit down and enjoy some authentic Mediterranean cuisine, or need to grab a late dinner.  The commute into Manhattan from his home is also seamless.

His home is a short drive to LaGuardia Airport by taxi (which you can wave down/hail along any of the main streets in the area). If you're flying in from JFK, making the stay in Astoria is worth it if you plan on travelling into Manhattan.

Alexander was frequently checking in to make sure my stay was going well and was quick to respond to my questions with really handy tips and suggestions. Alexander's roommate, Amanda, was also very accommodating and amicable :) Thanks so much for having me and for making my first time in New York awesome!

This is a great spot! 2 blocks from 135th street subway on the 2 line, area's safe and diverse there's a supermarket and pharmacy 1 block away! We were two women and never felt unsafe.. just one subway to midtown (times sq, penn stn) 

Apt is great, awesome doormen, nice people, laundry, clean cozy spot.. it was much nicer than the listing pics so I took some of my own :) 

Rob, is great he stays in contact any questions etc. he answered right away.

We would definately stay there again!
Chris

Thomas was a great host with a fantastic place to stay. He made me feel at home from the moment I arrived.  His apartment is everything you could ask for and so close to the subway for a wuick trip to Manhattan. Would definitely recommend and also would stay again.
Best location

Pontos positivos: Esta localizado em um bairro incrivel, perto de todos os melhores restaurantes e bares. Tem tudo perto!
Pontos negativos: fica no ultimo andar, o ar condicionado nao gela muito bem e a limpeza nao estava em dia.
The host canceled this reservation 242 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I really loved staying at Maria's. The room and apartment were so lovely, the location was great and Maria made me feel so at home. 

Thank you

Nice place.  The apartment was clean and quiet.  The bed and comforter was comfortable, clean, and warm.  The boards definitively made the room interesting.  Not much around the immediate area of the apartment, but it is a 10-minute slow walk away from the J and M. 

Nolan was responsive and friendly.  We texted about various specifics before I arrived and he was always fast in responding.  He met me when I arrived and gave me the keys and showed me the apartment.  He then just left me alone, which is what I wanted.  Very chill place.

Sarah's apartment was very comfortable. I would definitely stay there again. Also, Sarah was very helpful during our stay and promptly responded to any concerns. Apartment is very well described in summary and close to subway. Thanks again, Sarah!

Maria's apartment is cozy, cute and sunny! It had everything we needed and especially the neighborhood is AWESOME! We could jog along the Hudson river in the morning, and had a very nice brunch restaurant right near the apartment. Also Washington square park is just a few minute away. It was great time staying in Maria's apartment. And Maria was so flexible and communicative and everything was so easy and simple. Thanks Maria!!!

This is an espectacular place to stay. You have everything that you need to enjoy NYC. You will have an incredible attention and a lots of places to walk and enjoy. 

Don't think about a reservation. Just do it and enjoy NYC.
Quick response. Close to public transportation. Enjoyed my stay!
Lovely room, comfy bed, and an easy stay.

We had a great time staying at Holly&Bjarke's house. The apartments bright,clean and silence. Also the location was excellent. The house is just one minute from the subway station and the most famous restaurants and bars of Williamsburg are very close. Bjarke&Holly provided us some information about apartment which we found very useful. We would not hesitate to stay here again if we returned to NY. It was a good experience.

Tina is a great host. She was very helpful and was ready to answer all our questions promptly. We spent ten days at this house at Christmas and we had a wonderful time. The house is in a safe location and has parking space. It is located close to restaurants and supermarkets and at walking distance to the subway! We were seven adults and it was great to have two full bathrooms but the shower on the basement had only warm water. The basement was a little bit cold and the bed was very hard. The heating system is noisy but Tina mentioned it to us and there are lots of toys everywhere. We enjoyed very pleasant times at the dinning table and we were able to prepare our Christmas dinner in Tina's kitchen. The house is under renovation so be prepared to see some walls without painting and the railing going upstairs would need to be fixed for safety. For the seven of us and for the time that we were there Tina's house was a very good option for us as a big family but I still prefer to stay in a hotel when travelling without the group.

I had the best time at Jeff and Sabines!
Their place is perfect, exactly how it is described, if not better!
Its in a really cool part of town - with probably the best rooftop in Brooklyn - seriously. The apartment is super clean and tastefully decorated. The shower is amazing and the kitchen is perfect if one likes to cook!
I will definitely be re-visiting.
Thanks J and S x

I really enjoyed my stay in this apartment. Unbelievable location next to lots of cool bars and restaurants. Easy commute to manhattan with the N, W or 7 line. The apartment is clean, nicely decorated, spacious and super well equipped. Very calm as well.

Mareike was the kindest host and her (Hidden by Airbnb) were incredibly nice as well. She trusted me to use her bike (even though I never did) and even left a card & gifts for my arrival! She is one of the sweetest people I have ever met and I am so glad to have stayed at this apartment with her as a host.

This Chelsea apartment is magical! The listing title "Japanese Experience in Artist Loft" really captures it. My wife and I stayed there for 7 weeks in summer 2013. It's comfortable, spacious, has a private terrace with stunning city views, and is located close to everything. The owner was most gracious (and a phenomenally gifted artist). If we have the opportunity, we'd definitely stay they again.

Ryan was the best host I've ever had through Airbnb. He made me feel at home in his home, and I pretty much didn't want to leave! He has one of the most beautiful apartments I've seen in NYC, and his dog taught me how to love again. 5/5, would recommend.

I had a great time staying here! Leanne and her roommates are lovely people and the neighborhood is a lot of fun with tons of food and nightlife all within a few block radius. The train station is two blocks away making it extremely convenient to get anywhere.

Leanne was very communicative and always there to help when I need it. Would definitely recommend staying here. Thanks again, Leanne!

Rachel was going out of town, but she coordinated a key exchange very well.  The apartment itself was easily accessible to the 2/3/4/5 (yes!), and it was lovely, air, and filled with light.  I very much enjoyed my stay there.
Thomas is a very kind and respectful person, my girlfriend and I stayed at Thomas's house for a week and he was always very friendly and attentive. Thanks Thomas!

My stay at Jen's was everything I hoped for, and more. She was welcoming, communicative and kind. Her place, a few feet away from a subway station, will zip you anywhere in the city. The room was clean, cozy and quiet, everything you wish to come home to after wearing down your feet. I would stay here again in a pulse, for sure.

Marcelle was a great host. She was always available and helpful.
The apartment was comfortable, clean, and the neighborhood was located in a nice area near many walking distance stores.

Anthony's place is beautifully decorated (great art, wooden floors, generally tasteful--ideal situation for NYC stay) and conveniently located in Fort Greene/Clinton Hill.   Was fantastic value for the proximity to train stations (incl. Atlantic Terminal for LIRR) and Anthony was communicative throughout our stay to ensure easy key pickup/drop off.  We'd stay again--great Brooklyn find!

The apartment is simply great. Very well located and with a lot of space. it is cosy, trendy and charming. We just felt like home. Peter and Jesse are wonderful guests. They left us some beers in the fridge and made us comfortable enough to feel great. They gave us a lot of advices for visiting and experimenting the real New Yorker and Brooklyner life. Always available, even on holiday, we could contact them for any questions. 
I would definitely recommend Peter and Jesse's stay. 
Horia

We stayed in Mitty's beautiful brownstone for 10 days and it was a great experience.
Mitty is a wonderfully organized host and a really nice person. 
The home and conditions were exactly as described and you can't beat the location. 
I would definitely stay with Mitty again.

We had a lovely stay at Cass & Juliette's apartment. It's very beautiful, clean and comfortable. They were lovely hosts, provided us with good local information, helped us with subway timings, and were flexible about both arrival & check-out times. 
We have a 22mo son and not having to travel with a crib (they kindly put the side back on their son's) was a relief. Their son was also very generous with his toys, so ours was very happy!
The apartment is quiet and couldn't be better for subway access, very close to Manhattan, also to restaurants, bars, shops etc.. If we were to move to Brooklyn, this would be the area we'd live in, convenient for everything.
Thanks Cass, Juliette & family, we had a lovely stay in your beautiful apartment!

The location was perfect. Close to the F train, about 5 min away by foot. There was no elevator so it was a little bit hard to walk up the stairs with heavy suitcases. The house was large enough for 2 people to stay. Thank you for letting us stay at your lovely house :)

Fantastic hosts, provided plenty of information about their home and the neighborhood. Very quick to respond to any questions. The home was exactly as described and pictures. Truly a beautiful space for relaxation. We enjoyed our stay tremendously.

Our stay at Bretts was great. Brett was a great host and accommodated us esrly at short notice. The Room is as per the description, subway is less than a 5 min walk and everything you need is in the local neighbourhood. Sunnyside and Astoria also have some great local bars and food and are worth exploring on their own. Overall was a great experience.

Liz and Rob are the most honest people you can find!! The apartment is 5 stars in (Website hidden by Airbnb) 3 block away from the L train (graham st) and if you are staying in Brooklyn you have to be close to the L..the apartment was spotless and you have everything you need. Great AC, great kitchen, great bed, great rooftop, elevator, great TV and you fly with the WiFi!! We just wish we can rent this apartment next time we go to NY!!!

Michael was a great host, very flexible with key pick up/drop off, recommended some awesome places to eat and drink. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay I'd definitely recommend. Bonus: it doesn't get better than this for location in NYC.

The room was quite spacious even for Manhattan. And whole building is nice and clean. Safe area, right in the middle of midtown. She is very helpful and nice girl. Enjoyed my stay I will def get back next time being in the city

Even though I've never met Miles during my stay, he did help me a lot. When I accidentally locked the room while leaving the key inside, Miles kindly came to help me open the door. And the transportation was very convenient! However,  there were two flaws. One was the bathroom and kitchen were always in a mess cuz other housemates didn't clean their part. The other was one of the housemates was not that friendly. But fortunately, that person was about to move out.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We spent five great days in Zachary's and Laura's apartment. Really great hosts, the house was great, and they answer very quickly to our messages. I definilty recommend them!
Abigail has always been super helpful and easy to reach. Thank you for your hints and assistance.
We were very comfortable at Chantilles & Lindas place. Easy and uncomplicated just the way we like it! Thank you for your hospitality, Linda.

Bright apartment, lots of room for clothes and thick towels in the bathroom. Jp was easy to contact and very helpful in getting the keys to us. 
Me and my boyfriend spent a great week in NYC and the apartment fit well to our trip.

The apartment is awesome. The bedroom large and clean. Cinthya was really attentive about my arriving. The position is very good, just a couple of stops from Williamsburg and 20 minutes to Manhattan. I recommend Cinthya's apartment to everyone is visiting the city.

Perfect place to stay in lower east side, for people who love a genuine NYC.
Recommended

Marina and Eva are great hosts. I stayed in this apartment for two weeks and they always made sure that I felt welcome. The apartment is really big and the area is very peaceful. I highly recommend this listing.

Our stay at Thu's apartment was perfect. A friend of her was waiting for us to give me the keys. Thu's apartment looks exactly as in the picture and was very comfortable, quiet and clean. Moreover it is situated in an excellent part of the city near all subways. We were out all day, and the apartment was very comfortable place to come and rest at night. On this specific weekend Thu's roommate was not in the city so we were practically alone in the apartment. Her roommate just came the last night, we talked to her briefly and she was very nice. We hope that since we had to take a very early morning flight we didn't bother her too much as we arranged our suitcases at night. On the other hand, although we did not meet Thu she was available to answer questions through chat all the time. I would definitely recommend this apartment for a stay in New York City. Thank you Thu! We had a great time!

Andrew was great and quick to response.
The place is indeed a charming duplex, plenty of space with great outdoor balconies.
Highly recommended!
Thanks Andrew.

We stayed in this apartment for more than one month and we have enjoyed it alot.. Mary and Joe are amazing friendly hosts who made our stay as good as they can. The apartment in reality is better than the photos and has huge space. The only problem is only one bathroom and the tvs are kinda of old . The area is ok but close to a not so nice area but not as bad as we expected. I highley recommend this apt specially if you are big group
Friendly hosts, nice and clean. Everything I could reasonably want in an AirBnB was provided. Private bedroom and bathroom were a huge plus. Without question, would stay there again.

I had a very good experience at this flat.It was clean, tidy and well located in a very good neighborhood, with everything I needed nearby. Close to subway, Centra lPark, Guggenheim and Metropolitan Museums. I definitely recommend this Studio. 
I met Taesun and Patrick at the my last day of stay and they were very kind and helpful. Enjoy NY!!!

Although we didn't get to meet Karlee, we definitely enjoyed our stay! While the apartment is not directly in the center of all the hustle and bustle of Williamsburg, it's a short walk away. The patio was great for sunny days and rooftop was definitely another perk. The apartment itself was very clean with all amenities available.l making the stay very cozy for us. The apartment is very close to the subway but the subway noise didn't bother us at all during the stay and made it convenient when going to Manhattan. Would stay again.

Excellent experience! Room and apartment were exactly as advertised. DJ's communications were very fast, friendly and clear. He helped me move in, and showed me around even though he was obviously busy. The apartment was beautiful and had an amazing view. It was easy for me to get around as transportation was within walking distance and easily available. The apartment was super clean and always kept very neat. The building lobby was prettier than most 4 star hotels. I felt very welcome and at home in NYC. Thank you!

I enjoyed my stay in Elouise's comfortable apartment. She was an incredibly thoughtful host. An assortment of fresh fruit in a quiet, immaculate apartment greeted my arrival. There is a tidy laundry with new equipment in the basement (much more clean and convenient than going to a commercial laundry), and a grocery store is just a block away. I'm not a TV watcher, but cable TV is available.  I appreciated the WiFi to do my work, and I liked taking walks in the neighborhood, which is safe and friendly.  The subway to Manhattan is just a couple blocks away.
This was an amazing place great location. Gary was very gracious host. I enjoyed this place so much that we might stay here again. The pictures do not do justice to this apartment.

Both Kali and the apartment were perfect. The apartment is located in such an ideal place, surrounded by restaurants, bodegas, and organic grocery stores, and some really neat bars. Probably most convenient was that the L is right on the block, so getting to Manhattan was a breeze! Also, the apartment is very roomy and comfortable, and prettily decorated. Kali was the most responsive, flexible, helpful, and kind host -- I couldn't ask for a better experience. I absolutely recommend staying here if you have the option!
Rebecca was an awesome host. She is very laid-back and always there to help if you had a question about the area. The apartment was very cool and home-y. Very close to the JMZ trains and food.

Yvonne made my stay possible very last minute which I'm still VERY grateful for! Cosy bed, fully equiped kitchen, more than enough fluffy towels! Room was a bit chilly at night but extra blanket available! Connection to Manhatten is very easy, it's a bit of a pain using puplic transport to LGA!

Andy and Zulu are such great guys. I had the best time staying with them, they are really interesting and genuinely nice people. I definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a laid back and interesting time. I will miss them a lot!
Thanks for everything my family enjoy our stay. We really enjoy the Saturday Market at the Prospect park Plaza. Gracias.

Colleen is great and she responses right away. The apartment was awesome and clean. Just what we were looking for. The location was on point, close to everything we needed and only a few blocks from Times Square. Would definitely stay here again!

Jordan & Karen were wonderful hosts. They have a great space in a sought after location. They were very responsive to all our questions along the way, provided additional helpful information about the building/neighborhood, and they even offered to set things up for us in advance for our arrival.
Jennifer was very accommodating with my request. Thank u

Very cool layout in a cool neighborhood. Not to crazy, but still a lot of stuff around. The room is clean and and the apartment has everything you'll need. Taylor is also extremely accomadatinf and very good with communication.
Great times!

She was there when I arrived and showed me around and answered my questions and responded to my requests
She was available and at the same time I had my own private space
She oriented me to the neighborhood by walking me to the grocery store

Beautiful private room on the first floor of a 4 room house. Great location with the L train stop about 150mtrs ( 2 min walk) away. Getting into Downtown Manhattan is max 15min. No disturbance from any other house residents who are out all day. Full kitchen, laundry and wifi for use, if u want to. Nico is an artist, which is evident from the room & house with little artifacts all over. He communicates accurately and is very friendly. I would definitely try to stay here, if the room is available.

The room and the apartment are lovely. The room is quite spacious and the bed is really comfy. The apartment was clean and tidy. I enjoyed meeting Jessica if only briefly, and Sara who has the other room is really nice and welcoming. I would just suggest you bring some ear plugs if you are a light sleeper as the apartment is right in the heart of East Village so can get a bit noisy outside. Otherwise I really enjoyed my stay and it was great to be so close to many awesome restaurants and bars. I'd definitely recommend this place to my friends.

Very, very beautiful apartment, nice location, and very friendly host! Although we've never met due to our schedules, Vanessa was quick to respond via e-mail, left me all kinds of contact information, and arranged a  nice neighbor of hers to accommodate us. I and my husband were very  pleased to stay at her place. Instructions were simple and clear; she offered all the facilities we wanted (wifi, laundry, etc.); and the bed was comfortable. BEAUTIFUL Place & great location!

Great apartment but DIRTY, no towels, no bed sheets (I had to buy some) and the blanket was showing loads of dirt marks. No cleaning between my stay and the previous guest (who had an old sick dog in the room)...

We really enjoyed staying at Karmesha's beautiful apartment. It was actually much nicer and bigger as we thought it's gonna be (from seeing the photos). The neighborhood was nice as well, we felt very comfortable. Karmesha was friendly and helpful.

My friend and I had a great time living in Lauren's apartment this summer. Renting long-term was super easy, and communication with Lauren was great. She was very welcoming and responded to all of our questions promptly.
The apartment is tiny, but its location in the Greenpoint neighborhood made it totally worth it. Greenpoint is wonderful, a great mix of families, old folks, cute bars and restaurants, and Polish bakeries. Ultra convenient to catch the G and 7 trains.
My only real concern with the apartment was the lack to air conditioning. There is a window unit in one room, but it did not do much to battle the sweltering New York summer heat. In order to cool down at night, we kept the windows open, but due to the proximity of the Pulaski Bridge, the traffic was very noisy. Besides that the apartment was fully outfitted to meet all of our needs. Lauren has a fantastic book collection. Also, it was wonderful to have access to the roof, which boasted an incredible view of Manhattan.
We are certainly going to miss this place.

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay at Ryan's apartment! We loved that it was so close to public transportation, great restaurants, stores, and other sites in Harlem. The apartment matched the photos and description that Ryan provided and was very clean and well taken care of. We also really appreciated the warm hospitality and informative NYC sites and subway information that Ryan and Sydney provided us. However, the apartment is indeed up 3 flights of stairs without an elevator, but my boyfriend and I didn't mind the walk up to burn off all the good food we ate on our trip. I would definitely recommend this place to others and would stay here again!

Marc was very helpful in giving us ideas on where to eat in the neighborhood and what parks were nearby.  We love this area and the apartment was very convenient.  The apartment was clean and worked out perfect for our family.  Marc was kind enough to let us use his son's toys for our toddler.  Would definitely stay here again if we are visiting the area.

WOWOWOW! What a great location inside and out. The hosts had plenty of information to share on the area, and the place had all the stuff you would need or want on the 9th floor (with elevator!) Best shower in all of NYC!! A bed comfier than any hotel i have stayed at and the place was clean to boot. Great WI-FI and TV! I would stay here for sure again, it was just simply wonderful. Walking distance to anything you could want and a pizza slice place and convenience store close to the entrance...CMON! 10/10! A+

Lindsay was a great host.  She communicated well and was very friendly.  Her apartment was exactly as pictured and described and  clean.  The apartment is in a great location on the Upper East Side, accessible to a lot of transportation and restaurants and stores.  If I need a place to stay again, I will definitely re-book this apartment!

One word. Amazing. Do not hesistate to stay here. Great host. Absolutely gorgeous apartment at a great price and only a 15 min. ride away from the main tourist areas, Faven provided me with extra towels if needed, the bed was comfortable. Book here!!! :)
Markus was an excellent host, friendly and helpful.  very cute apartment, great style.  best thing was his hand painted wall treatment behind the bed, loved that!

Nora was a wonderful host and her communication with us prior to our trip and during our stay went above and beyond what we expected! Her home was very clean and peaceful, and a short train ride will take you to a number of sights. Definitely Recommend!!!!

This was my first sublet experience and it was beyond amazing. The room was gorgeous and left with towels and fresh sheets. I had a patio right outside with a hammock I could lay in. The area is great. So close to the L train and great restaurants and bars.
Martha was a phenomenal host! She's super nice and the area itself is awesome, too!
Nice Room that we enjoyed! the location is convenient to B, C, 1, 2, 3 subway. The host is so nice person!

Our stay was amazing, the location unbeatable, everything excellent, 100% recommended, obviously I would go back! Mary is very kind and attentive, always on the lookout and answer fast! Thanks Mary, you are welcome to Mexico whenever you want!

Very cute, warm and cosy apartment in a nice building based in a safe area. Great location with a subway station, stores and restaurants all within a minutes walk. The apartment is only 3 blocks from central park and a short train ride from downtown and tourist locations. Everything went very smoothly from check-in to check-out. Sarah the host was away at the time of our stay but organised for someone to meet us at the apartment. Sarah was a great host who kept in contact with us, prompt communication and very helpful. I highly recommend this lovely NY studio apartment. All in all was great and I don't think we could have picked a better place.

Thanks again Sarah, for all your help.

I felt very welcome, pictures are true!
Great location!
Enjoyed the welcome fruit and champagne.

We had a great stay at Ben's in NYC. The photos on air bnb don't do the apartment justice. It's very large and has the best, most comfortable bed i have ever slept on (also huge). Everyone in the building were super friendly and communication between Mary-Lou, Ben and the landlord Jamal was fast and really helpful. Great location in Brooklyn with easy access to transport and many delicious and affordable restaurants.

Sara has a lovely and comfortable home. It was an easy transition to feel "at home". We enjoyed exploring this family friendly neighborhood which has wonderful parks, cafes, restaurants and shops all within walking distance.
Yes - we would welcome a return stay at Sara's in the future!

By far the best airbnb I ever stayed at. The house is really clean, the bed is wonderfully comfortable, and Joel is the best host you can dream of: when I arrived, he had prepared a basket of food, he had a soft towel ready and some organic soap, and he and his partner made everything to make me feel at home. I recommend 100% and I am really grateful for this stay.

Very nice located appartment, easy key reception at the front desk! No appointment exc... Appartment is small but perfect for short stay as it has everything you need.  Host is very nice! Bed is comfortable and. If enough! There is a terrace on to roof with tiny pool open only at the afternoon, very nice as NY was extremely hot during our stay!

Adrienne was a wonderful host, while she was still on a trip when I was arriving, she was there to check to make sure things went smoothly and very quickly attended to any questions I had (including restaurant recommendations!)  Cannot feel more thankful about that!!
Meeting Adrienne, she is a very easy-going and fun person and it was great chatting wither her in the little time that we were both in. 

Besides a great location close to the park and also metro, the apartment itself was wonderful too, sunny spacious and clean. Adrienne has already set things aside (and good stuff too :p)  for my stay too.  Could not have expected a better experience and will definitely stay with her again!
Great place, great host!

This was our second stay with Lexy. Every bit as pleasant as the first! The privacy of having the whole apartment to ourselves was great. The neighborhood was quiet and safe. Very close to the train, grocery, and restaurants.

Robin's apartment is nestled in the middle of a lovely neighborhood, great restaurants, coffee shops, close to enough bus stops and stations to get you pretty anywhere you need to go. The nearby Riverside Church (I'm not kidding, it's at the end of the block), sets the tone for the area, but the true treasure is the Grant Memorial, which is separated from the apartment building by a park that I believe will be /gorgeous/, once there's actually green things growing in it. That was the coup de grace for me, but you will probably find the ease of travel and accommdations enough. =] As to the apartment itself, very clean, obviously well kept and cared for. My sister and I felt very comfortable, very quickly. I was so relieved to see there was a tea kettle I could use and, goodness, I could've gotten lost in the veritable library Robyn's collected! The lack of a TV forced my sister and I to, GASP, socialize!! Which I kind of appreciated, not going to lie. All in all, if (and probably, when) my sister and I return to your fair city, Robyn's will /definitely/ be where I look to first, as far as lodging arrangements.

I had a great stay at Rose's. Thought i did not meet her, but she left me directions to reach apartment and pobtain keys, the neighborhood, things to do.. etc. The apartment was as expected and in photographs - great.. Thanks Rose.
Anna was a very kind and attentive host. The location was great and the apartment was a nice place to stay. I would definitely recommend this airbnb.
Had a great stay here ! Perfect location and lovely room. Although Isabel wasn't there during my stay she always checked to see I had everything I needed. Would definitely recommend this place.
My stay at Etienne and Tye was perfect. The place is well located (3 min. to subway) and quiet. I highly recommend to stay at Etiennes and Tye's place for a New York trip.

Great location, very quite neborough and well connected with public transportation. Check in was very easy, Nick is an excellent host and he did very good looking after us considering it was the first time he rented his place.

Rebecca saved us from being stuck in some very miserable weather while we were in NYC. She was super fast, accurate and helpful with all communication. We had a great stay and the apartment was a really cool place to relax. The location was good with some really nice Caribbean restaurants within walking distance and she has super friendly housemates. We gave very short notice and appreciated all Rebecca's help, we didn't actually stay in the advertised room so can't really review the room.

Adrian is awesome, apartment is awesome
, location is awesome . Had so much fun and have now made a friend in NY. Thanks so much pal !

NIce appartment in a very good location.
Big and sunny appartment and full equiped.
Staci and philipp were nice host and with a very good communication.

Izzy was extremly helpful and very nice! We had talked prior before arriving, and gave me lots of advice, since it was my first time. She met up with us when we arrived, gave us a detailed tour, gave us some tips, and left us with the keys. The apartment was very tidy, in a quiet neighborhood. Couldn't ask for a better location, it was perfect! We were 2 blocks from Times Square, and a 5 minute walk to the subway. There were so many amazing restaurants walking distance from the apartment, and Broadway shows! I'm so glad we stayed here, Thank you so much Izzy!! I'd definitely come back and stay there again!
Brita is a very friendly host. I really enjoyed staying at her place during my visit. The apartment is located close to the subway, so traveling to Manhattan was very convenient.
Jordan was great, very accommodating. The place was very central and it was huge.

Kevin's place was amazing, we really had a good time. The roommates were very kind and helpful. Williamsburg is a great neighborhood with nice restaurants, coffees, yoga studio and parks. It was one of the best experiences we ever had.

This place was perfect!  A very warm and welcoming place!  The kitchen/bedroom/everything is extremely spacious and decorated beautifully.  Right on the subway line and very close to both Central and Riverside park.

Rick was a great host and made sure we had everything we needed.  We would gladly stay here again. :)

Very much enjoyed the our stay here. Needed somewhere close enough to the United Nations but far from all the chaotic traffic. Very nice place, comfy bed w/pull out sofa. Very clean when we got there too and so many places to eat just mins walk from the place. William was very nice and met us right on time. I would def stay here again if needed.

We had a great a experience at Mick's place. The place is as described and very clean. Only 4 minutes walk from the G and L train. He was always very helpful and friendly! I definitely recommend this place!

Donna made us feel right at home.  The condo is at least 5 times better than any photo.  Neighborhood was very good and upscale.  In fact, Senator Joe Lieberman lives in the building.

All the condo staff made us feel completely welcome and at home.  24 hour doorman was a great perk.

Magda & Ian were warm and hospitable hosts. Both were incredibly helpful when we reached out for advice and happy to provide insightful information about Manhattan and the local surrounds.

The apartment was lovely, conveniently close to the subway and secure. We very much enjoyed our stay.

Thanks so much Magda & Ian!

Cory made it very easy to pick up and drop off her keys even though she was out of town.  She was always able to be contacted when we had any questions.  The apartment itself was in a great location with unlimited food options all over.  The apartment was very clean and cute.  The bedding was also fresh and the beds were comfortable.  All in all it was a very pleasant stay.

Frank was amazing! He accommodated my late arrival and even had complimentary wine chilled for me and my guest. The space was clean, modern and comfy. My guest and I would totally stay again.  He is close to everything. I highly recommend this rental. It was perfect for our stay in NYC.
Susan and Jim were great hosts. Very accommodating, very friendly, and their home was beautiful. Everything was very modern and clean, with interesting, lovely decor. We enjoyed our stay.

We were so happy to have stayed in Michele's apartment - it was quiet, clean and cozy. The location is perfect - walking distance to subways, so it's really convenient getting to and from Manhattan. The surrounding Williamsburg was great too - fun bars, great food, friendly people. Michele was great at communicating before and during our stay, very accommodating and caring.  I would definitely recommend this space!

Rosalyn was a great hostess!  She made us feel very at home and was willing to help in any way she could.    Great tips about apps and websites that would help us during our stay,  and we loved the company of her dog Cheeko.  Highly recommend Roz if you're looking for a place to stay!

The flat is very conveniently located in Williamsburg/Greenpoint and contained everything you'll need for a stylish stay in NYC. I stayed there while studying for an exam and the flat was more than I needed. Marianne was very helpful and quick to reply to any of my questions.

Andrew took the time to introduce us to his wonderful apartment.  He was very accommodating to all our needs.  The apartment is extremely nice, very clean and quiet.  The bed was very comfortable along with the couch.  Kitchen appliances, dishes, washer/dryer were brand new.  The bathroom rain shower was a real treat.  The whole apartment was all new.  Andrew couldn't have been more hospitable.  He even bought a very thoughtful  baby gift for our new arrived grandson.  We will definite stay here again if the need arises.
It was as if we were at home :)

Although Jimmy was away when I stayed, he really went above and beyond to make sure I had everything I needed through his roommates. I appreciated his personal touch, and he's a great communicator. The room was clean and as pictured. The location was awesome for commuting into the city (1 minute from subway). I had a great experience and would recommend his place.

We spent at Solange's apartment 9 days but even if we met the host , her friend Diana helped us with everything.
We contacted Solange by mail and she was always polite and helpful.
Great location far 10 minutes walking from the Subway to Manhattan, laundry,restaurants.,groceries and ATMS,everything nearby.Neighborhood is quite and safe.
The kitchen is wonderful and well equipped,all is nice and kept clean,very fast wi.fi, PC,music and TV.
Absolutely I suggest this location where we spent a wonderful  vacation.
The room and neighborhood were great! Daisy was friendly and available by phone when needed

Hosts: Bev and Dustin are great to stay with. They were extremely welcoming and great at orienting me to the neighborhood. They  even provided toiletries and a detailed list identifying places of interest in the neighborhood and logistics of the house. Both are not only hospitable but very easy to talk to. To put it simply, Bev and Dustin are awesome people.

Property: The room actually looks better than the photos on the site. I didn't spend too much time there but it was a great place to come back to after a long day. Bev and Dustin have a dog Halsey who is also a great addition to the house. This was also my first instant booking and was a great value. 

Neighborhood: The best part about the neighborhood is the access to public transit. You can virtually get anywhere using the subway stop close by. The neighborhood is predominantly residential with a mix of businesses. It's not a tourist area at all so don't expect all the stereotypical NYC fanfare (you can easily get on the train and find that a few stops away). It has some nice restaurants and coffee shops and when I arrived on my first day there was a street festival going on.

Very comfortable room in a decent location in Brooklyn. Johnny was really helpful in getting me settled in and suggesting places to explore in Brooklyn during my stay, plus really quick to respond to emails via airbnb.  Highly recommended and would love to stay again.

Angelique had a very clear set of instructions prior to my arrival (directions, where to find everything, WiFi password...). All pictures clearly respond to the flat and it's very cozy and conviniently located (right next to Columbia University). I had a great experience and clearly recommend it!

My stay at Michal's was very nice.
Nice apartment, clean room and bathroom, comfortable bed... and the most inexpensive you can find in the area.
Michal was very quick in answering to my request, which is important if you need a place urgently. She was very kind and helpful, made my chek-in and check-out smooth and easy and made sure I had all I needed.
Very positive experience!

Our family very much enjoyed staying in this beautiful Williamsburg apartment. The place offers plenty of space, stunning high-end designer decor and is conveniently located just one subway stop from Manhattan. 

Communicating with Thomas was great -- he is exceptionally responsive and accommodating. The apartment was well prepared for our stay, and we felt very welcome. We also got some very useful recommendations about the area, which was lovely.

Staying in this apartment has definitely enhanced our New York experience and gave us a wonderful taste of what it is like to live like New Yorkers.

Daniel was a great host, we had nice conversations and he is a super chill guy!
The location is great if you want to explore Bushwick but also Manhattan as the L train is close and only 20 min away from Union Square.

Will was a great host! He made is very easy to rent the space from start to finish. He even contacted me once he knew other parties were not going to be booking! The apartment was small (typical for NYC) clean and quiet. We had extra sheets and towels and blankets laid out for us when we arrived. We didn't meet with Will before hand, but it was never a problem. He was always very quick to respond. The neighborhood was safe and very easy to get to. Thank you for such a great stay!
great location + great apartment + great host = great stay

We spent a very pleasant stay at Emily's home. The apartment is cozy with a nice terrace, the bed is comfortable and spacious. The neighborhood is very quiet, located not far from the subway. We particularly recommend discovering Green-wood cemetery nearby, beautiful walk on the highest point of Brooklyn facing Manhattan.
Great location! We enjoyed our stay.

Most of the time i stay in NY in alphabet city. This time i decided to check other neighbourhoods. 
Ken is a really nice host and a nice person. He was willing to help us with everything that we needed. 
The neighbourhood is very nice. There is not that much street noise as in the other parts of Manhattan. 
The apartment looked as we expected and is roomy for NY standards. It accommodated 4 of us really well. 
The subway is a bit of a walk but not something to be concerned of. Central park is really close. 
I would stay there again.
We stayed at the property for 1 night. Skylar is very supportive. I got very fast respond on my enquiry. Thanks

Overall positive. The room and apartment was as expected, clean and comfortable.  I also was surprised to find out that you were out of the country during my stay. Based on your profile I was expecting you to be in the other room, not in another country.

Ines is a really great host, which I've come to appreciate, being an airbnb host myself. She's very accommodating, and welcomed my mom at her place on very short notice. The apartment itself is two blocks away from the metro, and the building is quiet and on a lovely block. Ines' roommate was nice, too, although my mom didn't see her very often. The place was as clean and comfortable as anyone could hope for, and the price is amazing for the value. I'd recommend Ines' room to anyone.

The place is so clean and it is located in a quiet and safe area. Neisha was one of the best hosts I have ever met. Even though there wasn't a chance to meet each other, she was so communicative, kind, and helpful for everything. Thank you so much, Neisha!

Roger and Hanneke were very informative prior to booking their apartment and gave us all the information we needed and even made sure if we had more questions, what was greatly appreciated. 
Before our arrival to the apartment Roger gave us a detailed document with recommendations and tips about the area and detailed instructions how to arrive to the apartment and how to operate the different amenities the apartment has to offer (that document really helped us during our stay). 
The check-in and check-out process went smoothly. The apartment was clean, organized, nicely decorated and well equipped. It is located in a central area, near a subway station from which you can get to any place in the city. Also, Roger was very accessible during our stay. 
We will definitely be glad to come back and stay at their apartment on our next visit to New York.

We had a great time staying at Alfonso's place. Due to bad weather, we arrived in NYC later than expected and Alfonso still tried his best to accommodate us and help us with the luggage. The apartment was really clean and it looked exactly as the pictures. For 3 adults with lots of luggage, this apartment was comfortable for us. It also has a really nice location, 1-2 blocks from the subway and you can find everything around the block. If I ever visit NYC again, I would definitely stay at Alfonso's place!

Wassim was a great host, we had some question which he sorted out really quick. The neighborhod was nice and wibrant and we felt safe, it was nice to experience east harlem. The train is really close by and will take you downtown fast.

Convenient location for our family, near our Chinatown wedding venue. Modern, spacious apt. Easy to contact the host and host's friend for picking up keys and asking questions. Guest room had full/queen size bed (not pull-out couch as listed) and air mattress was provided in the living room. Would stay here again if need be and recommend to others.

We held a small video shoot at Jessica's amazing BK home. It is absolutely gorgeous and an amazing location for shoots. The back driveway is perhaps the best asset, which made it incredibly easy to load-in and stage items outside while working in the kitchen. Start time was a bit confused, but it was resolved quickly. Jessica totally understands production and was very accommodating for our simple shoot.

Kevin was a great host! 
He accepted my request at the last minute, and really made me feel very comfortable and at home. 
He was extremely nice and helpful, his local tips about the nearby neighborhood were super useful. 
The apartment was lovely, clean and spacious, at a great location!!
I was lucky to have found Kevin as my host in the city :)
Many thanks Kevin, for the very positive experience.

I stayed with Elena for 10 days, she was extremely flexible with my check-in and checkout times. She helped me get settled in, and provided me with all the things I needed to make my stay even more amazing. Her apartment was always very clean, safe and close to a lot of great shops and supermarkets. I would definitely stay there again!

Zeeshan was the perfect host. He communicated via email in the weeks leading up to our stay and provided a lot of information about the local area for us. The place was exactly as advertised and was perfect for our family of four staying in New York for a month. The supermarket downstairs was very convenient, as was the subway only a short 50 meter walk. Zeeshan made key pick up convenient and flexible, and had emergency contact details for us if required. We had a perfect holiday - Thankyou!

Clean stay only minutes away from Prospect Park! The neighborbood was conveniently located only a few blocks from the 2,3,4,5 trains. We never got to meet Juan the host, but his roommates were very friendly and accomodating esp when we got locked out of our room! We also took full advantage of the bike storage downstairs. If you like Carribbean food there are plenty local hot spots to check out that also deliver! We would recommend Juans place if youre looking to get a taste of brooklyn without being too far from the city for a reasonable bargain!

I enjoyed my stay in David's apartment. The neighborhood doesn't have the best reputation but I never had any trouble and it certainly has its charms! I stayed here for two months while working on the Upper East Side so it was very convenient for me. David and his roommate are perfectly nice and are quick to respond to questions. Only downsides: the room nor apartment were very clean when I got there and it can get really hot inside during the summer.

Wonderful apartment in awesome location (steps to L subway, 20 minutes to the city, near cafes, restaurants, flea markets and antique shops).  The space was immaculate and tastefully decorated with enough closet and cabinet space provided to put my own things.  Everything (towels, sheets, new soaps, even chocolate treats) provided.  Joe was always kind and available through phone and email.  Check in and out could not have been easier.  One of my best airbnb experiences so far.

Charming apartment with great restaurants and markets close by.  Great location in the city near major subway lines and Central Park.  The apartment is located on a quiet street, so we felt like we got a break from city life when we needed it.  

The apartment is clean and tastefully decorated, and perfect for 1 or 2 people.  

Lindsey provided us with a "guide" to her neighborhood, which we found incredibly useful.  She lists her favorite markets, bakeries, and restaurants in her neighborhood, as well as other worthy information close to where she knows you'll be exploring.  We tried several off of her list, and they were wonderful!  We felt as though we were truly a part of this wonderful neighborhood.

Lindsey was very prompt with communications, and helpful with directions and navigating around the city.  We would stay here again, and highly recommend this apartment to anyone.
Nice and spacious. Good place for families and group of friends.

The room as exactly how it was described. It's really big and very comfortable. The environment is really nice and the subway is only 2 blocks away. Yasmine is a great host she is very nice and friendly. She is always avaliabe whenever you need her help. I would definitely want to stay here if I come back :)

The apartment was spacious and cozy. I guess the highlight for me really was really being able to enjoy myself through watching TV and exploring the extremely convenient and safe neighborhood (It took only about 2 minutes walking to the subway). Although I did not have the chance to meet Tyler in person (I was greeted by his brother), I knew enough through our communication that he is an indubitably responsible and considerate host. During my a-week-long stay he regularly checked in with me to make sure that everything goes well, which I do appreciate. The only issue that I do need to address is that despite many of the windows facing south, the apartment in fact does not receive much sunlight. Sometimes in the morning I had to keep the light on in order to do some readings. So if this is not a part of your concern you can go for it.

David was an incredibly communicative and easy host. He answered all questions very quickly and provided great information about the neighborhood and transportation pre-arrival. He was flexible about our arrival and departure times. Even though he was out of town, we felt very taken care of during our whole stay. The house was clean and comfortable, and well-located to local shops, restaurants,  parks, and two subway lines into the city.  We arrived to a couple of really nice gifts from the family. Thank you for everything!!

We had a wonderful stay and the accommodations and attention to detail were more than anticipated. Matthew was a great host. Looking forward to future trips. Would recommend Matthew as an excellent choice for your visit to New York. 
The rooms were clean and the leaving of clean towels and chocolates was unexpected and very much appreciated.

I stayed at Brooke for 2 months, everything was perfect.
Apartment very nice, clean in a family area and very nice people.
The communication with Brooke was perfect.
I could not hope for better ..

I highly recommend this apartment :-) !!!

Since I got in contact with Jon and during the entire rental process everything was seamless. He answered very quickly to emails and he is extremely organized and professional. I rented his place for almost 2 weeks, to summarize:

- The Building is a top full service with an excellent team of concierge/doormen and a very nice sundeck/rooftop. It is manged by one of the top management companies in NYC, so you are really getting the full experience. 
- The apartment is on the penthouse floor. It is spacious, very nicely furnished with everything you need. Fantastic view, very airy and light. A/C, washer dryer and all household appliances worked perfectly. 
- The apartment was immaculately clean when I arrived. Jon is a true perfectionist. Everything has its place and it was no dust or anything else I could annoy myself over. I felt very comfortable in his space. It comes with high quality bedding and towels, scented candles etc. He also had removed his personal belongings and cleared out the shelf in the bathroom and cleared out closet space in the bedroom. 
- The area is great. West Chelsea. Great restaurants nearby, like momoya(fantastic sushi place, great value) coffee from grumpy, barrys bootcamp right accross the street. Traders Joe's and wholefoods a couple of blocks away. 7-10 min walk to meatpacking. You will enjoy it, its also 2 blocks from a subway stop taking you up or downtown. Very convenient location. 


 
-

Andrey's home was beautiful and located extremely close to Central Park. Communication was very prompt which is always appreciated when traveling to a new city. I would definitely recommend staying here to any friends I have visiting the area!

Very good position, there is a metro stop (Brooklyn Museum) just in front of the building (Lines n e. 2 and 3 red).
There is a doorman 24h and the building is very beautiful and typical.
There are 2 bedrooms (1 queen-size bed and 1 bunk bed), 2 bathrooms and a big living Room with kitchen with a beautiful view to Manhattan!
Blake (the owner) is very helpful and reply in little time!

A big thank you goes out to Kris for letting us rent his apartment, through Airbnb, in Brooklyn, New York!

Everything was as he had posted, and more!  His 4th floor brownstone apartment was cozy and adorable.  The bed was SO comforable!  I got a good nights sleep every night.   I felt right at home.

Kris was so easy to deal with.  If we had a question, he answered us promptly.  There was a sense of sincere friendship about him.  We appreciate how welcome he made us feel!

I hope he would be willing to rent to us again for our next visit to Brooklyn!

Patricia
Bacliff, TX
Itay was very responsive starting form the beginning. Booked this apartment on behalf of a friend who was visiting and the apartment was very nice and cozy. My friend had a great experience.

Matt is a great host and his apartment is fabulous! Huge place by NYC standards. Tons of bars and restaurants nearby. Safe neighborhood. And Matt's interior design skills are off the chain. Highly recommended!
The apartment was clean and elegant, and the hosts were mindful and kind. A great alternative to a generic midtown hotel.

It may have been my best airbnb experience ever. This studio is designed and decorated by the homeowner, who is an architect. It is also super clean and close to public transit. In a few blocks, there is a street that is full of restaurants, supermarkets and bars. The homeowner, Cathy and Justin, is very friendly and also responsive to my inquiries.

Fantastic place! Exactly how it is explained. Very convenient transportation. Restaurants and cvs and everything is so near. I loved how they left wine and chocolate as complimentary for us.
