Janes place is good. The kitchen, bathroom and bedroom were all very well furnished. It was a cozy experience and a great new years eve location, there are a lot of bars in the area too.
Good place to stay at
Beautiful apartment in a lively area. Siria was incredibly helpful and let us check out much later on New Year's Day. Great value, would stay there again!
Good place for short stays. The hosts were easy to work with.
Place awesome, Hyemi is so nice, location is wonderful! Everything is ok and my travel was wonderful.

Adam's place is clean and located only steps from the G train. Communication with Adam was easy, and he was nice enough to meet me outside to help with my bags. The apartment is well equipped, large, clean, and  is located in a great area of Brooklyn.
the room is clean and comfort, Ming is considerate and nice!
Location in an up and coming area which is great. The apartment matches the pictures well. All in all a good stay which I can recommend.

Stayed with a friend during Christmas and New Years, unfortunately did not get to meet Nicole who was out of town but she was still very responsive with communication. Check in went smoothly with her cousin helping to hand over the keys. The space was great for 2 with plenty of room in a very artsy studio setup. I loved the book collection! The location was nice and quiet but not too far from public transport and Grand Central Park. We had a blast and would recommend any respectful guest to stay in this quite unique and beautiful apartment!

Great locale if you want to enjoy  NYC but want a respite from the hoopla that is Manhattan. Well appointed, pretty, clean and comfortable, this place is a perfect home away from home. In a residential neighbourhood but within a couple of blocks from great food and transportation. We expected to spend most of our days in Manhattan but ended up spending time in Williamsburg because we found it so charming and fun. Daniela was a great host. Regrettably, we did not meet her in person, but everything was arranged perfectly & she was always available via phone. Would love to stay here again. Side note: it has the most beautiful, large tub to soak in after a long day walking :-)

Patrick's place was good.
Location is perfect.
His roomies are kind and friendly.
But I don't know why I couldn't join the wifi...
But mostly perfect place!
Thank you for everything!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Communication with Romina was very smooth. She responded well to our queries.

Location was absolutely on spot - metro station down the building, 2 blocks away to Flat Iron Building, wine shop and grocery around the area.

Apartment is wonderful. Situated at 16th floor, thus you have a New York skyline of the neighbourhood. The feeling of walking around the cracking parquet floor may be annoying to others but for us, it added a little charm to the place.

Terrace - a plus. Amazing to have used it.

Would recommend Romina to other airbnb users.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Dania and Erin were easy to work with.
They have a nice place.  Great location.
Top floor patio in building is an extra bonus, great views.

Jamie is the best! He let us check in early and was my hero...he carried my HEAVY suitcase up the stairs even after I begged him not to. He actually took the majority of our stuff upstairs (my daughter's suitcase was heavy too)...we had a lot of stuff. The picture does not do the room (Website hidden by Airbnb) doesn't show how large the room is. There was plenty of storage and he has a small refrigerator in the room along with a huge bean bag and a chaise lounge. And that TV! The house has two bathrooms, so there were no problems getting ready for work. The guys in the house are great and were extremely welcoming. I actually hated to leave. I was hoping his job would need him to move and I could just keep the room. The neighborhood is perfectly safe and everyone was friendly. Fifth Avenue has everything you'll ever need including a bus stop and Fourth Avenue has the rest..including the subway. Restaurants, Rite Aid, Duane Reade, banks, grocery stores, and shopping (clothing, shoes, beauty supplies) on Fifth Ave...laundry, delis and grocery stores are on fourth. I highly recommend  staying at Jamie's place.

Great time starting here. It was my first time using AirBnB. I was traveling with a group of 4 and we had a nice time staying here. It was a nice private room with a locking door. When we got there Undine met us and gave us keys to the house and the room we were staying in. She let us use anything in the kitchen and provided a wifi password.

Nice, small apartment, located at the East River. We stayed with three person and it had the ideal size. 
We had a very friendly communication with Vulkan and everything was as expected.
You`ll get there easily by Sub (green 4,5,6) and 5min walk.
If you`d like to go downtown, next to the building, there is a stop of the east river ferry.
I absolutely recommend this Manhattan-Studio.
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Perfect location (3-minute walk to subway station, and to Central Park). Professional kitchen. Leah is very nice and kind. In all a super cozy and lovely apartment in Manhattan :)
Perfect location for being in the city! Comfortable bed & clean room. Walkable to nearby shops & restaurants. Smooth check in & check out process. Thanks Denise!

The shower wasn't working had to go to a different floor to shower. The bathtub had hairs in it. The fridge and microwave were dirty and the bed was broken.
No towels were provided and on the last day the heater was shut down. 
NOT a nice neighborhood. 
Not the same as the pictures .
For the quality of the room NOT worth the price.

Very good Location of the flat. Nice neighbourhood. 
Very good communication with Vincent. Organisation was great!
Never got a chance in person but I am glad everything worked out!

The room was exactly as pictured and very tidy. The apartment itself is very clean, warm and situated in a good neighbourhood close to the metro, making transport anywhere easy.

Pia provided all the info I needed for my stay and was extremely friendly and prompt when I contacted her.

It was a pleasure staying here - I would highly recommend to anyone!

Great location, near subways and in Central Chelsea. Comfortable and quiet yet close to many fun things like the highline and Chelsea Market. I was even able to walk to Traders and stock up for our time in NYC. Miri was great with communication and was able to give some helpful hints around the neighborhood. We traveled with our family of 4 - 9year and 12 years. Everyone was very comfortable in her place. An added bonus was that it is a 2  bedroom apartment versus a studio where our children would have had to share a blow up bed.
excellent place, clean, comfortable, David very good person.

This place is in a fantastic location, and perfect for weekend getaways! I stayed for NYE 2017 and it was all I needed. After being in 'the city that never sleeps', It's nice to be able to go back to a quiet environment to rest up for the next big day!
Very cozy place and easy to get to. Armando was very helpful with public transportation and was very quick with communication. Would definitely recommend!

Angelo was very accommodating with my arrival. He stayed in constant communication while I was travelling and there. He's apartment is comfortable and warm with everything you may need. There are local shops and a 24hr convenient shop on the corner that has all the essentials and more. As stated in the description there is a laundromat across the street that I found very useful. Overall I would say that if you want easy access to Manhattan (literally 20 mins on the L Train) but want to relax in a peaceful neighbourhood this is the place for you. There is also a lovely private patio that I'm sure is lovely during the summer months but I enjoyed it in the winter too. I would happily stay here again!
Nice location and cozy apartment
Comfy and well located apartment, I enjoyed my stay, the only thing to improve would be the cleaning, but good place overall.
Great stay. Apartment exactly as described and Kate and Franck are very nice hosts!
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I really enjoyed my stay at Miryam and Eduardo's place! The location worked great for me, being just a quick walk to the 1 line subway, with an awesome 24/7 grocer a few blocks away. There was tons of space in the apartment, for a great value. Everything was clean and in good working order, and because I had a two week stay, I really felt that I was living like a local. I would definitely consider coming back to stay again! :)

Audrey was an awesome host for us. she is very kind and flexible. we stayed at her house during our Christmas and new year trip. she was very responsive to the messages and questions we had. she was also making sure we have good time in the city. She was perfect.

Thank you.
Cool
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great host! The apartment was much bigger than it looks in pictures. It is in a prime location, close to many trains, bars, and restaurants. Carlos was very helpful and was easily accessible to answer questions.
Had a wonderful time. Great location, would not hesitate to stay there again.

Great stay at Dana's!  Super nice apartment with lots of space!  Really cool authentic neighborhood with good restaurants and really close to the subway. Dana was great to work with and was super easy to communicate with. Would highly recommend dana's apartment.

Great location, conveniently located 3 mins walking from 2 different metro stations.

Quiet , clean and spacious bedroom with a comfy couch and a toilet right next to the door .

Rapid response from Leo, we just had problems checking in but everything ended up well.
They're very nice people.

Overall, me and my friends 100% recommend this place!
There is really good location. Sarah is nice host. She was told me many information before I arrive her (Website hidden by Airbnb) you so much!

One of the worst Airbnb experience that I did have. I was very disappointed because of : the apartment was messy, there was a lot of dust everywhere, we find a dead mouse in the kitchen, even the toilet seat was not clean. Everything was quite rustic.
I burned myself against a heating myself against the heating pipe in the bathroom, seems to be common apparently in NYC but James didn't warn me, so now I have to deal with a mark on my shoulder for my whole life.
On top of that, the landlord wanted to kick us from the apartment for no reason, apparently we were making noise and we didn't turn off the light of the entry stair, thas was a lie and he just told us that he will throw our luggages out if there was another problem, saying that he doesn't care about the Airbnb situation. 

The only advantage of this Airbnb is that is closed to te metro subway to get to New York and that we can park the car. There is also a lot of commodities near the apartment, you have all the sunny side area with restaurants market etc.

I would advise to others Airbnb that this is only for adventurers, maybe for 2 days and that is going to be expensive and you cannot expect something amazing. 
I will not book again if I could.

The room was perfect - cosy, spacious and clean, and the apartment's really nice too. The hosts Brian and Max were really nice and helpful during my stay with them. Location was great too with the L line close by. Definitely recommending this!

Very cosy and private apartment with great location (literally 2 mins walk away from the 1 Ave station). Great place for food, drinks and travel convenience as well. Host was very accommodating, nice, clear & efficient in conveying his messages. Appreciated that he also checked on how things were going midway through my stay and for leaving behind a welcome message and homekeeping items. Enjoyed the stay and would recommend this for travellers who'd like a great location and somewhere quieter in East Village.
Great place to stay. I will definitely be back!
It is good place

Where do I begin? My best friend and I booked this Airbnb a few days before arriving in NYC for NYE. Though the reservation was confirmed and money withdrawn from my account, there was absolutely NO communication with the host. I messaged her a few days before my arrival and even the morning of without receiving any response. I then arrived in NYC close to 7:30 PM and knocked on the host's door three times. NO response. I contacted Airbnb twice that day and even their specialists were unable to reach her. Did I mention it was 13 degrees Fahrenheit outside and the winds were gusting terribly? Since there was no way of rebooking an affordable Airbnb immediately, I ended up spending two hours working with Airbnb to book a hotel for that evening and an Airbnb for the remainder of my stay. The only redeeming factor about this booking was their neighbors. They let us sit in their warm living room for two hours because we almost got frostbite and needed a place to charge our phones to call Airbnb. While there, these neighbors informed us that 1) this host spent all of that day moving out and that 2) she and the other person whom she lives with were very likely running a brothel out of their apartment. Do yourselves a favor and do not make a reservation with her!
Ottima temperatura in casa. Camera molto ampia.

Eric and Jillian's apt is literally steps from the 2/3 line at Wall Street. We had no problem getting the apt keys from the doorman with ID (this is a problem sometimes w airbnbs). The apt is fairly simple but has everything you'd need for a stay in the city. The best part is that Eric was very friendly and answered all my silly questions very promptly. I'd recommend them to anyone wanting to stay downtown.
The host canceled this reservation 82 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Dana was very responsive and reached out at various points to make sure everything was ok. The location is simply perfect. One block away from Bleecker St. Fully recommend for a visit to NYC.
A lot of personal stuff

Location was perfect,
Close to the city but also close to so many nice restaurants and bars in Williamsburg. Apartment is clean and cute and has everything you need. Will definitely be staying again!

Communication with the host was great. Even being away on vacation he got a friend to help arrange our stay for the weekend. The apartment is even better once seen in person. Cozy compact place for two. Location might be a little secluded from the city but it wasn't a problem to travel given the Metro was at almost every corner.
Great check in/out logistics and nice views from apartment and rooftop!

Arantxa's apartment was in a fantastic location right on 9th ave very close to Times Square and Central Park. The apartment was just as advertised and in great condition for our stay. There were multiple subway stations and restaurants nearby that are great to check out. Highly recommend!
Nice place with Good location
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Grace is a fantastic host! Her her home was more than enough. Very clean, smelled lovely, area has a 24-hr grocery store nearby and quiet neighborhood. She was easy to communicate with and would definitely recommend her place!
This was a superb experience. Great location. Great hosts.

Short walk to subway lines B and D.  Good supermarket nearby. Also walking distance to Levain Bakery (well known for their cookies, at this location there are no line ups unlike the Amsterdam location).  Easy to find street parking. On a quiet residential street.  Jeff's home was very comfortable, spacious and clean for our family of 5.  Did not meet Jeff but very easy communication with him and his son was at the house to welcome us.  Thank you for the chocolates - a nice welcoming gift.
The host canceled this reservation 146 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Altho we didn't get the chance to meet Berna, her sister is super nice and extremely helpful! The room is nice clean and cute and the location is great too!! The only small problem is their wifi seems not to be working during our stay but other than that everything is great :)
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Everything was great for the stay in Brooklyn. The area was quiet and cozy. The apartment was super close to the subway, about 5 minutes and Starbucks right by it too! The only thing to mention is that the apartment is on the 4th floor and the building doesn't have an elevator. If you don't mind the climb up, this is a perfect place to stay!
Very nice bedroom in confortable apartment, and Rahel is a really good anfitriona,

Fantastic location. Clean, cosy apartment. Close to subway. Lots of shopping nearby, especially on Broadway. Great eateries nearby. The famous Prince Street pizza is steps away! The host, Kaj, was super responsive to questions, and very kind. Highly recommended!

Oscar was very communicative and did everything possible to make our trip awesome. Our flight was 3 ours late and still he has been waiting for our arrival until past midnight to welcome us. Everything was the way it was portayed pefore. We highly recommend it

It was amazing stay during my almost 3 months stay in the heart of NY. Location is at prominent place and accessible easily. MO - Personally you are perfect host. If I get another chance to visit I would prefer to share your apartment . Thanks MO everything you did for me.

This place was PERFECT.  I wish I could live in a place like this.   Very cool large artitst loft in a stylishly converted warehouse.  Super close to the the train.  Bushwic is a really fun neighborhood to stay in. Lots of cool restaurants and bars but also residential so it's not loud.    The room was super cute with lots of light.  FReddi was a great host.  Very kind and helpful and knowledgeable about the city.  I've stayed in places all over New York and this really seemed like the best price for such a sweet spot.  ill be back indeed.

The location is excellent and getting in and out of the apartment is easy. It's in the center of everything but still quiet. The size of the apartment is large for NYC and we had everything we needed. The host was very communicative and provided Wifi along with other helpful details about the place before we got there. Make sure you know where and how to obtain the keys before you arrive as that was the only confusing part of my stay. Would stay there again!

If you're looking for a central location, close to the park and shops, where you can easily come and go, this is your spot. Clean, high quality, excellent staff, and quiet environment. My friends and I could go out and about in the city, and then come back to quietly rest very easily. I will come back to this place again. 

Also, they were able to hold our luggage before and after our stay, allowing us to squeeze in a few more hours. So kind.
Chioma was very helpful and responsible as a host. She made sure I chose the most quickest and safest travel route to her place. I felt secure and enjoyed my stay.

mathew's place was perfect for our visit.  the subway was less than a block away which made exploring all of manhattan and taking trips to brooklyn easy.  his apartment is located in quiet neighborhood but just minutes away from the busy city.  great city to visit and wonderful apartment to stay at.  i'd recommend getting the fish or shrimp tacos at los mariscos near chelsea market then head down the 15th street to blue bottle for your perfect cup of coffee.

We stayed at Isadora's place for a week. We had a great time, she's a really nice person (even if we got to meet only twice). Her room is really close to Manhattan (20 minutes by express subway) and located in a good neighbourhood.
We also had a great time with her roommates who are amazing and funny!
Thks again guys, we'll come back for sure!

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Craig's place.  Condo is located in a perfect spot in Midtown West with some of the best views of the city.  Luxury, upscale building with a doorman which is a huge plus.  Close to Times Square and other attractions if you are looking to do the tourist thing, but also tucked far enough away in a more residential area if you know the city and are looking to avoid the congestion.  Craig was super helpful, responded to all of my inquiries right away, and the place was exactly as described.  I would highly recommend staying at Craig's.

This place is in a very good location and close to Central Park and public transportation. There are several grocery stores next to the building that delivers to the apartment within minutes. 

The apartment is very modern and clean with 2 rooms, a mid size and a small one, mattresses are ok, pillows can be better but ok. The living room has a sofa bed, good for kids. Bring your own eyecover if you will sleep in the living room. The wifi os fast and reliable.

The building is nice with big elevator and quite neighbors.

The access to the roof is nice with seating area, you will like it of you want to get some fresh air or you are a smoker.

The host was very helpful and answers all the questions promptly,, also offers tips and advices about the area.

Aaron's an amazing host! Although I didn't get to meet him since he was away, he communicated with me as fast as he could and has everything prepped before he left. His room mates are considerate and helpful and location is just perfect. It's quiet and basic facilities like gym and laundry room are just right inside the building. Because this is my first time renting a private room where I usually rent entire apartments for longer stays, it took away my skepticism and I truly look forward to be back here if there's a chance in near future.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good location and a nice place to stay. Amanda is very helpful
Great location and spacious studio with a separate kitchen. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Svetlana's place was in a great location for my interests. Appreciated her warm communication with details. I've made a new friend.
Modern, clean apt.  Ryan was very helpful and check-in was convenient.  Location was a bit far from central spots, so be prepared to walk or subway.

Paula's place is nice and cozy . Her basement listing is easily accessible to anywhere in the city . The neighborhood is safe and family friendly . Many great restaurants around the listing too !
Although we contacted Paula considerably late and it was also during the holidays season , she patiently replies to all of our concerns and requirements.
Her housemate is really friendly and gives great suggestion to restaurants and informed us of places that we should definitely visits.
Would definitely come back to Paula's place if I was ever in the city. Highly recommended ! :)
Meg is a great Host! Her place is lovely, cozy and close to everything.

The apartment is in the perfect location, between the lively Bedford Avenue and the spectaculars views of the east river.
The room is small but well equipped, the apartment beautifully decorated and fully equipped. The hosts are incredibly friendly and available For any information you would need during your stay.

What a lovely house! Its 3 storeys, and has so much space. The coffee machine is a nice bonus.  Amazing bath and shower on the second floor, and only 10 mins walk form a great selection of hang-outs. I would recommend it!
Very nice apartment, subway entrance 3 min from apartment. Very quiet, and very comfortable. Great for when after a busy day in the city you can come back and relax.
La casa cuenta con todo lo que se pueda necesitar, el barrio es seguro y rodeado de muchas opciones de restaurantes!
Very comfortable, close distance to subway.

Nice place, great location. Felix was also easy to communicate with despite being out of the country. To be honest though, the apartment wasn't guest-ready. Dirty dishes in the sink, unmade bed, etc. I got the feeling it was posted after the fact for some quick NYE money, so although it worked out for us as we spent very little time in the apartment, I was overall disappointed with the quality for the listed price.
It was a very good host. The room is very beautiful. I would like to use it again.

The apartment was very well located right next to shopping and a subway stop.  It was very, very clean,quiet and well decorated.  Sue made sure that we had plenty of room for our clothing etc.  Although NY apartments are generally small, Sue's apartment did not feel that way at all.  The living room, dining room, kitchen and bedrooms were all good sized.  Sue was very responsive, and communication was easy.  We would definitely consider renting the unit again.

our hosts were really laid back and friendly! they took us on pretty short notice, and gave us a bunch of recommendations of what to see in the neighborhood, and had a cozy room for us to stay in with good heating & ac. we walked in at random points throughout the day and it was nbd. super friendly and relaxed! Thanks for hosting!

Andrea is a great host with a nice room, lots of space, and he is easy to get in touch with. If you are looking for just a place to sleep at night and to be near great areas in brooklyn then this is ideal. He left my roommate and I a great list of suggestions and things to do around the area as well as a nice bottle of wine. Close to the L train and easy to go anywhere in Manhattan as well. There is potential to run into a roommate of his around the apartment, which they are nice and should not be a problem.

Place was very clean and nice.
Ally is friendly and nicest person in the world:) I want to stay If I go to visit New York!
Apartment was clean and location was great near the subway.

I booked a 2bedroom/2bath suite for my annual girls trip for 5 ladies. Upon arrival I was told we were booked for a studio the first night, 2bedroom suite the second night and a 1bedroom the third night.  I was able to contact the host through internet quickly but the situation was only able to be corrected to a 1 bedroom suite and queen/queen hotel room on different floors.  I caution people booking that they may not receive exactly what they believe they are reserving.  I appreciated the quick answering of my frantic call but was upset that I did not get what I paid for, it was pricey for what amounted to 2 separate hotel rooms instead of a bedroom suite. I did receive an extra night because I was stranded with Hurricane Irma causing flight cancellations but I believe it was not enough for the stress and delay caused. The wyndham staff indicated that this was a common problem with airbnb and its property, not specifically this host but airbnb in general, so on my next trip I will book elsewhere.

We had amazing time at Meleza home, her room was very clean and comfy. House is close to subway just like 5 minutes of walk. Meleza really helped us a lot for everything, kitchen was perfect and clean too, washroom was good, neighbourhood is safe, overa ll its best. We had wonderful stay. We would love to stay again here if ever come to new york. Highly highly recommended.

This is an amazing experience for me. Polly is not only a wonderful host but an amazing musician of Tango. The room is extremely clean and spacious for a Manhattan standard. It's very close to both A train and 1 train, extremely easy to get around the city using the subway system.
Awesome couple, cute downstairs bedroom with a private bathroom!! Very nice
Spacious apartment at the best location in Brooklyn. The big windows and teched-up environment was a plus. The host was unreachable but the apartment was truly beautiful. I recommend!

Cody's place is sensational! Spacious and cozy, great bed, bathroom and kitchen - with a huge terrace - all on the ground floor but super quiet and peaceful at the back of the building with views onto the terrace, the rear park abs the 4th St rooftops. All in a perfect location, walkable to everywhere you want to go in the E Vge and LES. A lockbox with the key nearby on the street with a front door code made access and departure a breeze. We'll be back!
It was a pleasure to stay at Jay's place. Location was just perfect for me.
Great place, swert people and very accommodating

Before my arrival, Louis and Lina sent me an email full of explanation about how to come to the apartment from the airport and tips about restaurants, bars and the daily life in this very nice neighborhood. Very useful for someone new! The communication was easy! The place was nice and clean: photos were accurate. Close to the L metro station (5-10mins walk). I had a great time there. Williamsburg is amazing!!

Best place ever in Brooklyn! Not just the closeness to all good places but the facilities and everything Leah provides is just non-comparable to any others at this price range. Beautiful "clean" and "safe" house, fully furnished(kitcken, wa-ma/dryer, anything you'd imagine). NYPD next door/ Dumbo at literally 15mins walk. Too good to be true. Definitely recommend to anyone who wills to visit Brooklyn :)
Place was good for the night we stayed. Not the cleanest but it'll do. Host was great, let us check in early and answered all questions I had.

Aaron was a great host, he was very hospitable. The apartment very modern and well furnished. The bed was comfortable. The apartment was in a killer location, will tons of great restaurants beside it.

Aaron's apartment is even better than what we expected, very functional and perfectly located in East Village - close to several metro stations and good restaurants. The location is very convenient to visit the rest of the city and go out. Would definitely recommend it!!

Dayna is an amazing host. She was very flexible with check in and check out time. She was also easily reached for any questions. Her apartment was very clean and cozy. The balcony had an awesome view! The best part about the apartment was definitely the bed! It was probably the most comfortable bed I've ever laid on! Location wise it's very convenient. It's about a 10-15 min walk from the train station. The area is very safe and has plenty of shops. I would definitely recommend her apartment if you're looking to stay in NY!
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
It was perfect. Very nice place in very quiet area. I should recommend it :)
The apartment is nice even though it's small but to explore the city is perfect. It is also very quite so your sleep is good! There is no natural light and this can be a little bit disturbing...

This place is awesome Andrea and her roommates are so kind and the stay was very comfortable. The location is perfect, the subway is just around the corner and will take you anywhere just a short train ride to manhattan or anywhere. The room is very spacious and welcoming. We loved it and hope to stay here next time, thank you Andrea!

Really charming loft apartment a stones throw away from beautiful Fort Greene park. Your surrounded by picturesque tree lined streets, beautiful brownstones & a plethora of cafes to eat at. Anthony was a wonderful host going the distance to make our stay extra comfortable. Definitely recommend staying here if your looking for a solid spot to call home while visiting New York.
Jared's spot was exactly as mentioned, plus some. Great hosts and very accommodating for such a last minute request. Super clutch.
Great place!!

Great place to stay! The entire place was very cozy and clean, and the neighborhood was fairly quiet too. The bedroom was nice and big and they bed was quite comfortable! Definitely recommend this place for others and I would definitely return!

I had a really great stay. The place looks just like the pictures and it had all the amenities one would need. I liked the bustling atmosphere of Chinatown with tons of interesting shops and restaurants all around.

Yoko's apartment was in a great spot that was walkable to transit and quiet at the same time. Yoko was a gracious host and very communicative, I recommend others to stay here if they're looking for a great deal in NYC.
The space is great ! The bed is very comfortable, the room is spacious. You have privacy and whenever you do interact it's pleasant and positive. Would highly recommend.

My stay in James's house was perfect! The apartment is very cozy and comfortable and it has everything you need. The subway stop is just a couple of blocks away and the neighborhood is very well communicated. James was very helpful and we had excellent communication. 100% recommended.

A great place to stay - perfect for a single traveller or couple. Matt's apartment is perfectly located just 3 blocks from Madison Square Park. Plenty of great restaurants around, getting anywhere is very easy with access to subways, buses and Uber. Wi-Fi, Apple TV - the place feels like a home, so you can experience what really means living like a New Yorker in Manhattan. Though we haven't met Matt in person, the communication was absolutely efficient, check in and check out a breeze. Absolutely recommended!
Julio is pretty responsive. Also the apartment is super clean and stylish.

I arrived at the place really late at night and Yvonne and her cousin still were able to accommodate me. The place is really clean, near public transport and comfy. I have just have good things to say about it. Thanks again!
Cozy room, nice apartment, nearby subway stops.  Cem was very accommodating to some last minute changes, check in an check out was a breeze.

Really enjoyed the living arrangements from Andrea & Alex - they were simply amazing! Whenever I needed them, they were there and always willing to assist. 

I highly recommend this experience for others!

It's a good house with great hosts, Mr and Mrs Motiur are super nice, we had good conversations, they even cooked breakfast for me. There are pretty much space for parking and Metro is not far away. It's a nice choice for you to stay in New York. Strongly recommend
Good host!  Room was sufficient and neat enough. Not far from 61st Woodside station.

Maxime is easily the coolest person anyone will ever meet. Even though he is in the top 1% of interesting people he somehow makes you feel like you're just as interesting. A fashion designer, classical musician, big lebowski officionado and total baller, Maxime is a total pleasure to stay with. The apartment is beautiful and located right near the Subway.  I'd recommend staying with Maxime to anyone!
Awesome spot.
Great location, really near to city centre! I had really good contact with Mariam, shea always responded for my texts or calls. Thanks!
convenient location
Nice place, on the smaller side for the price but Dustin was a great host and the apartment was clean and overall a great place to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Vilena was more than an amazing host. I felt like family and were introduced over a cup of tea. She supplied way more than needed for our comfort and I would love to go back. Great spot by plane, about an hour an a half from the city.

Xalvador's place was great! Everything went smooth from communication to check-in. Super clean bedroom and a separate bathroom. Couldn't ask for more and I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a friendly stay in NYC.
Never stayed.
Great location- especially for the price.

Michaela's apartment is a lovely home in the Bed-Stuy neighbourhood in Brooklyn.  It is located close to the subway (C, 2 and 3 trains) and I used the C train to get in and out of Manhattan quite easily.  The apartment, while small, is tastefully decorated.  The space is well utilised and I was able to work comfortably in the apartment during my stay.  The bed in the room is comfortable and everything you need is provided - a rack for your clothes, bedside lamp, an airconditioning unit and a comfortable chair and footstool bean bag.  

On top of all that, Michaela and Love (pronounced Loo-veh) are lovely people.  They were so friendly and accommodating during my stay, and I feel privileged to have met them.

The neighbourhood is filled with great bars, restaurants and eateries.  I like the real feel of the neighbourhood, and it is close to many other interesting parts of Brooklyn.

The bathroom is on the small side so if you're a bigger person, this might be something to consider.
Marty was a great host !
Laura is an amazing host. She always had coffee in the morning to offer, and was so thoughtful and helpful with making sure I was comfortable. Will 100% stay with Laura again!

Had a great stay at luns place. Big and comfortable bed. Good connection by subway to airport and downtown. Cool neighborhood. Perfect for the price. A bit loud, but hey youre in new york ;D thank you lun!

Everything was perfect. I was surprised about the dimension of the room, which is really big and comfortable. Bianca is the perfect host, she is very kind, clear and helps you to get comfortable. The neighborhood is residential and safe! Her flat is very close to the subway. 
I hope, one day, I could host her in my home town to return the hospitality.
Spacious one bedroom for NYC! Exactly as described and great location. It was clean and comfortable and very easy to check in/check out. I would definitely stay here again!
Great for young professionals getting a start living in New York

I stay at Flatbush's house and then I moved to Bedford's house. This is something that I really thought cool: if you need for any reason to move to another Outpost house, you can if they have a bed available. The places are nice, you can save some money with food because people always let something when they left. You may have some issues with train lines after 10pm, and on weekends, because some lines stop working or just delay more than the usual so be prepared. People on Bedford's house was amazing and made my staying at the house and in NY better and funnier. They are always having some party or celebration with all the houses, time to time. Any issue you can talk with Valentin or Jacob, they will help you wherever you need.

Its great all around. The room was a bit cold. Samantha gave me a heater to use it worked wonderfully. Samantha works alot so do I. She was super accommodating. I could not have asked for a kinder more considerate Host. The apt is very nice. She lets u use all areas. She is super clean. Never one issue.
Great stay!

My boyfriend and I had a lovely stay in Madeline's room. Before we arrived she sent us a detailed descriptions of everything we needed to know for our stay, even great suggestions for local bakeries and tourist spots. The apartment was clean and located in a great area! Her roommate Genna was very sweet and helpful, which made our trip even more enjoyable.

As this is a new listing there were some obvious teething problems.  However Laura as a host is available communications wise and cooperative when it comes to making improvements.

The apartment is a fair size smaller than what we expected (largely due to some flattering angles in photos).  It is however in a brilliant location in the West Village.  Comes with all the basic necessities (bathroom, shower, iron, fridge, full size bed etc).  No TV (but the host notes this in the listing).  

Bedroom is located street facing.  So if you're a light sleeper I suggest ear plugs.

The place could use a once over cleaning wise before guests arrive (bathroom/shower wasn't clean, apartment was dusty).  The check in process needs work (we were not given the correct keys and had to stay in a hotel the first night, which was refunded by the host).  Aside from that if you're looking for a quaint home base to drop your things and rest your head whilst exploring the city, this is the spot.
Everything was so lovely. The hosts are super cool and attentive. The apartment is clean and sunny and has a warm feeling. It was the perfect place to spend the holidays.

I loved it! I was pleasantly surprised during my stay. I was a little hesitant that it would be chaotic but the living space worked out perfectly. For a young female professional wanting the New York experience in Manhattan, it was a great experience! The location was good, everything was close by. If you wanted to cook, they had a kitchen. The ladies were so nice and driven. Though I only stayed a few days and was in and out at a conference, it felt like a family. I would definitely love to stay here again if I were in NYC. Also, props to Julia! She was very welcoming, accommodating and a fantastic host!

This was a great place and everything was really flexible and the host helped with everything. It was cold at night because the heater wasn't powerful enough but other then that everything was excellent. Very close to the subway which connects to every place of New York City. If i travel again i would surely try to stay here.

Where do I even begin? This stay was wonderful. 
I couldn't check in at the time I originally had stated, and David was super accommodating and made check in really easy for me. The apartment is in a fantastic location, with the Q's 94th street entrance being less than a block away; it made my commute to work take barely 20 minutes. The roommates were wonderful, both had been there for over a month, so I'm not sure if they're a more permanent fixture, but I promise you'll get along well with them. Beautiful people who I have made lasting friendships with. 

The room is comfortable, if not exactly large. There's plenty of closet/storage space available, drawers for a more extended stay. One of the outlets is non-functioning and another was behind the dresser so I had to move the dresser over a few inches to access it, but there is an extension cord next to the bed so charging one's phone/laptop/various accouterments isn't an issue even if you don't use the outlet behind the dresser. The desk in the room is very small, but adequate for a laptop. The bed was luxurious, the linens freshly cleaned on my arrival.

For that matter, the entire apartment was very clean, presumably due to a joint effort of the tenants and David himself. I wasn't there long enough to actually meet David; one of the roommates helped me check in, but apparently he brings by toilet paper/cleaning supplies/occasionally foodstuffs/etc. which I found very convenient. 

All in all, I can't recommend this place enough. 5 stars across the board; If I thought I could afford it on a monthly basis, I don't know if I would ever leave.

Dioni is a great person. She is very nice and reliable and someone with whom I would guest with again simply due to her commutative skills. I stayed for ONE month and there was never a time where I could not easily reach her. 
The apartment was just as described 
It's is an older building so there is obviously work to be done but it is well maintained. We had an issue the first night with plumbing around 12am! Thankfully Dioni was immediately responsive even for such a late emergency call. 
It's only a four story residential building and the landlord was very nosy and so was the primary reason of most discomfort. Its an uncomfortable sense of being watched or needing to hide. 
There is smoking in the building so during the first two weeks my clothes carried an unwelcome scent. Yet nothing that fresh air and perfume couldn't solve. 
Other than that, the apartment is very close to the train (2 blocks) that you can actually watch the train go by at night from the bedroom and living room windows! 
Her decor is very charming and the neighborhood felt very safe and well situated near markets, shops, and restaurants. Dioni is a very gracious hostess and allowed us to use anything in her place that was of convenience. (Read: eggs)
This place is great!  The building is quite new and upscale.  The location is superb. Walking distance from Penn Station too.  Lisa and Matt are great hosts.

This was our first time using Airbnb and we had a great time!  From initial booking to check-in, communication was excellent.  Upon arrival one of the residents gave us a tour of the house and answered any questions we had.  This place has a lot of artwork and decorations that makes it a very colorful place to stay.  My girlfriend particularly enjoyed the lighted hula hoop!  The pictures and description in the listing seem to be a pretty good representation of the property.  My group felt very welcomed and comfortable and would definitely return in the future.
Nice and quite place. Isa is an excellent person.

My stay with Christine and Chris couldn't have been better. Both of them were extremely friendly and helpful. Their place was clean and quiet, which was perfect for me! I would highly recommend their place.
Very clean and central. I would definitely stay again !
Stephen was very considerate and friendly. Prompt and easy communication. Listing is very close to G metro line and plenty of closet space. Had a great week. Thanks Stephen!

Perfect location if you're planning on seeing Harlem, Uptown, Upper West Side, Central Park, and Columbia University. Minutes walk away from the 1 and D trains. Easy to get to Midtown as well on the D train on 125th or on the 1. The host did more than i expected. Full access to kitchen as well. Great stay!
We had a very nice stay. A great value in the heart of Brooklyn.
Gautam was a great host while I stayed in the city. I stayed at his place for my externship which was a walk away. Real convenient. Lots of places to eat nearby.

Melani has an incredibly beautiful space and is super friendly. The apartment was really easy to get too and the location was very close to the subway making it a breeze to go anywhere you wish. Loved it!!!
Hosts and accommodation dont get much better than this... Lee is the Michale Jordan of the air bnb game. 6 championship rings and two thumbs way up!

Michael is a gracious and accommodating host. I was greeted with a glass of lemon water and espresso.  Apartment just like in photos -- even more comfortable and spacious. Will absolutely book again on my next trip!
Excellent communication throughout my stay and a very large and beautiful apartment with lots of character!

I did not indicate this host. He picked up my call and hung up on my face. When I called again, he did not answer, and hours later he canceled the reservation. I was desperate because there was no more vacancy in Manhattan because it was a holiday. My luck was that my mother-in-law had a friend who lived nearby and we donated a room to sleep.

Jasper is definitely a very nice and considerable person. He planned everything very well, and the communication process was very easy. The apartment is definitely well organized and clean. The transportation is very convenient, with subway right at the corner. Free parking is available, so whoever drives do not have to worry about parking. Overall, nice experience!
All was great. Thank you!

I stayed at MJ's place during a business trip in Soho. The room was perfectly located for my workshop and I was able to walk/transit everywhere else. MJ was very responsive and accommodating and her roommate was delightful. As a woman traveling alone, I felt safe and unconcerned. The room was very clean and comfortable but just a note to business travellers, it's tiny and doesn't have any closet space (for instance, if you have to wear a suit or formalwear there will be nowhere to hang it.) The room is very small, be aware of this if you are travelling with large luggage. If you are traveling in the winter, the room can get cold. Bring an extra hoodie/pair of socks for the night. There is a deli just next door where you can buy basic groceries.

Great location, close to L train, restaurants, grocery. Levent messaged back quickly with any questions I had. The place was comfy and nice. My only small thing is that the bed is a futon and not a real bed, I didn't realized that through the pictures so it's a good thing to know if you stay. Overall I had a good stay.
Su Lim is a very attentive host who has an amazingly quick response time. Great communication. Great host. Very positive experience!
Beautiful place and terrific location. Mike and Lori are wonderful hosts.
the place was beautiful, clean, well located. mika was communicative and accommodating. thanks for your lovely place!
great place with its own gym and secluded communal garden. close to transportation and hearts of williamsburgh. amazing host and pet! highly recommend.
Nice apartment in a gem of a neighborhood.

Our stay was fantastic. The place was roomier than expected, it is after-all NYC and most places are rather tiny. It was very modern and stylish which for me was important. The price is great for two-three people as you can easily split the cost however if you're traveling alone it might be a little much. Alejandro was extremely clear in his instructions for check-in and check-out. The location is EXTREMELY for a visit to NYC as is it is in the middle-lower part of manhattan with east access to other parts of NYC. I'm glad to have spent my Pride weekend with Alejandro. We communicated in both english and spanish smoothly with no misunderstandings. I would give it 9.5/10 with the price being the only downside since I had wanted to stay in NYC a bit longer than I did.

Annamarie's place is right in the heart of Williamsburg- an unbeatable location. The apartment is incredibly bight and spacious, so it's a real gem given it's so close to all a person could need for a visit. The L train is right around the corner and it's only one stop to the East Village in Manhattan, although I spent most of my time exploring the great cafes, restaurants, bars and shopping right at my doorstep. The room and apartment were very clean and I had a wonderful sleep in the super comfy bed. 

Annamarie is an incredible host, she's very friendly and ready to give recommendations about places to eat and activities to do in the area. And, she was super responsive and easy to communicate with. Her roommates were lovely, I felt very welcome in the apartment and had lots of privacy (I often had the place to myself).  I was delighted to find such a great place and will certainly be back! Thank you Annamarie!!

Teresa's apartment is lovely. It is tasteful, bright, and oh so comfortable. It is well located if you are looking to stay in Williamsburg. The building is safe, secure, modern, with great amenities. Parking for us was easy. We were able to find spots outside as signs allowed for free weekend street parking. 

Teresa was a thoughtful host and offered coffee and breakfast bites. She communicated well and was very responsive. It is clear that she put a lot of time and effort into hosting her apartment and making her guests feel right at home. The quality of her space, including her linens, towels, bed, glassware and decor were supreme.

Her description of the space is 100% accurate and I cannot wait to return!

The apartment was very spacious and cozy. Located in a quiet residential area of the East village. My family was very pleased with the entire stay. Eugene was very accommodating and very hospitable. He was very quick to answer any questions we had and made sure our stay was pleasurable. Definitely would rebook when we come back.
Good location in vibrant neighborhood, no outside noise. Bathroom is not very clean and (Hidden by Airbnb) are not welcoming, which makes it hard to feel comfortable.

Ravi is an amazing host, person and now great friend! This place was not what I was expecting..... it was so much better. Ravi gave my friend and I maps of the area, described his favorite places to go and gave us two bottles of wine as a welcoming gift! Ravi's hospitality was above and beyond, I honestly didn't want to leave his awesome apartment. Ravi brought over some friends and we all hung out they were all welcoming and respectful of our space. I highly recommend Ravi's apartment right off restaurant row, two blocks from time square and in the heart of the gay-borhood. I left Ravi's place with a smile and new friends.

Johanna's place is where to stay! Close enough to experience everything Bk and the rest of the city. The only thing was there is only one ac unit and it's in the bedroom.  However, if you leave the unit on and have the door open it will circulate enough to be comfortable. Everything else was great. I didn't meet Johanna but she  was a phone call away if I needed anything
Great location perfect setting!!!!!!
Very accommodating hosts. Excellent location. Very clean space.

Loved the area! Very hospitable host. Communication was clear and quick. The bed room didn't lock but we felt safe. Will miss the shower and great places to eat right outside. I was unable to sleep one night and she stayed up & offered to watch movie together which was very nice. Cutest dog and clean home. I'd stay again for sure. The heat turns on at night which causes a noise doesn't last too long. Recommend!
Great location, friendly host and housemate. Thanks for welcoming me into your home!
Great location, easy to get everywhere.
Great host, great communication, nice neighborhood
Dog hair
Melissa was really welcoming and caring. Their advice was really useful. The apartment was great, especially the decoration, and the dogs were lovely. I spent really good holidays.

Excellent location to shops and restaurants. Susan was a great hostess and fast response to questions. The place was fabulous. Plenty of room. Very clean and comfortable. I could not have found a better place. I definitely would hope this is available for future trips to the area.

Helene is a very kind host. It was such a pleasure meeting her and her family. The room is in a two-floor house. The other housemates were also very friendly. The room is not very big, but it is clearly stated and visible from the photos. Despite this, it is a cozy place to stay in. Highly suggested host and room!

The room was nice and clean, as advertised. There is a weekly cleaning service for the common areas, which is great.

The flat is about a 12-15 minute walk to either the J or the A line, which will take you directly to Manhattan. The area has a lot of little cafes and restaurants, and even a few bars that don't look too shady.

Helene and Kevin were really nice and easy to communicate with.

Two blocks from Lincoln Center and metro station. 
Supermarket and buses at the same block.
Beautiful view. Doormen 24h. Best Security in town.
Internet working very well. 
The only matter is the lack of a real bed. 
There's a sofa and a air-mattress. 
I would be there again if Teresa provides a real bed for the apartment. It does deserve one.

I had a temporary work position in Tribeca and rented one of Helene's room for 2 months in the summer. She was awesome and the place was great - clean, convenient, and spacious. This is a great option for someone visiting for a longer period of time for school, an internship, or something like that.

The apartment is  clean and spacious! Also has a lot of natural light which is good. All the basic amenities are in the neighborhood and there's nice restaurants springing up. I'd really recommend living here. Oh and also short walk to the subway station

l'emplacement de l'appartement est excellent pour passer un sejour a NY. la proporietaire est tres gentille, serviable et joinable a tout moment. j'encourage les visiteurs de NY a essayer cet appartement
Aa

Amazing host, Saar was super attentive to every detail of my stay, welcoming and prompt to help in anything necessary. 
The room as perfect, just like in the photos, clean, comfy and super organized. 
Saar gave me some great tips of where to go about in the neighborhood (actually all over Brooklyn, from North to South; he's quite an expert about the place he lives), which made everything a lot easier for me.
The whole apartment is very nice, clean and stylish.
I will definitely recommend my friends to stay with Saar when they come to NY as I'm sure they'll enjoy the experience and homy environment as much as I did!

The apt is as described. It is perfectly clean and I found it very comfortable. Jing was very helpful and answered quickly to e-mails. I am travelling frequently to NY and one important aspect of the apt is that it is very quiet. This is rare in the city. I would definitely recommend the place to other visitors keeping in mind that---as mentioned in the description---the place is rather small.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

SUCH a great experience. Mackenzie was super sweet & very easy to communicate with. The room was large and clean, as was the rest of the apartment, and Mackenzie provided everything we needed. Also gave us lots of suggestions about where to go in the area. Her roommate was also very nice & pleasant to chat with. Overall, great host. Thanks so much!! :)
We loved the apartment- it was clean, had everything you needed & close to all forms of transport & good restaurants nearby. Concierge always happy to help.

We stayed in Joe's apartment for three months and had a great stay! The apartment is perfect for a couple or small family and it had everything we needed. The location on Upper West Side is also great!
Really great location. Alyse was very nice and helpful. 100% would stay here again.

The photos were pretty accurate as described in the listing. And the space was cute and cozy. Minor cleanliness issues with the bathroom and accumulated dust on the floors and corners of the room. The amenities of the dryer and washer were cool however we did not use them. And location was walkable to get the trains and buses.

We had a really pleasant stay in Lucie's bedroom. There were all the conveniences and it was very appreciable to have our own bathroom attached to the bedroom. Everything was super clean and cosy. 
The appartment is well situated : 3 min from the subway with easy access to Manhattan. 
It is very easy to communicate with Lucie. 
I really recommand this place !

We had a great stay at Grace's house. The location is close to two metro stations. The house is well equipped and well organized. Keith, her cat, was a great company and did not cause any problems. It was a great stay in NY and when we go back we will look again at Grace's house
The host canceled this reservation 111 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
What a great place! Hallie is a great host, only one car coach, and Hallie's mum Lara brought me frozen yoghurt one night. 10/10, would stay again.
The apartment is roomy, the location is amazing and Venetia is the best!
The apartment was really nice and I loved the neighborhood. I would definitely stay again and would recommend it for others.

This was a great apartment.  Very spacious and comfortable.  We had trouble communicating with the host at first but after we finally connected everything went smoothly.  We don't have any complaints but we're putting this out there for future guests - there were no k-cups for the Keurig, there were no tissues and the tv is for streaming only, there's no cable or satellite.  Some of the lamps didn't have light bulbs. It's a one story walk up and there are 4 locked doors.  This wasn't a problem after we figured out the keys.  Overall it was a great stay.
very clean and convenient
Amazing room in great location (very near to subway station!). Blair doesn't live there, but he kept in touch with me all the time. Thanks for making my first NYC experience much easier!
Very nice host! Always there if we needed something! I recommend!
Jenia was kind, helpful, and responded to messages quickly. The place is great! Clean, well designed, and central. Would definitely recommend! :)
Lovely apartment. Great for kids. Awesome location. Is true to its description. Great check in experience and helpful hosts - not that we needed much as everything worked perfectly.
Jim's place is great.  It's private and a really convenient locations.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A place in the middle of Manhattan, near to all the restaurants and shopping area. A good stay. A cosy room with all the facilities.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Ebba's place was nice and cozy,met her roommates who were friendly and offered assistance. This is a central location with transportation via the subway and buses easily accessible

had a great experience with both the apartment and with michael as a host.

the space itself is big, w lots of sunlight, a beautiful view of the neighboring church, a well-stocked kitchen and a very comfortable bed.

michael is kind, thoughtful, accommodating and communicative. he let me check out late, and left a nice welcome package. 

great place to stay near so many conveniences and trains.

Great Host! Everything was perfect! The appartment is as described,  ultra lightened!, near subways, supermarkets, washer dryer in basement, meeting for keys delivery without any problem, Thumbs up for  Shelley
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Excellent location! Excellent experience! Highly recommended!

Ife's place was so nice and spacious. I could not believe what a comfortable and big apartment it was for New York. It's in a great neighborhood near central park and good restaurants. Ife had a binder in her apartment with very detailed information on restaurants, shopping, and transportation in the city and it was so helpful. This was the best Airbnb experience I've had in a big city.
Apartment is exactly as described and pictured. Kelly was a doll and made our visit stress free. Check in and out was almost too easy. Great communication throughout the stay as well. Thanks Kelly!

It was a decent place to stay in in New York. It is in Korea lane and on some evenings and on weekends it can get a little noisy on the streets. But as a result you are literally around the corner from the Empire State Building.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
I have a great time here!
Good and bright room with balcony.
Great location, quiet road. Helen was a good host, friendly and able to sort issues with the lock quickly!
Staying at Mabel's was fantastic. Pretty quiet, comfortable bed, lots of light in the room. About a 7 min walk to subway stations. Her roommates were friendly, But I didn't really see them a lot.
Best stay ever, gorgeous apartment and fantastic host. Super comfy bed too. Located in such a cool area to explore! So much cool graffiti and fun stuff around. Thanks Beth!
Very nice and clean house. I liked the details in the house! Public transportation is walkable. I would rent it again
Very nice rustic, artsy Brooklyn apartment. After brief snafu on keys, everything worked out well. Host communicated well on everything. Bring eyeshades and earplugs for sleeping :)
Great location!
Great place! Small but that's New York! Perfect for a couple or lone traveler! Super safe and clean. The host was super great and everything was hassle free!

We had an amazing time at Margot's apartment. First of all, it was very clean and in a fabulous neighborhood. Tons of room and awesome ammenities. Margot was great from beginning to end and she responded to questions and comments within minutes. Check in and out was a breeze. I highly recommend Margot's place!
Such an amazing host! The place was beautiful and exactly like the pictures.

I would recommend staying here if you intend to treat it as a place to sleep. It is a very small room with little light, containing only a bed. The flat mates are very nice and Sean was a very accommodating and flexible host. The location is excellent and one should go out and explore from the location (one will not really want to spend more time here than necessary - it is acceptable in cleanliness and the bed is comfortable, but not such a pleasant place to hang out). 

So, would recommend, but only as a bed. Also, read the description - do not expect a super clean apartment, people actually live here. I suppose that this would qualify as an "authentic"  New York living experience
It's easy and the district is quiet.

We enjoyed staying with Jim.  Our large space included a bedroom and a sitting/living room with a table, chairs, and couch. The bathroom and kitchen are shared.  His free wi-fi works well.  Jim's location in the Park Slope area of Brooklyn is excellent.  It is just 2 blocks from Brooklyn's incredible Prospect Park.  The Brooklyn Museum and the Brooklyn Botanic Park are within 20-25 minutes walking distance.  There are many interesting shops, pubs, coffee houses, specialty food stores, and restaurants in Jim's neighborhood plus interesting early-20th century architecture.

I had a great time at Jessica's place in up and coming Bed-Stuy. You're close to the A line that brings you fast to Manhattan and also close to G line to go to Williamsburg. The apt, kitchen and amenities are all great, new & clean. What I liked the most was the private bathroom & the big closet.
Jessica was there for all questions and was a great host!

This room was absolutely incredible! Anna and Jonathan are also the most lovely people and I would highly, highly recommend both of them and this room!

The apartment has lots of natural light and was well decorated and furnished.
It is incredibly well located. All around a must when visiting NY!

I hope to be back again stay again one day soon.
Nice place. Very friendly hostess.

The stay at Steph's place was great and she was a thoughtful and fantastic host. The place was high end, had a beautiful view that is rare in NYC and also had some great spots to get work done. The space was well lit with both natural and artificial lighting, floor to ceiling windows and very open. I was able to get pretty much anywhere I needed quickly and there's a great cafe right across the street that is open for breakfast. Highly recommend.

Brian's apartment is absolutely perfect for a stay in NY. It's very well located, close to the subway and many amazing restaurants. Very safe and young area. The apartment is perfect for one or two people. Thank you Brian!

Check in was quick and simple! The room I got was plain but got the job done. No TV or anything in the room, but great for a night or two! Shower was hot and bathroom was clean. Karlene communicates very well and wascvery understanding during our 1 little mishap. I appreciated my stay very much!
Spacious, comfy apartment. Host was friendly, professional and very communicative.
Unbelievable apartment, amazing host, A+++++
Great location and the host is kind and really nice.

Baruch's place was amazing. The room was huge, clean, and quiet, with a super comfortable bed. The location was very convenient, close to metro and stores. Baruch was a nice guy, very communicative. I will definitely recommend to my friends.

Needed to say in Bushwick and this residence was a perfect location for me.  The apartment is very eclectically decorated with interesting objects.  I only had a couple of questions during my stay and I was always able to reach someone who resolved the issue.
Elaina's place is pbeautiful, spacious, relaxing and clean. It was a great value and she communicated quickly. We enjoyed her book collection and homemade jam!
Great apartment! Lovely lively neighborhood! Roommates are spectacular! Subway isn't too far, great markets around, tons to do!
Awesome spot, awesome housemates, nice building, private balcony win, Graham Ave just around the corner, half mile to the subway, and right next to the park.
The place is very comfortable and priceless rigarding it's location in NYC. The hosts were kind and helpful at all times. We appreciate their help very much.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Thank you again, everything was amazing! You have a beautiful home!
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The apartment was clean and comfortable. Ginny was very responsive.

Had a pretty good stay at Jackie's. The apartment was in excellent condition, pretty clean, with everything working (except for wifi in a lot of cases). The bed is pretty small though, and neighbors can be quite annoying, they're loud and smoke in the building. The area seems pretty safe, but parking is nearly impossible. I had to leave my car 7 blocks away. Jackie was a great host, made sure to provide clean and new supplies for me, and we had no communication issues whatsoever. Being in front of the subway was a blessing.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Ermina and Shawn's place was great. The location is close to transit, an easy ride to Williamsburg and Manhattan, and in a really cool neighbourhood with lots of amazing restaurants, cafes, and shops that I highly recommend exploring. Ermina is an amazing host and one of the sweetest people I've met. Communication and check in was easy and being a solo traveller she graciously invited me to check out the Smorgasbord food market with her on the weekend. I would easily stay with her again. Oh yeah, and little Tiger Bunny is the cutest cat that you will fall in love with!
Great spot in a fun neighborhood. Glad we found it!
Friendly, clean, great location!

I really enjoyed my 10 week stay at Anne Marie and Joshua's place. The apartment is very spacious and had everything I needed. It's located in a quiet and serene gated campus that made for a very peaceful stay. It's very close to the High Line and a lot of interesting restaurants and night life spots in Chelsea. Anne Marie and Joshua were very flexible and accommodating and were always available if I had any problems (which I didn't). Would definitely recommend. Thank you!

Laura is the best! Her place is very clean, spacious and in a great location (also has a private bathroom). Laura was always clear and responded immediately to any communication. Her flatmate is amazing and a really fun person as well! I would definitely recommend staying here and probably will do so myself the next time as well.
Nice set up!
Amazing location in prime Soho. Great and professional communication. Don't hesitate!

Tia was always super responsive and even had a nice little Christmas tree set up which we enjoyed!

At Tia's place, we felt like we had a nice getaway vs being in 'someone elses' apartment. Easy to park close by. Great coffee shop/market close by, as is the park itself. Nice 1br studio, everything was super clean. Bed was very comfortable. 

Could have used a coffee maker or a pan, but then again, at the street corner there are two coffee shops. And we knew going in, that there weren't pots and pans... We were only staying one night.

I would stay here again Tia. Thanks!

Cozy and adorable room in a big apartment. We did not get to meet DyAnna, but she was very thoughtful and made sure we felt comfortable and welcome at her place (she even had a little tray with shampoo, soap, tea, coffee and chocolate ready for us, just like in hotels!). The apartment also has beautiful shared spaces, and the neighbourhood is pretty. The roommates we met were also very nice. Great experience, definitely would recommend to friends and family :)

Very handy location to get into Manhattan. Literally 10 minutes from the 46th st station to Grand Central. A nice bit of respite after a day in Manhattan. Sunnyside/Skillman Ave is really leafy and green. Next door/within a block of the apartment is a supermarket, pharmacy/chemist, laundromats, juice bar, citibank, 24 hr diner and pizza shops.

Prior to booking, leading up to our trip and during our stay Carolin was very easy to communicate with. The apartment itself was very clean, modern fit-out, art-deco style interior. Comfy couches, fast wifi and big bedroom. I would book this again in a flash when we're back in town. We had fresh bedding and towels waiting for us upon arrival.
Shireen and Sonia were fantastic hosts! Their place was beautiful and very homey :)

The apartment I stayed in was very clean, comfortable, and well set up, but different than what was presented in the pictures which was what I had expected and why I chose it. 

After waking up to a significantly different view and much darker apartment, Kyle offered to try to help move me to another apartment. However, when he finally did send a message, it was 5:11pm and when I responded, he said that the office closed at 5:30pm & that he would be gone for the weekend. 

After the weekend, I decided to stay on and apart from the view of the neighbors across the way, I enjoyed the central location, the ease of entry, cleanliness, and well fitted apartment.

This is an excellent corporate housing company and Kyle seems to be a great host. If only I had been given the apartment advertised or accommodation made for their error, it would have been a 5 star experience. 

All that said, I would definitely stay with Kyle again.

THIS PLACE IS AMAZING!!! Our host did a great job communicating with us throughout our stay incase we had any trouble, she was super flexible in accommodating our needs such as check-in and check-out, and the spot is located just walking distance to public transportation and local stores. My friends and I will definitely be booking here again- IT'S A HIDDEN GEM!!!!
It was great staying in Jewell's house. She's a very responsible host and replies my message very fast. The area is very nice and clean. I would highly recommend her house.

It was my first time in NY and I couldn't have chosen a better place! Great location, very cool unique interiors and such good value for money. Melissa replied quickly and answered all my questions. If I'm ever in NY in the future, I'd happily stay here again!

Nice, clean home. Cecily was really helpful all weekend and event assisted us with getting a metrocard upon arrived. 

She stocked the fridge for the kids and called to check up on us throughout the trip. She was awesome. 

The home really isn't close to JFK, it's a 30-40 minute drive depending on traffic. 

I'd stay here again

Nice  
 Perfect  Spot
Excellent host thank you for all your help. The apartment is perfect for tourist and is very well located. The price is outstanding compare to the other apartments.

I'm so grateful to Christina & Kesi for offering this property on Air and at such reasonable terms.  They make a long-term trip to New York or transitioning there much more affordable and stress-free than most options out there. There were 1-2 small maintenance issues but they fixed them right away!  It does take about 45 minutes to get into Manhattan via subway but it's worth it for such a clean place and great host. Lastly the internet was a little spotty due to the thick walls but that wasn't something they could help.  All & all I wish I could've stayed longer!

EXCELLENT location, around the corner from the A train and a couple of blocks away from the 1 train. Very big room and bed. The dog is a little bit crazy, but most of the time loving. Deniz is an awesome person and host.

Dioris was a great host, a very helpful and friendly. The place was clean and really confortable. Close to public transport with easy connections to the city center (the metro lines B,D,4), but very quiet. I highly recommend this place!

Liliana & her family were extremely kind and accommodating during my entire stay from day 1! They were easy to communicate with and the room is located close to the subway station. I will definitely be staying again when I am in the area. They're truly like family & the home is very cozy & cute & clean :-)

very good host !wendy very chindly and warm ...like one famliy ..
we live her house like live my own house  freedom and happy..very happy wnedy friends give us many (Website hidden by Airbnb) sweet! many tanks john and wendy borther..there is one rive outside house ..walk there very good...hope live wend house next time in newyork...love u wendy and john and your borther and another guys ...very beautiful feeling...thanks again..
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very good communication if ever we had any questions throughout our stay. Quite small but a great price for this location

Deri has a really funky place in Crown Heights... It's quite small but has everything you need, including a really comfy bed with loads of pillows. It's close to the A/C line which was perfect for me getting to work. We extended our stay by a few days and Deri was really helpful and a good communicator. Overall great for what we needed.

Nice spot in a wonderful area of Nyc, pretty much strategic. From Bobby's house it's possible to enjoy fully the mythical East Village. The apartment is cool, not big but usually who goes to Nyc doesn'want to stay at home, the area is awesome, everything you need is around the corner. Never met Bobby personally but when I had a little problem he suddenly sent me a friend to fix it. The organization for checking in and out is ok. The price is not cheap but, considering the area, is fair.
Carlos was such a hospitable host. Easy to communicate with and his place was perfect for my needs. Clean place, fast wifi & great location in manhattan. Convenient for walking , commuting/biking.
Eric's place was amazing what a cool roofdeck and so close to the train. We would love to come stay again sometime. I Definitely recommend this apt for anyone staying in Bushwick!

Loved staying at Lane's place! The location was perfect for me and the street is very peaceful and accessible to beautiful Brooklyn Bridge park and the subway to Manhattan. The room was clean and comfortable, as was the bathroom. There are only two things to keep in mind-it's a 4th floor walk up so if stairs are a problem for you, keep that in mind; and there weren't curtains in the bedroom so it got quite bright early. It didn't bother me but I'm an early riser. Thank you Lane!
This apartment is amazing, it is immaculate, great location, close to everything in the UES, etc. I look forward to staying there again!
Jayson is a gracious host. The space is very clean and accurate to the description. You, guys, made me feel home. Thank you.
Super well located, close to all the cool shops and restaurants. 1 block away from the L station (to go into Manhattan). Clean place, for a more than reasonable price, I definitely recommand!!

Pawan's place is located in a very convenient place in Manhattan. A min walk from the subway station. You will get to anywhere in Manhattan in 20-40 mins. Place was very nice and clean and Pawan is really friendly. This will be my place to stay when I'm back in Manhattan for sure.

Emily's place is wonderful!  It's clean, it's cozy and it has everything you need including a full kitchen, a beautiful, bright bathroom, high ceilings and an enchanting little outdoor patio!  Emily is a great host and answered all our questions within hours.  I can't say enough good things about our experience here.
