Super close to the subway literally 2 blocks away and 30 minutes to Manhattan is perfect for me. Claudia was very responsive and reachable, great stay and my family just loved it.
Everything is perfect!

I was disappointed with my stay at Hillside, mainly because I had to pay extra and the value for money is disappointing, when it comes to amenities in the room. Major issue for me were the dirty bath towels in my room with hair and dirt spots, which was honestly unacceptable and their inability to provide an accurate receipt. The room was a little smelly, but other than that okay.
Nice HOUSE ! But the neighborhood is not that nice .

The apartment was great! Really nice, spacious and modern with a great kitchen and bathroom. 

We were super close to cool shops, bars and restaurants in a really nice area of Brooklyn! There was always more than one way to get into Manhattan and so the location is great for public transport.
Evgenia's place was in close proximity to gyms, grocery stores, restaurants, and trains and buses. Beautiful location and even better view of downtown Brooklyn.
Everything is so right about this place. Our kids were thrilled to live there. The view on the roof is fantastic. It makes us want to go back to enjoy New York city for more days.
Grace is an amazing host and made the place feel so welcome! The room is beautiful and comfortable and I love the plant!

I have been using Airbnb all over the world and have never had a bad experience -- until I rented Yohan's apartment.  There were no reviews yet and that made me wary so I contacted him directly.  I was coming into town with my 82 yr old dad, husband and niece from Boston.  It was my daughter's birthday and I wanted to host a family and friends dinner -- which I told Yohan.  I even asked the square footage of of the apartment.  He said 1,400 sq ft, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms -- it sounded great.  When I arrived a manager met me there and brought me up to a TINY 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apt with a tiny kitchen and eating nook.  I thought the manager made a mistake.  When I showed him photos of the apartment I had rented he looked at me and said there was someone in that apartment.  I was furious.  We called Yohan and suddenly the story changed.  "A pipe broke and there was water damage and he tried to call me."  NONE OF THIS WAS TRUE.  Obviously I could check my phone to see if he called.  He didn't.  Nor did he text or email through AIRBNB.  Nothing.  Then, when I wanted to sit in the tiny apartment to use the wifi and try to find another apartment that would fit my family he said NO.  Awful, awful.  He actually told me to go to a Starbucks with all my bags. My assumption at this point was that his apartments (he has several) were not cleared by the building. This guy is the worst.  As I said I use Airbnb all the time (you can check reviews of me) and this is the first bad experience I have had.  It ruined our whole trip which ended up being way more expensive in so many ways because this apartment fell through.

Stayed in Adam's place for 2 weeks while waiting for my own apartment. Place and check-in couldn't have been any better. Adam is great at promptly responding back and setting up anything we needed. His roommates were awesome and very welcoming. Overall very satisfied with my stay.

Chrissy and Dana's place was awesome! A few friends and I stayed there for a trip to NYC for the weekend. The location is perfect, and the apartment is adorable, clean, and spacious. Chrissy was extremely responsive to any of our needs, as well. I would highly recommend staying here for the weekend if you are traveling to NYC! We will definitely keep them in mind for our next trip.

Everything was great, especially the location. Everything is near (duane reade, CVS, japanese district, etc) you even with consideration that the apartment was located at east village.  Parking was so easy to find regardless of day and time. Felt safe during the night. Only downside was no air conditioner inside the bedroom.

Yuval, was very kind and caring. Quick response and an amazing apartment. Clean, comfortable and with a perfect location. A small kitchen and a rather noisy heater did not diminish the well-being. Would definitely recommend it! 
Thanks for hosting us, Yuval

Actually it was a great choice for me. I've been in 5 different hostels and hotels previously but this was the best place I've stayed at by far. Firstly, Anna was a great landlord. Flat is located in a very cool place. Close to every attraction. Times Square, Little Italy, soho... Features of flat was more then enough for me.  In addition, the landlord was very accommodating and she shared plenty of information about New York with me which was a plus.
Convenient location and great neighborhood close to restaurants and subway. We liked it

The room was really good. It was near to the subway (2-3 minutes by foot) you also have everything you need near by the house. Mariame is such a polite and happy person who also can give you good tips :) we really enjoy our time at her house which is modern and got everything you need. :)
The place was exactly as promised. Would definitely recommend to everyone!
Very Nice appartment. Very close to subway so easy to get around :) Nice rooftop. Reza was a Perfect host
Everything was great! Marie is super sweet. Really enjoyed our stay in Williamsburg .
The host was easily contactable, responsive and very helpful in making my stay comfortable.

This is truly a lovely apartment and we had such a great stay.
We didn't meet the host at check in but he was absolutely great at communicating everything and making sure the process went smoothly.
Definitely recommend this apartment and host

Karen's apartment is beautifully decorated and spotlessly clean.  It's in a great neighborhood in Brooklyn with loads of eating and drinking options. 5 mins walk from Bergen Street and within walking distance of a number of other stations as well as Brooklyn Bridge, Prospect Park, Barclays Center etc.
Karen provided a useful guide to the house and surrounding area and was very supportive whenever we had questions. An excellent experience, we would definitely stay there again! Thanks!
Clean room, comfortable bed, great location in Williamsburg with easy parking and access to the subway. Everything I needed.

Robert is the best host I have ever met in airbnb. He's a very kind, helpful and caring person. The sofa bed is soft and comfortable. The apartment is close to the train station. Highly recommend traveller who wants to spend less in living.

Eli's home is beautiful and comfortable. She was very responsive and caring. We visited over the Holidays.  Everything worked well, wifi, TV, stove, heat etc. and was easy to adapt to.  We loved the neighborhood and the street is quiet and tree lined.  The living room was simply and beautifully decorated for the Holidays which we really appreciated.

Just two smallish complaints:
*Morning coffee: (we were 3 and definitely need that one cup on cold winter mornings).  There was only a Nespresso machine (yay!) but no capsules.  We checked in afternoon of Dec. 24th so no way to even buy capsules till the 26th.  We made due by buying coffee for a few days at a dinner and saving it in the frig to reheat.  Also, I drank my coffee out of a child's plastic mug since there were only dainty teacups in the house, and very few at that.  
*Shampoo etc: There was sufficient gel soap in the master bath (no bar soap) but only baby shampoos etc in the second bedroom.  The person sleeping there felt bad using up what little was left so we just shared back and forth every day.  A little inconvenient.  For such an elegant place one expects the small amenities to be standard in each bath.
Bottom line it's a great location and a stylish, comfortable home.  Just remember that the owner is French and the accommodations are in a European style.
Alex was a fantastic host. Very communicative and the place was clean and well maintained.

Wow we loved Oscar's place so much that we wanted to extend our stay longer. First, communication was very smooth and he welcomed us at the door at the arrival. His place was right near Subway F and G) so it was very convenient to get around. The apartment was very clean and simple. Decors were very pretty and romantic. We loved sitting down and chilling on the rug in the living room. PC was available to use for us so it would be very useful anyone who comes to visit NYC without one. I wish I could use the private backyard more but it was too cold to be outside since it's winter. I would love to stay his place again in summer for the lovely backyard and visiting Prospect Park. Strongly recommend his place to anybody!!
Place was great and the description was very accurate. The check in was super easy!
The space was clean and quiet, with working AC. It was conveniently close to Columbia, the market, and public transportation.

La ubicacion del hospedaje es conveniente, aunque ruidosa. Pero la habitacion solo tiene un colchon sobre una mini-tarima, no tiene una silla, ni una mesa. No esta acondicionada para  viajeros. 
Lo mas desagradable es la suciedad de los tendidos (beddings), el piso y la ducha. En el apartamento viven otras 4 personas y quien alquila la habitacion no vive alli. 
Sugiero que Airbnb establezca unos requisitos mi basicos que se deben asegurar por seguridad y respeto a los usuarios.

Josie's apartment was clean, cozy, and exactly as was described. It's very conveniently close to the subway, only a 2-3 minute walk. We enjoyed our stay very much and were very comfortable at Josie's place. Highly recommend as this is a great place at a great rate. Josie's also very flexible with check-in and check-out times which was great. Would love to stay here again someday!
The apartment is small but really cute. The arrangement of the daily things is also good. The bathroom maybe not enough for the guests of three bedrooms.
Thank you for the stay. We would definitely stay again. Location was great !

Sam (helping out with the AirBnb) is great! He let us come in and drop a few things off before the day before we moved in, which was super helpful. The place itself is clean and well-decorated, and through the bedroom is small it's easy to feel at home in the rest of the apartment. Also the location is fantastic!
Great location and beautiful apartment . Karin is warm and responsive. Couldn't ask for a better hostess
Amazing house and v nice housemates. Easy and relaxed stay
Nate is very accommodating host! He l

The place was clean, inexpensive, and in a place filled with friendly and helpful roommates. The neighborhood was as close to fun and convenience that I could ask for. It was my first time ever in NYC, and it was a splendid trip because of the accommodations I was provided with.
good location, good comunication
Wonderful location, very clean, private bathroom, kind rommmates!

Great place to relax in the City! Close to metro stations and a comfortable area. Nice neighbors and easy parking. 

Tanya was a great host and was very easy to get in contact with. The cats are sweet and the bed comfy!

Aishling's place is in a great location and very clean!  Everything was accurately described, and the check-in process couldn't have gone smoother.  Very easy to adjust temperature, comfy sheets/bedding, good-sized shower and showerhead, filtered water, and TV!  I will certainly try to stay here again next time I'm in town.
Husain is a great guy. Very nice and he even made sure we were happy by following up with us.

Melissa was a fantastic host. The room was spotless and a good size, and the apartment had a great vibe. Greenpoint is a great neighborhood.  Melissa was helpful throughout. I would definitely recommend.

Wow! we stayed at Arnaud's place for 6 nights and it was absolutely amazing. The room is really spacious and clean. The private bathroom was a really big bonus for us, and we felt like we have our own appartment. David the roommate and his girlfriend were really nice to us, and made us feel like home. We absolutely recommend it!
He set us up. He said that he will call back and he never did. Later he even ignored calls from airbnb. He don't deserve to be called a host.

The place is just great! Very well located, close to multiple subway stops, clean and the best part are the roommates,,, friendly and caring people. I had a great time staying here! Also the backyard was awesome for having a relax conversation outside

This place has been our home for the past few months. It is conveniently located nearby the subway which takes you all the way to Manhattan without having to change trains. 24/7! The place itself is quite spacious, we loved it and will miss our "home"!

Staying here is a truly special experience! It is so much more than a typical Airbnb. Diane is an amazing host from the moment you walk in: always offering coffee and food, kind and accommodating, and such a fun and interesting person to talk to! I had an amazing weekend staying here, and Diane even organized a jam session/party for me and several other guests. The house is beautiful, and the neighborhood felt safe and easy to navigate. I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone!
Great place, amazing dude, recommend to anyone! Very cool patio with a view too
Fabulous contemporary apartment.  5th floor patio is unbelievable.  Dan is a welcoming host.

Sanjay cancelled the day of arrival because his friend was coming for the weekend and he preferred to host him/her. It was a long weekend so the demand for places was very high and it was very difficult to find a place in such a short notice. 

Luckily I could find a place to stay, but one day of my vacations was ruined.

Jessie and Andy were so accommodating and helpful. They were also very easy to get a hold of for any questions. The apartment is in a great location, so close to Central Park and the buzzing 2nd Avenue. We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you so much again!!
This place is beautiful and a large space. Subway station is close in 5 munites by walking. Jennifer is very nice and kind! I really recommend this place!

Danielle is a fantastic host, the apt was lovely, clean and has good location.
I highly recommend Danielle as a host!

I had a satisfying,comfortable stay at Kristen's place for 10 days. Kristen is very helpful and friendly, tried to help me as much as she can, including received mail on behalf of me. Her room is not large but with beautiful decorations ,high-res TV , good wifi connection, green plants  and even a lovely small fish  .the apartment is shared with another two roommates and they are very nice people as well . Everything is good, but it is not recommended for people who wants to go manhattan within 30 minutes , as it takes about 16minutes walk to the closest C train station and then 11 stops to downtown manhattan.
Hosts were nice. Great location and close to public transportation.
Really enjoyed my stay

My firend's stay with Sasa and Marija was perfect. Their apartment is spacious and very clean, with a nice balcony overlooking a quiet street and subway just around the corner (a few stops to Manhattan). They were super friendly,  flexible and easy to communicate with. This was a rare find!

The apartment is beautiful and very well equiped with all the necesary stuff. The place was decorated with great taste. The location of the apartment is very good: you literally walk a few steps and you have a supermarket, the entrance to Prospect Park and also the Parkside metro station (Q line, direct to manhattan). Jesse was a very good host. We loved the house manual :)
Very accommodating and clean room, would love to stay again when I'm back in Portland
Johnny's place is really comfortable, clean and conveniently located. There were tons of restaurants, bars, yoga studios and things to do nearby! Would definitely book again.

Bohyun was very nice and kind.
I also liked the location of this house and I would visit again if I need to.
Great apartment and hosts!  Ideal location in the LES -- easy walking distance from subways, the East River, Chinatown, and the East Village.  I would definitely stay here again.

A great, cute and clean apartment, in a good and friendly neighborhood, close to transportation.
Klaudia is a great hostess, with whom there was always excellent communication.
Fully recommended

Laura was a very kind and fantastic host! The place was very classy! Plenty of space. The rooftop was really nice to have lunch with a beautiful view. Place was stocked with just about everything you need including the kitchen! Overall great experience. Laura was also fast to reply.

Kat's place was a great, simple space with easy access to transportation and all necessities.  Fantastic communication and easy check in and check out. I would recommend staying at Kat's place for easy travel out and about the city.
Great place to crash for a busy weekend trip. Minka was very nice!

Our stay couldn't have been more amazing! The apartment was clean and the location was perfect! I stayed with three people total (including myself) and it was a great space for all of us! I would even say roomy for the three of us. Heidi was awesome and had great books and plays for us to read. Highly recommend this air b n b. Super close to the L train which can get you anywhere!

Your condo is just spectacular!  For Manhattan the space was larger (and felt even larger with the great windows) than anything we expected.   The views and changes in light were magnificent.   We loved the location and exploring your part of the city.  Our unusually warm November weather enabled us to be on the balcony taking many photos.  It was both relaxing and exhilarating to be in your unit.
This host did not respond to us for 3 days and only then she told us she doesn't need any guests. She left us scrambling to find a different place the night before our trip.
The room is well located, easy to reach the underground,supermarkets,shops...everything.the area is safe day and night.the room is nice and bright.shakeira is kind and helpful.super recommended:)

Alex was accommodating and responsive, but non-invasive and respectful. The space was perfectly located for a stay in Manhattan, with easy accessibility to the subway and plenty of local dining, shopping and recreational facilities. At the same time, it offered a private and homely escape from the cold and chaos of tourist traps in other parts of the city. I have not experienced better value accommodation option on my travels abroad.

Easy to get to with a cab from Newark or JFK airports (around 1 hour and between 60 - 80 US dollars one way) but guests should make sure to ask cab drivers if they have the WAZE app to avoid too much traffic and get to the flat location relatively fast. This flat was neat, a good size and has everything a guest needs: air conditioning (a must for NY in the summer time), small but useful kitchen, fridge/freezer (important for me, for medication), Apple TV/Netflix (which helped on days I was not well and couldn't do any tourism), towels and bed linen and two lifts to the 6th floor. I liked this flat location because it was 4 minutes walk to my appointments as well as being right next to Central Park (2 mins walk), the Metropolitan Museum (16 mins), the Guggenheim (24 mins), a supermarket for basic needs e.g. bottled water, breakfast cereal, milk etc (Food Emporium, not the best for fresh foods like fruit, vegetables and meat - 8 mins), a Whole Foods store (better for fresh, organic fruit and vegetables etc. - 19 mins), a pharmacy (Metro pharmacy - 6 mins) and two subway stations to all the necessary tourist places (6 mins or 15 mins). Some things to note that will help your stay: 1) make sure you ask if the flat has been cleaned before you arrive, 2) make sure your international credit cards are functioning (the Metro pharmacy only swipes the cards and does not allow a chip insertion). If you need to unblock your card and are calling an international 24hr number, make sure you use "+" instead of "00" before the country code of your country to reach your credit card customer services. 3) Make sure that you change your currency to US dollars in your own country because both the airports and exchange bureaus in town are super expensive! 4) Food quality: I am used to Swiss/European standards of food so it was difficult to find 'normal' or good tasting fresh fruit, vegetables or meat. I also would recommend, if you are a coffee lover (bring your own instant coffee if you cannot make it fresh). In general food is very expensive with poorer quality than in Switzerland so be prepared to either eat out or cook expensive ingredients. 5) Subway passes: if you are staying a week or more, the best would be to get a 1 week subway pass (34 US dollars) that can be 'charged' so keep the card, it can be re-used. 6) rental cars for travel in other cities or states: it is better to travel by cab/taxi to Newark airport or JFK to get a rental car (70 US dollars per day instead of 120 from the middle of NY) from there than getting one in the city. All rental car companies want to see a credit card even if you have already paid online. Everything is paid by credit card (more than...
Great place, great location, great host ; no elevator

My stay was perfect, and exactly what I was looking for.  I wanted a quiet room where I could study for a seminar that I was attending. She had roommates, but our schedules didn't align, so I was usually there by myself. 

Room that I rented was small and clean with a window that I felt comfortable leaving open for the fresh air. She provided linens and towels. 

The shared spaces were accessible, but shared with roommates and their stuff, so reminded me a bit of when I was in college and my mid 20's.  Didn't bother me at all, but is something that future renters might want to know. 

Great value for the location, and as I said, perfect for what I was looking for. Sarah was a great host!
Shen was a great host he always provided us with with anything we needed and kept the place neat and clean. 5 stars
Stay was as expected!   Location was perfect.

The communication was always easy and the hosts were very friendly and helpful in every situation. The apartment and the location were as described. There are ACs in livingroom and bedroom. It takes ca. 35 mins to get to World Trade Center by subway (E train). We felt comfortable in this apartment.

All in all a clear recommendation!
Johanna was very quick to respond to any texts.  Very accommodating and easy to coordinate arrivals and departure times.  Apartment was clean and a great location for us.
It's a good, quiet location. That's all I needed.

This place was outstanding! It was in great condition and advertised accurately. Peter and Maria provided very quick responses every time I messaged them from the time we booked our stay until we checked out of their home. Just about anything one might hope to find in an AirBnB was in this apartment! The only thing that I would suggest future guests to bring is wash cloths. Towels and hand towels were provided, but there were no wash cloths. I would stay here again without a single hesitation!

I couldn't check in at Faith's place. I call her before I reached to her place, she told me not to show up, and added that she is not aware of my arrival, and mentionned that she did not confirmed my travel. I indicated that the booking was instant and she said that she checked out her bank account and has not seen any money there. She indicated that she removed herself from airbnb web site, and concluded that she is rehabilitating the appartment and cannot accommodate anyone.

Eva's place is so cool! It's in a great area with a surprising amount of street parking. There's a cool area just blocks away to go grab some dinner and it's within walking distance of Prospect Park! The room was perfect for a short business trip in NYC and had an amazing back deck to get some fresh air. I would highly recommend staying with Eva next time you plan on traveling to Brooklyn!

I had an excellent experience at Tesa's apartment. Both her and the other (Hidden by Airbnb) were absolutely fantastic, id repeat without any hesitation. Theyre chilled and fun. The apt its located in the heart of Lower East Side, one of the best neighborhoods of manhattan , its a the modern building with a small rooftop. The house aint huge but its well designed so doesn't seem small (4br -2ba). It was one of my best airbnb experiences. Go there!

Betsy's place is exactly what I wanted for my stay in New York City. The location is perfect. I could walk everywhere I wanted to go. The street is located in a lively neighborhood but the apartment is very quite! The apartment is very spacious and clean. The room is everything I expected and more. I will definitely stay at Betsy's place again next time I am in NYC!
The place is really artsy and comfortable! The others tenants are very nice and helpful. David was a great host and I highly recommend booking with him!

Nice apartment in a quiet and residential area (some noise from the street at nigt due to circulation but nothing really annoying during our stay), Alayna was easy to contact and gave us all the information before our arrival, she made our check-in very easy. 
Due to MTA work the closest subway station was closed but buses were available or subway was 12min by walking.
Our only concern was about sheets and bath rug, it didn't look like they have been changed.
Very nice house. Perfect for small family. Landlords are great people, easygoing. Nice neighborhood for running and walking. Next to highway. Recommend!!
Great little apartment close to everything. Melanie is a great host and made everything easy. Thank you!
Great place, safe neighborhood close to a subway station. Would stay again. Highly recommended.

Great place to stay! 

Easy access to the metro system, the neighborhood had plenty to do as well. Free parking on the street was a plus. We kept the car there the entire stay and just used the metro system for the rest of our trip. I would stay here again.

Emily's place was an absolutely gorgeous place with rooftop views that are spectacular. It was a very cozy stay. The only bad thing about this trip was the area that we were in offered no street parking at the time we arrived and we were forced to pay for a parking garage near by. This parking garage ruffled through our vehicle and extra bags during the 2 nights we paid for. Please arrive during the day to ensure street parking is available to you infront of this location. Also, please confirm with Emily that her bed is fixed before booking as we paid a pretty pricey amount to sleep on a broken and squeaky bed. Otherwise, stay was great and host was amazing with snacks, cold brews and toiletries provided to us. Emily was also great with communication, suggestions and directions for us.

The place was as pictured. I was a little surprised to find no wash cloths, soap, or paper towels/napkins in the house and had to make extra trips for these. The host did respond promptly when i had difficulty connecting to the wifi.
Location great and apartment nice. Hosts we're not there to check me in
Sarah was very friendly and was responsive to my questions.  The place was well located, fairly clean and had all the necessities.

Right price, easy for large groups, the host communicates and is flexible. It's also steps to subway line. It was an easy experience, which is nice because traveling with a large group can be difficult.
The apartment is very close to the metro and it's easy to get to central Manhattan. It is a big room with an AC.

The hosts are very friendly and treat me with respect. Property is clean, spacious, and convenient, specially the subway to downtown Manhattan is a short walk away. This is definitely a place I will return to.
Amazing place! Perfect for a weekend getaway
Nice location It's very interesting place.

We sadly didn't see Andrew as he was away but he was really helpful. He gave us great tips of things to check out in his neighbourhood.
The room was fine but the apartment could have used a bit more cleaning.
The place was beautiful! It was better then we even expected from service to cleanliness I felt like I was at a 5 star hotel.
Good apartment for a short stay in NYC!

The only thing that was good about this spartment is the fact that it is private.  The place is not properly kept. Things constantly breaks and host does not address issues promptly (for example fridge broke down and it took host almost 3 weeks to bring a mini fridge that was suppose to be temporary and this was after getting airbnb customer service involved. Still didn't get the full size fridge when I left) and part of the apartment gets flooded when it rains heavily. The bed in incredibly uncomfortable (old and torn up). I would not recommend this place to anyone

Edgar's place was perfect! The apartment was extremely nice and quiet and located very close to the subway. This made getting into lower Manhattan very easy with a quick 25min quiet ride. If you get a chance, try the Deli located outside the subway stop near the apartment. They make amazing breakfast sandwiches and have great coffee!

The apartment and room were both nice and as expected based on photos, plus easy access from subway.  However, the ad failed to divulge that the room is less than 10 feet (~2 meters) from the speakers of the night club next door, which thumped until 4am on both nights of our stay.  The second night was NYE, but the first night was an otherwise unremarkable saturday, so is presumably typical for that night of the week (as confirmed by schedule gleaned from club's (Hidden by Airbnb) feed).  If not for having been reduced to 2 hours' sleep per night, I would happily recommend the room.
Wonderful. Great location.
Best location in Manhattan. Great host.
Very clean and comfortable. Kermen is really nice, so are her roommates. Very enjoyable experience.
Esther's place is quite cute and she has friendly roommates. Its a great neighborhood and close to everything. I would check out the local supermarket basically across the street. Great job Esther!!
Alexa's place was lovely. It was in a quiet little neighbourhood and right by the water, it was beautiful. The apt was small and clean, perfect for a short stay.
The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The Wynham is a very nice place to stay at. The room is just like a hotel room, but does not have a view of anything besides a generator and is only on the 3rd floor. The host advertised free parking however, the Wyndham did not have any free parking and I ended up having to pay for daily parking I'm addition to what I had already paid through air BNB! I tried contacting the owner about it but they were not reachable. Without free parking this would not have been my first choice for my stay in NYC.  The staff at the Wyndham are great and very helpful and the room was clean.

Be very careful parking, especially at night. Also, you have to go up two steep flights of stairs, so be aware if carrying lots of bags. Communication was great and the host left a bottle of Prosecco for us.

The apartment it's like in the foto, big and nice a little bit in disorderly. Andrius is very nice and helpful, he will help you if you need! The place it's in Harlem, not a beautiful neighborhood but you have 2 metro at 5 min walk and Central Park at 3 min
We stay for 17 nights. The location is perfect, extremely close to the Central Park and to the subway. The neighborhood is very quiet. We had great vacations!

Great place to visit New York, the apartment is small but is equipped with everything you need, is near to public transportation and is located in a wonderful area. Ash is a very precise and kind host
Had a great stay!

Ethan was a great host. My flight arrived earlier in the day and he was very understanding and allowed us to check in before the scheduled check in time. The apartment guide provided was very informative and we especially appreciated the list of restaurants and other suggested activities. The apartment was great, as seen in photos. Very clean and lots of natural light. The backyard was nice and we were able to watch Netflix with the projector in the living room. It was very close to the train so transportation was easy and we were able to get to the city quickly. We also loved the neighborhood and felt very safe. Would definitely recommend/stay again!
Andrew was a great host, though I never met him he was always in touch and accommodating. Great room for the price.
Great stay!
All my roommates are my age and everyone gets along really well.
Awesome place in a great neighborhood. The views of Manhattan from the living room, bedroom, and rooftop are breathtaking. Close to public transportation also!
Great host, great area, great experience.
Clean and beautiful place. The host is amazing. Neighborhood is a bit shady.

Alba offers an awesome place, located on the 3rd floor and in a super convenient neighborhood surrounded by stores, laundry mat, delicious food... we stayed here for ezoo and the uber to randall island took 12 min wich is super convenient.  The place is super clean, my bf and I slept on the single bed with no problem, had a bunk bed in the second room and a huge sofa bed that can easilly fit 2 people in the living room. Alba was super communocative and helpful! Cant wait to visit again!

Great location-  Lots of places in walking distance and the park is across the street which is another plus. Street parking was easily accessible.
Remember its a 5th floor walk up so get ready for some exercise! I enjoyed the back in the day ambiance!

Perfect if you want a bit more quiet place to stay but still want to visit different places in New York City. Subway very close and just a few stops from Manhattan. Very friendly roommate of host and adorable kitten!

The apartment is well located because is close to some subway stations and bus stop. It is nice, clean and confortable. It is a little noisy because of the heater, but you get accustomed.
Hannah is a great hostess because since the beginning we stood in communication and she always was ready to help me. Also she made a good and interesting itinerary for me. Thanks to that I could enjoy my trip.

Rob's apartment was everything I wanted, and more. The check in process was incredibly smooth and Rob's roommates were so helpful and nice. The room had incredible natural light and lovely wooden floors. The kitchen and living room were also very comfortable and clean. I was able to get so much work done at the house as well as the two coffee shops located within a block of the house. The internet speeds were amazingly fast. The location was super close to the G train and was very easy to travel into the Manhattan as well around Brooklyn. I highly suggest staying at Rob's place when visiting Brooklyn or Manhattan!
this man is retard
Charlene is a very friendly and helpful person and here place is clean, and in a quite, beautiful part of Brooklyn! Had an awesome time in New York City! We would recommend it!

Beautiful apartment in a great location.  Zoe was helpful from the week before my stay through the day that I left.  She offered up tons of suggestions for places to eat in the neighborhood, and those that I had time to hit were spot-on (Sunny and Annie's Deli is now on my list of go-to places when in NYC).  If you're looking for a place to stay in Manhattan, look no further.

I stay 8 days on Alex place and love to stay there again, nice house with big kitchen which makes you more comfortable same like your own home, train subway, grocery shop and restaurant is just few step walk from house which not make you tired and very easy to access.

We loved this place. Having the Christmas tree and all the lights lit up on arrival was lovely. The apartment is really nice and has everything you might need. Location is great for getting about too, very close to the subway with a direct line to Manhattan.
Lisa was a great host. Her place felt like my home away from home. I would definitely stay there again.
The place was perfect for my needs.  The host was gracious and was available, although I didn't need anything.  I would stay again.
Awesome location

Puja was a great host and gave us fantastic recommendations for spots around the area. 
The apartment is very clean and stylish and is perfect for 3/4 guests.
I would highly suggest this place to anyone visiting NY!
Gustaf is very kind and helpful person. He communicates well with you. Thank you Gustaf!
Mark is friendly and quick to respond all questions.  The apartment was clean and relaxing and quiet. Beautiful building with amenities and convenient location. Highly recommend!
The room gets the job done, public transportation is only a 15 minute away. Place was nice and clean and great communication from the host.

Apartment is great and location is unbeatable! Very clean spacious room with a balcony, apartment is really cool and has a great kitchen. Ben is a great host and we were able to communicate throughout my entire stay. Highly recommend!
Communication was super easy, checking in and leaving was a breeze. Prime location too, will stay there again

Ari's place is one the most real Airbnb experiences we have had so far, we felt like we were in one our friends or relative's home.  The area is full of restaurants and bars and very close to public transportation. I wouldn't recommend his place to families due to his piano.

Cassia's home is absolutely beautiful, comfortable, and in a wonderful area of New York. I've been to a lot of Airbnbs, but this was definitely one of the nicest I've stayed at. Cassia was lovely, responded quickly and always generous with offering help and sharing her space. I would 100% stay here again if I ever find myself in the city!

We loved our stay at Rachel's apartment ! It's ideally located, in the heart of East Village and is particularly lovely, with a lot of sunlight. The red bricks in the wall give it a quintessentially New York-esque style. Rachel was very helpful and available prior to our arrival and definitely helped make our stay perfect. Don't hesitate to book there!

The appartment was great. Very stylish room with all you need. The building is modern with an amazing rooftop, gym and lobby. Close to the subway station M,J,Z (3min) and supermarkets. Remonia was a wonderful host, who manage everything momentarily.

Isi was a great host. She was attentive and recommended places to eat around the area. The room was simple with a bed and closet which was perfect for me. The room because it is close to the street did get noisier in the day but in the evenings it was fine and the AC masked the noise. Main area was warm and welcoming as well.

Anastasia's apartment is in a great location, easy to walk to different parts of the city. We arrived and Anastasia gave us the keys and collected them in the morning. It was very smooth and hassle free! Comfy bed and a great place to stay for a night if you are taking a short trip to NYC. Anastasia was lovely.
Apartment was very well prepared and check-in was smooth. Surbhi is an amazing host. Easy to contact and always there if you need a help. I strongly recommend.
Place is decent
Nice and clean accommodations
Great location, excellent transport links into the city. I would definitely stay here again - lovely house mate that made sure had everything I could need.
Great economical place to stay. Close to the train, 5 min walk to Central Park, great restaurants, and much more. The host are great. Highly recommend for others.

It was a nice place , nice house decoration, comfortable bed , good wifi connection , right beside the metro , however the neighboorhood wasnt very homey at night  and the train passing at night was a bit of a distrubance , but the people in the nieghboorhood are very helpful and nice when asking for dircetions and the neighboorhood is convinent because there is everything around and perinille was very welcoming and very fast at answering are questions
Good location ideal
Loved the place and musician vibe. Spent a few days just playing the piano and listening to albums. Dope place with an awesome vibe.
Good location , great view from the garden rooftop
Very conveniently located. Right by Central Park, and right by the subway. Joshua was very responsive as well.
Clean home. Close to pharmacy, restaurants and metro. Thanks

Jamie's place is in an amazing location, and has everything you'd need for a single person or a couple.
Jamie is *very* responsive and helped me with everything.
Harald was very accommodating, room was clean. Great neighborhood close to manhattan.
Good location. Host was very nice and respectful.

Great location and price. Great up and coming location in Harlem right next to police station so safety was never a concern. Plenty of food and grocery options within a 10 minutes walk. Train station is within a 7 minute walk on 125th.  5th floor with no elevator made me realize how out of shape I was. Room is clean with personal AC so it was perfect. Kitchen has everything you need. Roommates keep to themselves, but are also very helpful if you have any questions. Definitely would stay again
Great location in Chinatown and close to downtown

Such a chill place and host. Walking distance to places to eat or quick shopping. Also the place was very clean and tidy. Great big window with great sunlight! Also the host was very helpful explaining any questions

Lely and Igor were the absolutly the best hosts we could have ever ask for they went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure our stay was the most presurable. I would stay with them again anytime and strongly recommend them for a stay in New York at simply the best possible location.

Lovely spacious apartment but experience let down by the details:

- second bedroom lacks privacy with glass doors
- hosts made no space for us in cupboards wardrobes etc despite us staying for seven nights 
- bathroom shower quickly clogged and we had to buy unblocker
- we had to receive a large delivery for the host unpack and refrigerate the contents of some of the boxes  
- the host got upset when we had a delivery made to the apt of it own
- had to look after a needy cat that broke into second bedroom every night as well as water plants (we agreed to this before staying to be fair)

None of these issues in isolation would be a problem but cumulatively we were left with the impression we were paying a premium price to cat sit for friends who had to leave their apt in a rush. Just generally felt a bit sloppy. Perhaps it's their first time so I hope they'll improve the experience for future guests

Mayer was so helpful and quick to respond. I had issues with turning on the shower. Very friendly over the phone also. My friends and I thoroughly enjoyed our mini-vacay scheduled at the last minute.  I would stay again.
Kathy was great to deal with. Excellent communication. The apartment is small but clean and functional- comfortable bed and everything you need or want is within a block. Great location!
Price was great; the spot was great. Thank you!

Lauren was very kind and easy to communicate with. A very lovely home in a beautiful community with alot of options for food and nightlife. It was also very close to the train which was amazingly convenient. I would recommend Lauren's place to anyone.

Christian's place is very clean and is furnished well. It's a big apartment with two nice bathrooms. Christian's roommates were all very friendly and they kept the place quiet at night. The view from our room was great that you could see a beautiful neighborhood. This area is quite safe and quiet in Brooklyn. Besides, Christian has been very helpful and the communication with him was very effective. We got everything we needed. We love our stay and would totally recommend it!

The apartment is in a quiet street in a clean building. Plenty of restaurants at the end of the street. Communication is very easy with Pierre and he is always helpful. Street parking possible during night, and public parking across the street (price ok).
Amazing location and view. Bret was helpfull and easy to communicate with. Would book again.
Very nice host, good neighborhood around some great restaurants and the apartment was nice and spotless
The location is awesome. Apartment was big and there was plenty of room to move around. Bathrooms were huge and modern.

We stayed at this room for 3 nights, locations is great! It is located in the heart of Williamsburg, you have lots of places to eat and drink, even if you want a bit after midnight, room is spacious , super close from subway Bedford station, only one stop away from manhattan, we recommend this place !

Zach and Joe were great at communication and flexibility with our requests. The location/place was very accurately described, along with the pics. Good selection of restaurants, and grocery stores w/n walking distance. Very nice and open air apartment. The placed hosted my friends and I very comfortably. We enjoyed our stay, and will def be back!
Paco was such a great host! He always helped me when I need it. The place was perfect, it counts with all you need. I really recommend to stay here!

Staying at Caleb's was a great experience! Super convenient location and easy to find! Caleb and his roommates were very hospitable and made sure we had everything we needed. Was also an amazing price for a weekend stay in New York City. Would definitely recommend!

I spent 2 nights at Lola's place. The apartment was clean and tidy. Lola was very friendly, hospitable and caring. I had a furnished and quiet private room with all necessities. I would highly recommend this place.

Charmine is a great host! She was super helpful and flexible. The house is very big and comfortable. Everything is new including the kitchen which is absolutely beautiful. We loved to be able to cook our New Year's eve dinner with all the amenities as we were at home. The nearest subway station is just 5 minutes away and there is lots of supermarkets around. We definitely had a lovely holiday vacation with the whole family.

Had a great time in NYC and Andrew made things much easier. Has spend whole day long walking and showing me the best what NYC can offer. 

Thank you Andrew for great time, 
all the best! 
S.
Great location and beautiful apartment, our dog loved the gated backyard garden. Cassidy was quick to respond to our questions and was flexible with our changing plans. Highly recommend!
Great host! I recommend the place!

Shane and his housmates Ken and Emily were very kind, smart and were always there for us when we needed help or information about restaurants and shopping.  The room was clean and we felt very good staying at his house. We recommend   to spend your new york trip in Brooklyn at Shane. We loved it there!!

Ariana was a great host! The apartment was nice, in a quiet area. Ariana wasn't home, but she communicated really well with us and her roommates were also helpful. The bedroom is clean and organized, perfect space for 1 or 2. The private bathroom was a big plus!! 10/10 would stay again (:

Super cute studio in a really nice neighbourhood. The view from the end of the street looking over to manhatton is beautiful. Annie is a perfect host, answering all of my dumb questions super fast.
And the bed really is that comfy. Beautiful.
Best location , and... best location.
Zuri was very nice and respectful. Made my stay very comfortable.

One of my favorite Airbnb stays ever -- the place is super cute and in the perfect location. Zach was really accommodating and kind, and his two cats were the sweetest. Loved staying here and would do it again in a heartbeat!
Jack was a great host, and he was really quick with his responses.
I loved the room, very clean and nice. Close to trains and shops. The host and her roomies are amazing beautiful people. I highly recommend anyone to visit. I'd definitely visit again
This apartment is reasonably close to public transportation into the city. Great value for the accommodation. Very spacious and clean. We were able to sleep a big group with no issues.
Great value and nice host. Remember to say hi to the lovely cat
Very nice host. Happy I could book this at the last minute and be welcomed past 11pm. A bit expensive for the location.

This was a great place to stay for a weekend in Brooklyn! A good sized room with public transportation less then a block away! Fantastic hosts and were very flexible with us coming in and out of the home. Thank you so much for a great stay!

Hod and his family were great hosts. They were really responsive to any questions that I had and the quick response time was appreciated. They also helped us by providing a document that described things to do around. They emptied drawers in the different rooms so that we could use them. The apartment was really nice and perfect for my family reunion :)
Spacious, comfortable and with a fantastic view. Emily, a good hostess, always replies quickly and with empathy. I hope come back to NYC and her apartment as well! Recommend it!
We had a great experience. The beds were comfy and the place is very roomy. It was a convenient locating and just what we were wanting. I would def stay here again. Thank you!

Nice apartment in a great area. Steps from the Subway and access to everything in Manhattan and only a block from Central Park. Checking in and out is easy and any issues or questions you have are answered promptly. Would highly recommend staying here.

Everything was great! Love the neighborhood and Fabien was friendly, helpful, and welcoming. Very quiet for sleeping (I didn't even need my earplugs), considering it's only blocks from the bustle of Greenpoint. Convenient location and nice, stylish apartment.

Lina was very accommodating in every way possible! We had an issue with our original apartment, having to find a new place the night before. Lina went above and beyond to make sure we got what we needed and was very flexible with both,check-in and checkout time. Her Apartment is not only beautiful but is in great location and easy to get to!

Zev has an amazing space right in the heart of Williamsburg. Had a going away party here and everyone thought the space was incredible. It's hard to find a place to rent out for small parties that isn't crazy expensive, and this place was not only affordable, but so much better and a more unique environment than a bar. Can't recommend it enough!
A fantastic place to stay in the heart of LES
In the heart of Williamsburg, the location was perfect. The kids room was also a huge plus. We would definitely stay here again

Excellent location, and the check in process is a breeze! The place feels very much like a traditional hotel, and the staff is very responsive and helpful. We needed band aids one night and the staff promptly responded over the phone and helped with whatever we needed.

While the floor was a little dirty (we found used socks!) and the toilet had some hair, the room is very nice and the amenities (microwave, fridge, coffee maker, etc) were much appreciated. Very easy walk to Grand Central subway station, which was super useful

Nice music and decoration. Holly's friend Sophia took care of me and she's been super helpful! Lots of restaurants and supermarkets (and funny stores) in the neighbourhood. A bit far from downtown but it is only 5 min walk to subway station where you can go downtown in 30-40 min. The only bad thing during my stay: Holly's bed was so comfortable that I never got up before 10. Thank you all!

The space is conveniently located near the subway, making it easy to travel to Manhattan. Prospect Park is literally footsteps away from the apartment, making for a great AM jog. The decor is simple and exciting. I would like to thank the host for providing such a clean space and for making checking in simple, even though I booked last minute.
Very nice apartment, in a good location! Rachel was very very nice and acomidating!

Maxime's place is unbeatable for the price and what it has to offer. It is located in a quiet street, but extremely close to some of the best spots in the LES such as  coffee shops, bars, restaurants, etc. The apartment is also located on the top floor of a brand new condominium and there is a huge balcony facing east. Communication with the host was very easy and quick. Thank you so much for a very pleasant stay!
Helene is really responsive, helpful, and warm. It's a great pleasure to live in Helene's apartment.
Very Nicely designed, clean and very comfortable. Very well appointed and spacious by nyc standards. Updated kitchen and convenient location. A winner! Nice building, too!

This is a beautiful home with a gracious and welcoming host. The neighborhood is quiet and lovely with tree-lined streets of brownstone homes. Lots of nearby restaurants and just a 5 minute walk to the subway -  25 minutes to midtown Manhattan. I enjoyed my brief stay very much.
Great location. Comfortable apartment. I'd stay again.
Frank was really nice and easy to deal with. His roomate Ronnie was also very helpful. The place is nice, clean and very well located. I would recommend to anyone.

Of all the Airbnbs I have stayed at, this one was by far the best. It was extremely nice, spacious for a NYC apartment, and very clean. Michael was very communicative and made both the check-in and check-out process very easy. His place is centrally located, with easy access to public transportation and plenty of restaurants and bars. I definitely would stay here again in the future.
I really enjoyed my stay here. The room was comfortable and quiet. Great value.

Jesse was a great host! The location and the room was just as described. He was quick to respond to any questions I had and even accommodated for a late check out. I would definitely stay here when I'm back in NYC. Thanks again!
I would definitely stay here again.
Great location, great communication before and during stay, great price. I had a lovely time here and would definitely recommend this!

Sharmeen was very pacient waiting for us, for late check-in, to give welcome and instructions. Apartment is very well located, close to metro, calm neighborhood. Apartment has great space on living room, with cabinets for those who sleeps on couch, that's big and comfortable for two. There are cabinets on the bedroom too and kitchen accessories for eating on apartment. She was flexible on check-out due to agenda and i got extra hours to enjoy last day and take a shower before going to the airport. Thanks a lot Sharmeen!! If i return to NYC with 3 or 4 guests for a week, certaintly i'll stay there again.
This was a great stay. Perfect amount of space for just myself and my girlfriend. Central Park is right up the street. Train station a few minutes away. Super convenient.
Nice and quite spot in a very nice neighborhood. Plenty of place to see/eat all within walking distance.

Kath's place is ideal for tourism in NYC: close itself to interesting places including of course Chinatown, but also the lower East side, Brooklyn, Wall St, the Staten Island ferry. If you have to go further away there are lots of options for metro close by. The space itself was nice: clean and tidy, with comfortable common room and beds. Finally, Kath was a highly responsive and communicative host, and as well sent us a very helpful set of suggestions of interesting places to go for food and drink in the neighborhood. We'd repeat again!

Shaye's apartment was really great and I had a pleasant stay. 
I reached at her place very late in the night, but she was really great to put the keys in a lock box and sending me pics of the same so that I had no trouble to get into the apartment at late hours. She was super responsive over texts all the time and left me suggestions about the nearby places to hang about and notes about the subway trains that takes you to the NYC attractions.

Leslie's apartment is wonderfully situated, comfortable, and very clean. The location is fantastic, and the view is amazing. It is a studio apartment and on the smaller side, but it is well laid out and very comfortable. Leslie was amazingly responsive and helpful throughout our stay. We look forward to staying there again!

A great location on a busy street with many restaurants and amenities within close proximity.  The apartment was clean and a reasonable size for Manhattan.  While the apartment is two bedrooms, future guests should be aware that the two bedrooms are connected such that you need to walk through the one bedroom to get to the common areas including the kitchen and bathroom (unless you go outside the apartment and walk around to the other door).
Shuk-Yee's place was really comfortable and convenient for us. She was very communicative from the very and made us feel welcome. I would definitely stay here if I'm in and around NYC next time.

I love Connie's place because of the location. She was 38 minutes away from Manhattan through one train ride. Her neighborhood area was very Lively if you walked a couple blocks over into the more restaurant area. She was close to a convenience store and the train.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Rahul was a great host, great and fast communication and no issues whatsoever.

The pictures don't do justice to this space. It doesn't show the cozy living room or dining space! The bedroom, bathroom and all common living spaces were really clean, which was great! We were out most of the time but it was a nice place to come back to for the night. This place was a steal for the NYE weekend! Really close to the 4 line, gated house and parking. Pedro was a great host. He was readily available if and when we needed him, and was sweet enough to leave us a holiday gift!

A clean and modern room with privacy on a reasonably quiet street, very conveniently close to subway transit and neighbourhood amenities. Great value for an individual or quiet couple needing a home base to explore Brooklyn and Manhattan.

Super clean, newly renovated apartment a couple of blocks from either the Dekalb or Myrtle stops in super-trendy Bushwick. Variety Coffee is a short walk, as are the bars and restaurants around Jefferson and Troutman. A few blocks the other direction on Wykoff gets you a CVS, Duane Reade, Starbucks, etc. 

1 and 1/2 bathrooms is a big plus too.

The place is located really close to the scenic GW Bridge and Red Little Lighthouse. It takes a bit to get downtown but subway, grocery stores and restaurants are really close by. The place itself is really spacious, clean and overall beautiful. We had a good stay, got good rest. Big thumbs up!

The location of Alex's place is perfect and the room is actually a little more spacious than it looks in the pictures. Comfy bed and a good value option for New York. The room is downstairs and it can feel a little dark and dingy at times, but the common areas are bright and breezy. I didn't get to meet Alex but his roommate was really nice and check in was very convenient.

Everything at Charlotte's was spectacular. The best part about the apartment was definitely the location; wasn't loud and had easy access to public transport and Uber. Everything was very neat and clean and was everything that we were looking for. The heater was also an awesome plus, it heated up the apartment so fast especially as soon as we walked through the door. Charlotte was easy to communicate with and made sure that everything was in perfect condition when we arrived. Would totally book this place again next time we're in the city!

I didn't meet Natalie in person but the commutation was very easy via (Hidden by Airbnb) . The appartement was clean and is very cozy. The appartement is also very close to the subway station. I would definitely recommend to stay at Natalie's appartement.

The best location in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. Few steps from the subway and Bedford Av. 
We had a very pleasant stay.

A beautiful haven of comfort in a nice neighborhood of Brooklyn. Close to downtown Brooklyn and a block from the subway to Manhattan.  Immaculately clean. Full kitchen & internet. On a street of coffeeshops, gift shops, bars, and restaurants, everything is there.  Three blocks from Trader Joes.  
Meghan gave us her space and we felt like we lived there, right at home. She always responded quickly.  Comfortable bed.  Well equipped kitchen.  Comfortable couches.

I would never book again this apartment!
The worst experience I ever had with airbnb.
I had to wait 3 hours to get in apartment.
The housekeeper was not available.
The mobile phone was off.
I had to write emails to get any information how I can get into the apartment.
And they were not friendly ! 
So I had to get to an hostel (which was my best decision) but I lost more money one day !!!! And a lot of stress in my vacation !! Thanks Yechiel 
BTW I didn't get any answer to email 
And even not a sorry 
Thanks for this experience

Staying at Zachary's place felt like a home away from home. It was a cozy, yet spacious room for us to crash for the night. Our hosts Zachary and his girlfriend made us feel very welcome, while also giving us plenty of privacy. The space is awesomely close to the subway station, which is always a big plus. It was a great place to stay!

Karl and the apartment were outstanding. 

He stayed up to accommodate our late arrival and frequently checked in to make sure that our trip was going well. Apartment was very inviting and clean. Would definitely stay here again without hesitation. Quick walk to the FREE ferry which has a departure for Manhattan every 30mins and runs 24/7.
Tim was responsive and friendly.

Amazing place (especially for the price), so bright and comfortable and clean. Excellent amenities (tv, Sonos Bluetooth, etc). Lovely cats with great personalities. The subway is very close by, and there is an excellent donut shop across the street. 

Brooke is a wonderful host- great communication, friendly, and accommodating. 

A++++++++++++
Great place! Easy to communicate with owners and great location.
Fantastic Property

I had a great stay with Hannah! She's super cool and friendly, plus lives in a good location, a few mins from the subway about about 35-50 mins to most of New York, depending on where you'd want to go. She gave me one of the most thorough explanations about her apartment, which was really helpful. A couple of things to note, she's on the 4th floor and there's no elevator (if climbing stairs is an issue for you) Also, her place is best suited for a solo traveler, as the bed is a fold down sofa, but could work for a couple but might be tight.

Communication with Micah was perfect, he is very flexible. His place is nice and the neighborhood is fun and full of restaurants and things to do. Their a lot you can visit by foot.
Main bed is too small for two people but their is an additional blowup bed.
I definitely would recommend.
Great apt! Very cozy

The flat is nice in a nice aera with shop and bars at walking distance and only 20 minutes by subway to the heart of Manhattan.The owner was kind and he kept our luggages for all the day, no problem for check in. The only thnig to improve is that the flat should be clean more often especially the toilet because is shared with other guests.

Astoria very safe and peaceful neighbourhood. Amazing options of restaurants and shops around the apartment. Cosmin is a very toughtful host he is perfect in communication and solving problems. His place is clean and organized. Beds are comfortable, there is a balcony could be used for a coffee break. Subway station is just 2min walking distance and transportation at night time is easy no problems. Manhattan Times Square is just 15mins to the apartment so it was quite easy to travel touristic places in NYC. And one more benefit is Astoria has good prices in shops and restaurants than Manhattan. Thanks to his afford to be a great host.
While we unfortunately did not meet Michelle, Felmar was very friendly and a great host! The apartment is very well situated, clean and comfortable. Would definitely recommend!

I stayed in Elizabeth's apartment for 10 days while working in NYC. It's lovely! Stylish and super comfortable with everything you need, on a quiet street that I felt really safe on as a solo female traveller. Would be great for couples too. Close the the beautiful Prospect Park and Park Slope, with the subway 10 mins walk away to take you to Manhattan. Elizabeth couldn't have been more helpful -- I am sad to leave but hope to be back again!
great location, outstanding
The room is pretty big and comfortable. The host is communicative and good person

Lindsay's room was indeed lovely!! I had a great time in New York - one of the reasons being the stay in her apartment. The location was great - 5 minutes walk from subway station. Though I couldn't meet the host as she was out of town she was available to communicate and guided me through the route from airport and arranged for a smooth check-in. The room itself was neat and tidy.

Would I stay there again - Yes!! It was a great value for money!
Excellent location, clean and today flat, great communication from Conley. Very pleased with my stay!
He is a nice host and everything was good!

Armand and his roommate made us feel at home and provided us with everything we needed. They were a great help finding things in the area. The area was nice and local; there was a delicious grocery store only a block away, which provided fresh fruits and vegetables (perfect for breakfast), and it was conveniently close to the train station (2 min walk from the 1 train and 7 min walk from the A train). The room was nice and cozy, perfect for two people. Overall we had an amazing stay with Armand, and would love to come back again next time we visit The City.

Very nice bedroom with a walk-in closet and a huge desk. Two bathrooms mean that I don't have to wait to use the bathroom at night or in the morning. It was an amazing stay. I would definitely come back here to stay again in the future.

This was a great find and really good value considering the surrounding market for pads near Manhattan. Astoria is a great up and coming neighbourhood and there are lots of great shops and restaurants...especially if you like greek food. The Subway is about a 10 min walk and really easy to get to Time Square ( about 17 mins ). Laundry on site, quaint quite street and a roof top view of Mathattan -  Avi was a great host. I'd stay again for sure.
Nice spot in the west village away from the hustle and bustle of times square with easy access to the tourist spots.
Good & thanks !
nice and comfortable

Hi guys, it was a great place to stay in New York. Gio is very welcoming. This is a new apartment with a good interior. The apartment has everything you need for living, an excellent kitchen for cooking, good internet, a TV and even a fireplace to enjoy a pleasant evening. If you rent a car then it's no problem to find a place for free parking on the street. In seven minutes walk to the subway it is very convenient. The next time I go to New York, I'll definitely stop by Gio.
Excellent cosy apartment in a wonderful location - ideal for exploring Lower Manhattan!

There was no wifi and the kitchen was a total mess. Host likes to sing along to R&B at 8am. Bring your own toilet paper. Host was 1+ hour late for check in after we had confirmed check in time earlier that day. Room was full of incense ashes, I had to wipe all surfaces off before I could unpack anything. Host has a collection of several unlocked SIMcard-less smart phones with alarms that go off randomly. Host yells at his mother on the phone.

The apartment is in the middle of a very lively area around Bedford Ave with shops, bars, restaurants and public transport just a few walking minutes away. Nour's room is not very big but the rest of the apartment is really nice to hang out, and it's very clean. Her flatmate is really sweet and kind, and he'll give you some cool tips about the area. I enjoyed my stay a lot, it has everything you need, and for this area the price is unbeatable.
Great place to stay!

Very irresponsible host.He canceled our reservation at check in time.He ignored my calls.Because of him me and my friend spent 6 hours talking to Airbnb agent on the phone in the street trying to find a new place.And fortunately we found a place to stay at 9:00pm.Thank you Marlon for ruining our vacation .
Clean apartment, great flexible service and a good location near the subway

Great place to stay and great hosts, both Carrington as well as Adam! This place is located in the heart of Williamsburg - where you want to be! So much to do within walking distance, which is fantastic. And easy access to the L-train which brings you to Manhattan in under 10 min. 

The building and apartment itself is maybe not the newest but it is clean and comfortable. They make it easy to check in and out and they're very easy to reach if you have any questions. I had a lovely stay.
Excelent place to stay! Lovely!

Lovely host and her son met us for check in. Both very friendly and made us feel welcome. Location is good as it's a couple minute walk from the subway and can get to Manhattan easily which was ideal for us. Room was good and couple use the kitchen if we needed too. Room was a little hot but we had fans to keep us cool.
Polina is a great host offering a comfy and arty apartment close to the beach. Before and during my stay Polina was always fast and super friendly whenever I had questions! See you soon Polina! :-)

cat's place is beautifully decorated and sunny and clean...
a perfect location to get around in nyc!
this is a 4 story walk-up building... do travel light!
we will be back!

I enjoyed staying here. It was pretty noisy outside from people playing music while I was trying to sleep, but overall it was a good experience for a great price. I will be coming back. It's like a fifteen minute walk to the train to Manhattan. There are a lot of people staying at this place. It's like a hostel.
You can't do better than this apartment, a 10 minute ferry from mid town, incredible view and cool neighborhood.
Kennedy was a wonderful host! Super responsive and helpful!

Mostafa is an amazing, warm host. The room is a great value - a private bathroom and a separate entrance. The has nothing else but a bed and couple built-in closets. No couches, TVs, or a desk/chair. Close to Franklin Ave. stop for the C train.

Very nice place...slept three with no problem. Great location in a young and trendy neighborhood. Walking distance to bars, food, bodega's, etc. The apartment we stayed in was right on the first floor, no steps, and very easy to get in and out. The back patio area was pretty cool and unique. Would stay again.

The apartment was clean and spacious,  and it even had everything I needed. Lisa is an amazing host, very accommodating and very nice. The location is convenient with one subway station right in the corner and another one a block away. One of my best stays through Airbnb. I highly recommend this place.

Nikki is great host, very nice, welcoming and always smiled. Her apartament is just wonderful, very clean, situated close to shops, restaurants and only 2 minutes from subway. If you want to have wonderful time in NY, you should stay at Nikki's house :)

Our stay at Carlos & Cesar's place was fantastic. They are great hosts and really looked after us during our stay in NYC. The apartment has every comfort and it is within walking distance to two subway lines straight to downtown. Definitely recommended!
Victoria was a great host and her roommates were very polite. Whenever in Williamsburg, book with Victoria! She accommodated to my needs and I left very satisfied with my stay.

Jill's place is where you go when you want that local New York experience. Not only are you in East Village, which is the loveliest area, but you also get to stay in Jill's apartment which has everything you need to make yourself feel cozy and at home. The bed is the perfect size for one person. There's a desk where you can work. Also, Sherry the co-host is so lovely! I'd recommend this to anyone who is looking for the perfect place in between central Manhattan and Brooklyn and loves walking around exploring.
Area was perfect for us! Walkable to all our LES needs and cheap rides to Brooklyn. Venessas dumpling house is couple blocks away so good cheap late night munchies right there.

The apartment is located in a very convenient area, there are metro lines and city bike station within walking distance as well as supermarkets and attractions such as Central Park and the Museum of Modern Art; the neighborhood is nice too and there are local markets on weekends around the area. The cleaning was not that good although we where asked by the hostess not to wear shoes inside the apt. but there where a lot of crumbs and dust on the floor and carpet, we even found small pieces of glass. The bed was not very comfortable, too soft for us, and the bead base was very noise. The apt. works well for one or two persons. The internet worked well until the last two days of our staying when it didn't worked at all. Check-in and check-out were flexibles and we appreciated it a lot.
One day before leaving we had a trouble with the apartment door's lock, we couldn't make the deadbolt turn it was quite old and it got stuck, so we communicated with our hostess who was in Europe at that time, but she did no much to help us, so after one hour or so, we decided to call a locksmith in order to get in, but we had to pay for it and it was quite expensive; when we asked our hostess if she would be willing to share that expense she refused to pay anything arguing that we where the ones who had broken the lock, something that we didn't do, so once we finished our trip I wrote Airbnb about the incident and they agreed with me that the one who has to be responsible for that kind of inconvenience is the host or the landlord building, so now I'm still waiting to get our money back from that expense or at least part of it.
Family was super-friendly and sociable, and the place was a great value.

Ted's place is spacious and well furnished. The kitchen even has a slow cooker, that I used quite a bit during my stay. It's located within easy walking distance of the subway, and plenty of 24-hour deli's are just a stone's throw away. I enjoyed my stay--great space and excellent value.

I never actually met Sonia, but we had a nice stay at Sonia's place. There was some slight confusion regarding the amenities, but Sonia was responsive and remediated everything very quickly. Be aware that the "third bedroom" is a actually the living room with a partition installed, meaning that you won't have the living room to use. This is fine, as the room itself is spacious. Thanks, Sonia!
I was awesome! Much better than expected. Aspecially, the roommates were really cool.

We enjoyed staying at K's place. It is very safe, centrally located with easy commute options. 
We had apartment to ourselves which was nice because our come/go times were not defined and sometimes well past midnight due to the nature of our trip (dance festival). 
We found everything needed and the host very accommodating to our needs with clean towels, blow dryer, etc. 
Definitely recommend staying at K's house. So long...
Micheal was very friendly! I suggest you to go in his room.

Zach is a great host and his room is in a fantastic apartment. It's close to the metro and tons of restaurants. He's also 15 minutes to downtown. I would stay there again! Thanks letting me stay, Zach!

My colleagues had a lovely stay at Jj's Airbnb. The place was clean, comfy, and cozy. The hosts were incredibly kind and attentive. I'd highly recommend to anyone wanting to stay in this great neighbourhood!

Great place, easy to park in front of the building, VERY close to the subway station!

The room was nice, sunny and quiet and the bed was even more comfortable than the one we have at home!

Tom was really helpful and made sure we had everything we needed to fully enjoy our stay in his room. His roomates were great too! :)
Melissa's apartment was really big and perfectly clean! She and her roommate, Samantha, were so welcoming and made us feel at home for our short trip! Would recommend it to anyone!

Really nice
 Beautiful big front porch with rocking chairs.  Clean, close to subway, restaurants, the park.  Quiet at night. I left the windows open.  And Lisa was very accommodating.

I couldn't rate JJ any more highly! Excellent host going above and beyond to make my stay as comfortable as possible. Her apartment is in a lovely part of brooklyn with lots of local restaurants and bars. Easy access to Manhattan with the G stop on your doorstep.

I stayed with my husband at Andrea's place for a week. It was a lovely apartment, super clean, comfy, close to 4 subway lines, huge park nearby. Andrea and her roommate Orpheus were very helpful, we felt like home
Great host, Rush lives in NY for some time now so he will give you many tips about where to go and what to do, everything went perfect and I can only recommend staying at his place!

Best Airbnb host. I stayed here for 3 weeks, and the room is nice and clean, love the furnishings! Roommate and host are very helpful, neat and friendly. Great location! Close to 3 metro stations, market and laundromat.
If you're looking for a room with a good bed and in an excellent location, this is your place to go! Devon and his roommates were great guys, and helped out with a lot of local restaurants/cafes
The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Good location in Bushwick, great to be able to visit Brooklyn. Not central with respect to Manhattan, but public transportation always runs. Make sure to check alternatives if some subways stops are closed for construction (shuttle bus, public bus, other stops)
Cozy room and comfortable bed, the apartment is easy to reach and really close to several stops of public transportation

Very nice place to live in downtown Manhattan. Cozy and comfortable room, good decorations, close to SoHo, China town, little Italy. The host were out traveling so I lived by my self for three days. Very good experience!
Amazing place for 2 or 3 people, the place is perfectly clean and well equipped! Ron made arrangements for the keys, even late at night! I give a 5 stars!

We had such a wonderful stay here! Absolutely loved the style and comfort of the place. And, Jackie was an exceptional, attentive host, from check-in to checkout.  Superb communication. We had all that we needed, including a full kitchen to cook our meals in and to store food as needed. We were able to watch movies and a wide range of cable channels in the sitting area, and the bedroom was so cozy that sleeping felt more like hibernation. Stores are within walking distance, and we were also able to navigate the area by car with ease, so there were plenty of options for food and supplies. I'm so glad we were able to book this place. I would gladly book another stay here, and I HIGHLY recommend it to anyone else needing accommodations!
