My stay absolutely exceeded my expectations! Douglas was very kind and communicated all the information about the reservation and checking in. There was an issue with the original room, so Douglas went out of his way to find a different room and communicate the change. Would definitely recommend!
Rezi was a super nice host and the whole environment (clothing store and its team) was super cool too :) Thanks again!

Had a great time at Jorn's. He was super fast to get back to me with everything, the room is large and comfortable, and it's right next to the subway station, so you're in Manhattan in no time. Only issue was the shower pressure, but it only means that it takes slightly longer. Would definitely recommend!
Tamar has a very nice home in a great location. This listing is a great value. Thank you for opening your home, Tamar!
Sabrina and Lawrence took good care and ensured that I felt at home. They were welcoming and very approachable. It was a great experience.
Not the best place to stay
The two sisters were nice and friendly. Room was as described and very private

The location is on north side of Northern Blvd, but is still minutes walking away from Main Street and easy to find. The rooms are spacious looks new, and clean. It has two bathrooms with shower, very clean. It has kitchen and refrigerator with bottled waters. It was kind of noisy in the early morning due to flights flew over. Closing windows helped. Lucy is easy to communicate with.
Great place at awesome location. Well equipped with features. Will recommend for any occasion.

This place was perfect!! Clean, modern, and comfy (just like the photos). The apartment is 1-2 blocks away from either the train or the bus, so it's really easy to get around. There are a lot of different shops and places to eat, we recommend the sushi spot on the bottom of the apartment building. There is also a nice little market a few doors down, in case you want to just cook at home. Overall, a great experience and excellent hospitality from Petko. We would definitely come back to this apartment, if available, next time we travel to New York.
Great place to stay, very kind and conversational hosts.
Great location, and value, only  4 blocks from Grand Central Station. Hosts were very welcoming and easy to communicate with.

Faith's apartment is very cozy, you have everything you need. The mattress and pillows were excellent after an exhausted day. Can't ask for any more at her place. It's pretty well located, the subway is only 7 min walking and you can reach to all main places in Manhattan. We totally recommend her place.
The host and fellow roommates were very inviting.  The home was spacious, clean tastefully decorated. You could tell that young men lived there.  Great stay. Access to public transportation
Elissa was great and easy to communicate with. She even had a handout on list of cool places to eat and check out in the area. Had a great time!

The best place to stay!! We spent one week with our kids and everything was great! Beautiful, clean, spacious, new and comfortable. Great location, walking distance to restaurants, cafes, groceries and outlet stores (Fulton Mall).  Quiet and respectful neighbors, friendly doorman, always trying to help. Just 2 blocks away from the subway, it was super easy to get to Manhattan and other places of interest. Our host was always available to answer any question. She left us a note with very useful recomendations. We will absolutely stay here in our next trip!!!
A great place in a great location. Anybody who books this is guaranteed to have fun.
Samantha and her roommates were very friendly, waiting for me (I arrived later) and were nice. The room was clean, tidy and the balcony and bathroom were great!
This is a great place. Clean. Just the right size. Friendly hosts. Close to subways into NY. Cool neighborhood to walk. Would stay there again.
The place is really well connected and there are a lot of cool coffee shops around.
Only stayed the one night, but I'd consider looking up Lerny next time I'm on the Island to do so again. Thanks Lerny!
Rooftop is underrated in the description.

Roman was a great host- check-in to check-out. He was very welcoming and attentive to make sure everything was just right. The room and the apartment did the trick for me. I travel for business and needed a safe and comfortable place close to work and this fit the bill. I highly recommend.
Excellent location in West Village. I would stay again. Kaitlin was very responsive and accommodating. Apartment was spacious and bed was very comfortable.
Very clean. Centrally locates. Great restaurants nearby. Overall, awesome experience!

Harvin's place is a gem! It's an apartment within a beautiful historic brownstone. The inside decor is modern, very clean and houses a very comfortable bed. We spent a lot of our time exploring places of interest so it was great to come back to such a nice place at the end of the day. Great place for couples to unwind for the weekend. :)

My wife and I stayed in Angelica's flat for 4 nights.  She made us feel very welcome during our short visit.  I wish we had more time to hang out with her, but we filled most of our time site seeing away from the flat.  The location is very close to Graham station (L line) which connects you to Union Square just a few stops away, or you can take the G line down to Brooklyn.  The neighborhood had everything we needed (grocery stores, wine, print shop, and many great restaurants).   The room had a comfy bed, very clean, and had its own air conditioner (which came in handy since it was still hot outside for early October).  The bathroom and kitchen satisfied our needs as well (coffee included!).  The best part was the outdoor patio Angelica has there...after 4 days of site seeing, we spent the last night on the her patio with a few bottles of wine.  Perfect cap to a perfect trip.

Beau was an excellent host. Overall, the apartment was clean, spacious and cozy. The living room was nicely decorated, the bathroom was clean and the room was comfortable for two people. It is located just a couple of blocks away from the train station and took us around 20 minutes to get to Midtown. I highly recommend this place if you're staying in New York.
Thank you girls! You own a beatiful trendy apartment. Could recommend to anyone! Location is awesome :).

Catalina was very flexible in accommodating my arrival and departure times. She gave me plenty of tips to look for apartments, and helped me understand the vibe in each neighborhood. Her place was clean and well kept, only issue I had was with the shower. The walk to the L train is about a 10-15 minute walk. Great pizza and coffee shops locally. Overall great value, and is definitely a place someone can stay and be comfortable.

Everything looks just as in the pictures. The host is very understanding, comunication went really well between us. The apartament is spacious and clean. Good quality internet. The area seemed safe. The metro station is close by. We went to visit NY for 4 days and this apartment was the perfect choice for us. I recommend to everyone.
Prompt communication! Place exactly as described!
Overall a great experience! Helena was wonderful, it's an awesome apartment, and excellent location. Highly recommend it!
Andrea's apartment was great.. !
Awesome flat with great amenities, view of the empire state building from the rooftop! Moreover, Apal was a really friendly host and I hope to stay in touch!
The host canceled this reservation 39 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Julie was great, friendly and helpful. Her place in Williamsburg is in a great location. Close to the train and some great restaurants. Definitely recommend staying here.
The host was traveling so it was hard to contact her but overall the place was nice.
Had a great stay at Janelle's Airbnb. Very clean space and responsive host.

Angela and Jonah were phenomenal hosts, very warm and welcoming, and were always willing to help at a moments notice! They have a beautiful home, modern and well kept, equipped with a washer and dryer, access to the rooftop, and located only 1 block from the L train! The house is very spacious, and I thoroughly enjoyed the amount of sunlight in the morning throughout the house. The hosts were very easy to talk to about hotspots around the city, transportation or just general conversation. I felt very comfortable, and found the location to be convenient for going to the city. I would definitely recommend this place and would stay there again if the opportunity arose!
Great location. Easy check in and check out.
My stay at Manu's was great. The place was exactly as pictured, the check-in was easy and quick, and Manu was a fast and helpful communicator.
Easy walk to the subway station. Nice neighborhood with minimal noise.
Great quite place to stay the night.
Great hosts, throughly enjoyable.  One bathroom in apartment with 3 roommates.
Good restaurants in neighborhood.  Parking was fine.  Apartment was significantly smaller than expected.

The apartment is perfect for a couple. Great size and have everything you need to enjoy NYC. The bed is super comfy. The location is amazing, really close to times square, subway and many good restaurants. The neighborhood is really quiet, no noise at night. 
Neda was very nice and flexible with my check-in and check-out. And I could receive packages from internet shopping. 
My stay was perfect!

We loved Agathe's apartment!! It truly is bright and modern.... very clean and nicely decorated and so much natural light. My husband and I were in NYC for a long weekend to visit with our two daughters that live in the Lincoln Center area. Agathe's apartment was a perfect homebase for us during our stay. Check in/out was easy and the building staff were extremely helpful and friendly. We slept very well... the bed was very comfortable and since the apartment is in a more residential area, we didn't hear much NYC street noise. There is a washer/dryer right in the unit which was great and the kitchen was perfect for preparing a home cooked meal for my girls one night. Agathe is very friendly responsive. We will definitely check availability at Agathe's for our next visit!

Everything about house was great! I think the location was the best thing. To arrive subway does not take even one (Website hidden by Airbnb) was extremely close to the house.Also,the bed was the softest bed i have ever slept haha.It was really comfortable.And Paul was really kind and helpful.I really enjoyed staying there.
It's just as advertised and the area feels safe and quiet. My plane was very late and checking in was no problem. Also enjoyed Saraghina around the corner for breakfast.
Great place to stay for flight crew on a JFK overnight.

This was a great choice , I felt very comfortable in Buddy's house .  I give it five stars!  It's a shared apartment and the owner was very nice and easy to talk to . The bathroom was nice and the entire house was clean! the room and bed was very comfortable with its own TV and a fridge to keep beverages . I would definitely be back again !
Renae was a brilliant host and the accommodation was everything that was promised, I would recommend this place in a heart beat

If you want to get to know one of the neighborhoods in Manhattan full of history and personality, this place is your ticket. This part of the W. Village had great bars and eateries and not a chain-restaurant in sight. Famous John's Pizza is about a one minute walk. And you're still just a 15 minute subway ride from Midtown or the southern tip of the island, so you're pretty well situated.

You do need to be good at stairs, as five flights up requires energy. But it worked for me just fine. And the view is worth it. Bring some earplugs, which can be useful for random noise from the otherwise quiet side street. 

Perfect for a couple with good legs  that likes to explore.
Amazing place to stay in a very hipster, artistic district. The loft is amazing with an incredible view on the skyline. I highly recommend this place !
Molto vicino ai mezzi pubblici, in zona molto tranquilla, la casa ha uno stile vintage, molto accogliente e calda. Il gatto molto tranquillo, io la consiglio
Great location. Cute room. And Gerard was a great host.

I would not call this a "charming" apartment, as stated, but a "very functional" apartment. If you're looking for a place to stay, close to a subway station, and not too far from Manhattan, it is a good option. Lots of markets and food options around make it a very practical place. Free street parking was great.

The apartment is bigger than it looks in the pictures, that was a nice surprise. It has one small bedroom with a bed, another room with a couch and a TV, and a living room where curtains separate the second bed from the dining table.
Kitchen is fine. A microwave would add a few points.

Our stay was problematic, since after a very cold day, the bathrooms pipes froze. Danielle and Paul were extremely understanding and proactive to get us to a hotel for a night and then reimbursed us in full, since we had to leave the apartment only a couple of days after our arrival. We were very disappointed since our vacation ended prematurely, but also recognized this was not their fault and they reacted in the best possible way.
beautiful panorama :^)
Had a great time at their place. Super friendly and chill.
What a great experience. Wonderful hostess. Wonderful location.  Wonderful experience! A perfect pied a terre in Manhattan.

This Air B&B was a very nice place and your experience will be perfect if your looking to browse the city and have a nice and very clean place to stay. I was contacted and responded to very quickly and accurately. Opening the door can be confusing but she gave me exact directions and it opened on the first try. Also, there are two buildings you will know your in the wrong one if it shows only 2 floors avaible. This part was confusing but luckly it only had 2 floors which made us think we were in the wrong building. The numbers on these particular buildings are only in chinese. Unless, I did not locate it ..over all...beautiful, clean, safe,and very hospitable. Highly recommended if you dont plan on sitting in .

Kristina was a wonderful host, and the accommodations were in excellent condition.  I could not have hoped for a better, more affordable stay in NYC.  Rules were straightforward.  Access was convenient.  Communication was easy.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Brads for 4 nights this past week and honestly it was one of the nicest apartments I've been in during my 5 years of living in New York! 

The hosts- I only met brad briefly when I picked up the keys, but he was very laid back and welcoming. He was also very responsive over messaging during our entire stay, despite his 5 hour time difference. 

The location- the apartment itself is located on a peaceful, tree lined street, yet is only a block from one of my favorite streets in Williamsburg. You'll be within a leisurely stroll to some of Brooklyn's best bars and restaurants, as well as so many cafes, (vegan!) Delis, grocery stores and the L train subway stop, or even the ferry to manhattan... you honestly get the best of both worlds here. 

The apartment- this was probably one of my favorite parts of the stay. The place was actually quite a bit larger than I had expected, and is flooded with peaceful natural lighting throughout. The building is older, yet clean and very well maintained; details such as the crown molding and textured ceiling create just the right amount of coziness and character to help you feel right at home. 

Overall, Their place is just wonderful, I would absolutely recommend it to anyone.

My stay with Alexis and Julio was better than my mom and I expected in all aspects! Their warmth and joy, made us feel at home, certainly one of my best experiences on airbnb. 
I would definitely stay with both the next time in Nyc.
The location and neighborhood was excelent and very secure, the subway is in the same block and the apartment looks always clean and impeccable. I'm so happy that we won a new beautiful friends now in New York!
100% recommended, thanks for everything Alexis and Julio we already miss you! :)

This location was in the most convenient spot in Flushing for those wanting to explore Flushing Chinatown. It's super close to the train with an amazing view. Loved the private bathroom and room keys.
Place was fine, great location, but small for 6 people. The process was a bit impersonal, never got to meet the host.
Very nice place. Limited to no contact with the roomates. Close to manhattan bound lines. Loved my stay!

Great location with a short and safe walk to the train station and surrounded by a variety of apartments, community public spaces and small businesses.  The apartment has an excellent feel that is both cozy and clean and it looks better than the pictures.  The host that arranges the Airbnb listing is very considerate and response to our needs quickly.  I also like the fact that the shared space is very tidy, with the host and the roommate very politely hiding away their personal stuff.  Be aware of the noise in the morning, as sometimes there can be mechanical noises (lawnmower?) as early as 6:30 am .  I like it as it brings a pleasant and lively city feel, but be prepared to sleep early so you can have a good rest.
Had a great stay in Edwards place. Friendly roommates, nice apartment. Easy access on a nice block in Brooklyn. Close to subway

Ernesto's flat was so comfortable and cute! I felt at home at his place and I'd recommend this to anyone coming to NYC. It was affordable and not only that, I could easily access other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan by train or uber. I stayed two weeks in this flat and it was absolutely amazing. Ernesto was quite helpful if I needed anything and responded rather quickly if I had any issue at all. Thank you so much for everything.
Pao is a great host! She has a very nice, peaceful and comfy place, it is also close to a  subway station to Manhattan.

My family had a great stay in Caleb's place. The apartment was clean and the communication was great throughout our stay. The location was fantastic, only a few minutes walking to the subway station. I would highly recommend this place!!!

We had the best staying with Ely and Jordan. The apartment is very clean and comfortable. The area itself is nice and quite and in a walking distance to multiple subway stations. Most importantly, Ely and Jordan are great hosts! It was so easy to communicate with them and they made our staying much nicer.
Very friendly, easy going. A very pleasant experience
The apartment is very well located, clean and a cozy bathroom. close to restaurants, not requiring the use of transportation, access to everything walking.

Lu&Ben have been great hosts. The apartment is ideally located, close to the metro (5 min), multiple restaurants (there is a great place serving breakfast just around the corner) and facilities, the Brooklyn Museum and Prospect Park. The room was small, but very clean, like the rest of the place.  Our hosts were very polite and respectful of our privacy. I definitely recommend staying at their place for a long weekend!
This place was fantastic. Came to NY on business for Comic-Con. It was literally a 10 minute walk from the convention center! Awesome host at an awesome price.

We really liked our staying at Nicole's house!! We booked the whole house, it's perfect for 2 people! The location is perfect (5 minutes near the subway and Central Park), the house is clean, just the kitchen is small (like the picture) but there is all the necessary for cook the breakfast. We didn't meet Nicole and Allison but they texted us almost everyday, they are very friendly and helpful!!
I really enjoyed myself, she was a great co-host. She was very accurate, she had her own little touches which I loved she's very cool and friendly. And it's just such a welcoming environment to be in
Nicole was a very good host.  She is quick to respond.  The space is very clean and comfortable and has very good amenities.

Curtis's apartment was perfect and just what I needed for my short trip to New York City. Everything I needed was right there in the apartment, and the location was stellar. Comfy beds, stylish interior, could not have asked for anything else. Curtis was highly responsive to all of my messages and made the check in process a breeze!
I found the apartment very comfortable and safe.  My favorite part was definitely the comfortable bed as well as the short walk to the subway station.
Nelida is a wonderfull host. You have a nice little room for yourselfs and all necessary facilities for use. She has a bunch of tips for NYC and makes you feel right at home in this big city
Nice spot! Close to train and Yankee Stadium! Jordan is so nice and friendly. She knows how to keep a place cozy!
Is ok
Sabrina got back within an our, place is right across from wholefoods, very clean, large for an average nyc apt. Would def recommend it.
Great stay! Very responsive - fantastic all around.
The apartment was great! Very clean and cozy! The host was easy to communicate with and very hospitable. Will stay again :).
Owner did a great job with everything
Great accommodation! Lovely space, perfect location.
Viviana is great and very communicative.

Great location its very safe and close to metro. great value for the money. Washing machine, drier , and dishwasher are a big plus. Not to mention the small touches here and there by Tina made us feel right at home. Thank you so much would definetly stay again.
Lana was very communicative and helpful.
Awesome place to stay
Great stay. Location was perfect, everything in walking distance.
Na

It is really  placed 10 min from the central Parc and 5 from the Q train which brings you to ALL important connections.

It's a paradise to stay in this place, you will feel like in your sweet home. 

thank you L. for your kindness  and helpful way.
BEST ROOM IN THE BRONX

We really enjoyed our stay here. Eric was very helpful and accommodating--check-in was a breeze. The space is clean, quiet, and really comfortable, and the location is super with easy walks to many museums plus steps away from most subway lines.
No better place to stay in the upper east side of the big apple.
Nice place to stay!!! Very good location! Friendly roommates
Great location, excellent host, everything brand new and clean, quality mattresses and linens, check-in and check-out simple, would love to stay again!  Thanks Sudha.

The place was much bigger than I thought and had plenty of closet and drawer space. It was in a great location near two subway stations (yellow and green lines) within a 8 minute walk. Takes about 20-25 minutes to get to Time Square.

Murah had everything clean and ready when we arrived and he made check in and check out very simple and flexible. We were running a little late for check-in and he was very cool about it and was waiting for us at the front of the building.

He also refered us to one of his friends that gave us some recommendations for night life in NYC. 

We will definitly recommend this place to any friends visiting Manhattan.

Great 2-bedrooms space. Great Brooklyn location. Street parking was quite easy, if that is something you need. Bridge/train nearby was really not an issue. Full kitchen. Nice shower. Very lived-in and not as clean as other places are.

Lauren was great and so was her place! Neat and clean, quiet and comfortable. The place was as described and had a great mattress. I especially liked the opportunity to use the fitness center onsite. I highly recommend!

I really enjoyed staying at Shannon's house and genuinely miss it since I've left.

When I was initially booking her place, I was a little unsure as it was her first time hosting and she hadn't received any reviews yet. However, I can now say that it was a great decision and I'm very happy with the choice! Its affordable, comfortable and clean.  You can tell that Shannon really enjoys decorating her home-- it is full of gorgeous pieces of art and collectible items from Star Wars, Harry Potter, Indiana Jones etc. It has all the amenities one might need. Shannon was also extremely approachable throughout-- she responded to our msgs instantly and was very helpful. To top it all, she left us a box of chocolates as a welcome gift!

While we were there, we were also looking after her pets-- two rabbits and some fish. However, the chores involved were easy, taking only 20 mins of our time everyday. One drawback was that the rabbits tended to poop in corners of the room which would then need brooming. But, it was completely worth it, since her rabbits are absolutely adorable and fun to live with. Though shy in the beginning, they warmed up to us over time, and Hope would even nudge us for cuddles! Shannon also had an automatic feeder set up, as well as a Rumba Vacuum Cleaner which would clean most of their poop.

I would recommend her place to anyone! Its cozy, quirky and beautiful in decoration, and comes with adorable pets.

This apartment is fantastic.  The location is great; both Midtown and Murray Hill are on your doorstep.  There are endless places to eat within walking distance, and also a Trader Joe's supermarket. The view of the Empire State Building, the Manhattan skyline and the roads below is stunning. The apartment is modern and stylishly furnished.  The bedroom has sound insulation and black out blinds (although if you need it, the air conditioning is loud).  Check-in was smooth and the apartment was very well equipped. I'd definitely recommend it.
Hanna was a great host. I would certainly stay again!

Even though I booked Joel's place at the last minute He was kind enough to come and get the place ready for us! He is a wonderful person and great host! The location of the place was perfect for us. There are multiple stores and restaurants in the area. The apartment itself is super cozy and had everything we needed. Joel answered all our questions and was ready to help every time! I definitely recommend his place to anyone. In conclusion I'd like to thank him again for his hospitality!

The room is in a very well located appartement near restaurants, comerce, and transport. However, I think the room was a bit small for me; but if that is not a problem for other people it does not matter much. 

Finally, the hosts were very kind.
Lovely clean, spacious, safe, relaxing house, facilities all work brilliantly, it doesn't even feel like sharing a room by how great everything is. Very very recommendable
Loved staying here! Quiet, clean and great place! Comfy bed, kitchen and bathroom were amazing!

Go stay here. The owner is so friendly, nice and sweet. The apartment is beautiful, feels warm and clean. The bed is so great and comfortable.
Subway is in a walking distance, two blocks away. Really great place!

Had a great stay here! Jenn is super friendly and seems to genuinely care about her guests feeling welcome and at home. The apartment is very clean, homely, nicely decorated and just a short subway ride away from the city. I also really enjoyed citibiking to Prospect Park and checking out some of the nice bars/restaurants nearby. Would definitively stay here again!
The location is great and paired with the cost it is incredible. Peter was always available to help and immediately took care of the one issue that came up regarding picking up the keys.
Excellent environment and location, really appreciated the basement and rooftop access.  The space is kept clean, the design is beautiful.

Lara was a fabulous host- the weeks leading up to our stay, she constantly communicated with me and answered any questions I had! There were a few details that prevented us from having an outstanding stay (uncomfortable with the cats/ cat hair everywhere, untidy bathroom, and difficulty with heater) but overall we had a great time, especially considering the location (short bus ride to midtown), view, and amazing amenities the plaza had to offer. Would recommend!
Nice spot and clean rooms, felt like we had the whole spot to ourselves
I have been here several times. The staff is really helpful and I enjoy my stay everytime. I will be back
Good amount of space for a New York air bnb. Nice and private. Host is great and easy to coordinate with.
Great place, great people.
The location was superb and the host was very friendly and helpful. The apartment was clean and the views were great. Would definitely recommend this spot.

Soraida's place is adorable, on a great street and in a fantastic neighbourhood. The place is clean and it has access to the most adorable back yard which I will miss very much. Loved the apartment, and Soraida is very very friendly :)

Sapir was unavailable to check us in because we arrived at an odd time, but she made arrangements for a friend of hers to be there to give us the key and show us around. Nice, comfortable, affordable place with nearby access to subway stations. Under half an hour from Manhattan.
There's not enough that I can say about these gracious accommodations. I definitely wish we had been able to stay for more than a night!

Andy's place is a modern and comfortable apartment with an incredible view over Manhattan. It is at walking distance from many nice bars, restaurants and coffee shops in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, and just a step away from Line G which can take you anywhere in NYC. Andy is a great host that will put you at ease and make you feel at home.

I stay in Ozzy's house for a month, Ozzy is really gentle and always available, of you need something he help you!
The house is in a good neighborhood, with all shop near, and the metro station with 4 line is at 30 second to walk!  
The room is cozy, the bed really comfortable, the view from the room incredible, can you see the Empire state building! Really recommended to all!

Stephen was great at communicating with me as we booked the hotel accommodations. I wound up booking the week before so they did not have the 1 bedroom suite that I wanted but Stephen was great about getting me two rooms in the hotel for the price of one. When I arrived I wound up being upgraded to a two bedroom suite so it worked out even better in the end! Since he is a member of the Wyndham club you get to use all of his benefits which is great and the hotel staff was very friendly. The pictures online really do not do the room justice, the views from that hotel are AMAZING. Overall, I had a great stay and would absolutely recommend people to use Stephen as an option.

Stephen's place is perfectly placed for easy access to transportation, events, food, drinks and everything that makes NYC so special. I was able to easily show my friends around the town and gain access to all parts of NYC via the metro. Though it was an extra cold Christmas/New Years, the apt was cozy and Stephen was very accommodating, providing additional heat. Walking distance in any direction you have access to Delis, Food & Drinks, Gyms, Brunch, Malls etc... Amenities were provided and we were given access to anything within the household without restriction. It was a great experience, one that I wish can be placed in words...
Very clean and was perfect place to stay for a weekend getaway
The room was great, I really enjoyed my time here!

I had an out of town colleague stay with Jae while she was here for training.  She loved Jae's place!  Very clean, stylish, breakfast amenities available every morning.  While coordinating this stay, Jae was extremely responsive, helpful and offered so much to make her trip special.  I got to meet him when he came to pick up his keys and he is just lovely!  Would definitely have many more of my colleagues/friends stay at Jae's place!

Thomas' place was cozy, clean and convenient. He also went the extra mile to pull out an an air mattress for my pre-teen son and his friend. His recommendations for good eats hit the spot. We'll be back again.
Clean, cozy and in a great location!

Great place! Had a lovely stay at the house. Room was cosy and cute, place itself had a nice living space and balcony. 

Lively house with friendly housemates and other Airbnb guests staying too, which made it a great spot to meet people. 

The location is a 5 minutes walk to the heart of Williamsburg, with plenty of great food and bar options nearby. Close to Bedford street station on the L line, which made getting into Manhattan a breeze.

Would definitely stay again!
Excellent :) love it
One simple word AWESOME
Easiest check-in, nice couple.. great space!
Great host

Great modern clean apartment in lively authentic neighborhood. Plenty of restaurants, nightlife and close to beautiful Riverside park. Host, Demetrius was readily available by phone and text and very accommodating. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. Room is small and best for one person but Excellent value. Would gladly stay again.

This place has crazy-cool style! On top of Jean's special touches and fast responses, this was an overall great stay. Great bang for the buck, reflecting the neighborhood to a certain degree, and felt safe inside the unit. Note that bedroom C is street facing, so if you don't manage street noise well then bedroom B (notably smaller) may be a better option. Thanks again Jean!!!
A charming Brooklyn brownstone, very quiet and well appointed.  Good for families.  Subway a bit of a hike, especially in cold weather, but no big deal.  We plan on coming back.
Phoebes place was great had an excellent stay definitely recommend it

The location was fantastic with only 15 minute subway ride to Time Square. However the apartment itself was very small and needed a good clean. There was lots of mold in the bathroom, most towels had stains on them and there were personal belongings everywhere. There was also off food left in the fridge and the gas heater was extremely loud and placed right next to the bed.

We loved the house - it's as stylish as the photo's portray.  Worked really well for our large family (2 couples, 1 single, 1 teenager, 1 kid|) with plenty of space to all sit around the dining table or retreat to our rooms if we needed a bit of space.
perfect and great

Monica was a wonderfully gracious hostess. She went above and beyond her obligations. She was willing to invite me to things she was doing if I had no other plans. I felt more like a 'friend' than simply a guest in someone else's home. I'd absolutely recommend staying here if that's the type of experience you're looking for.

Danielle was a wonderful host! Communication was easy and prompt, we even had a FaceTime conversation before our arrival so that we could iron out the details of our stay before we arrived. As far as affordability in the city during New Years Eve, you really cannot beat the value! 
 
Upon arrival we had difficulty finding a parking space. (It is NYC so of course it is understandable that having a vehicle can be tricky!) Danielle was more than happy to answer a phone call from us late in the evening to explain the parking signs. Once she helped us decipher the signs we easily found a spot in front of the apartment! Do not be intimidated by the street signs, just be sure to read them and you will be fine!  

The apartment was adorable and had everything you would need and more. It was decorated very tastefully and felt like a funky, authentic, New York experience! We were very comfortable and happy in our home away from home, especially after long days walking in the frigid temperatures! 

Transportation could not have been easier! The subway is a short walk down Astoria Blvd. We took the opportunity to grab bagels and coffee every morning before venturing out. Astoria was charming and felt completely safe even in the early hours of the morning when we would arrive home. There were many late night options for food within the few blocks to the subway. The train was almost fool proof to get into Manhattan. 

Above all, Danielle truly made the effort to be available to us at any time even though she was on vacation herself!  We met some of her friends to receive and return the keys, clearly she is a very well loved person who is integrated into her neighborhood community. Her kindness and generosity made our stay all the more enjoyable.

I had an amazing time at Bethany' s place. The views of the city were incredible, the place was very clean and the host was always responsive to any questions that came up. Overall awesome place, i would definitely stay here again in the future .    This place is a wonderful gem I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting New York
Right in the heart of soho, great place- bigger than the pictures show. Would definitely stay here again.
Christine was straight up about her place.  It was convenient and a great value.  The Restaurant downstairs had a very nice brunch and super nice people!  All around happy with my stay.

I rented Emily's place for my daughter (one week). Emily was very reactive and the process went smoothly. Here is my daughter's comment:
"I didn't meet Emily, I had contact by mail and phone and she arranged everything for my coming (key, etc.). There was one room mate. The room is as in the photo and clean. The shared bathroom was not that clean, specially the floor and the bathtub. The area is nice and close the the subway, very convenient."
Alison was a very responsive and helpful host. She was really nice and accommodating. The place was nice and as described. I'll definitely recommend her place.
thanks for the stay
Excellent location and a very cozy bedroom.
Very well located, very cool neighborhood
The room is really huge, television perfect, comfy bed everything is perfect. Jelly is amazing and Eli too. I really appreciate everything. Thank you to have met you.

We stayed for a little over two weeks while we transitioned between apartments. The location is great - about 7 minutes to the R/Union and 10 to the Q/7th Avenue (there are more subways, those are the two we used to commute to work).  20-25 min walk to BAM/Barclays/Target. There's a grocery store (Union Market) on the corner at 6th Ave (try the blue duck pies), a new coffee shop across the street and a Chinese restaurant next door with great vegetarian options.  6th ave is pretty residential so it's quiet.  I used the laundromat 1/2 a block up Union (towards 7th) that's right next to a really cool cafe/bar/music spot called Sir D's lounge.  Union Hall is also a great bar to check out on Union (towards 5th).  The host, Elise has been in Park Slope forever and knows everyone so she is definitely a wealth of information about the area (she runs the community center downstairs). 

Elise and her chill dog lived upstairs about 2/3 of our stay.  She is absolutely lovely. We didn't mind her sharing the stairwell (she walks by the kitchen and living room on the way up and down - there's a curtain that you can close for privacy).  The bedroom and bathroom are through a door that can stay closed for privacy so you can walk between the bedroom and bathroom and not be seen from hallway that host will access.

The open kitchen and dining and living area is really functional - there's a desk, dining table and counter-top seating and an L shaped couch.  We hosted Thanksgiving (3 of us) and it was a very comfortable space for the meal (probably could have had up to 5 people over for dinner).  There's also a back deck that we didn't use much because of cold weather but would be great for warmer conditions.  Also a fire place you can use.

Bedroom has a huge bed and is really comfortable with warm blankets.  Lots of storage in drawers, shelves and closet for clothing for longer stays.   Bathroom has good storage too.

We adored all of the arts and craft decorations - wall murals, handthrown dishes, wall storage for coats upon entry, etc.

I definitely recommend staying here.

This apartment was roomy and in a GREAT location. The subway and buses were very close by and it was a short walk to Central Park.
I believe that our host Marc is new to Airbnb. We have given him advice regarding expectations of cleanliness and the provision of basic kitchen utensils, pots, cutlery etc. If these issues are addressed, I would recommend the apartment. If not, I would not be inclined to stay there again.

Gui and Isabella were excellent communicators and got back to me very quickly from the time of inquiry, to booking, to our arrival. They were very accommodating especially when I told them of our change in plans and asked to modify the reservation. The apartment was spacious for our group and we all appreciated having enough space to hangout all together, whether at the table in the kitchen or downstairs in the living room. It felt very homely and sweet. The location was great for us in particular because we were only a 10 min drive from some dance events we went to. 

Only thing that could be improved on is cleanliness. Some tabletops and nightstands were not wiped down, as there were water marks and other clear markings of use. Both shower curtains were moldy and there was a lot of dust under the bunk beds. The fridge had leftover food from previous guests and some half or almost empty jugs of expired milk. The freezer didn't have anything in it but was smelly.

Other than that thank you Gui and Isabella for your kindness and for the stay! All the best to you both
Excelente todo lo recomiendo
AIRBND is not a good option if you are looking for a hotel or privacy. Its seems that almost anybody can put a room as accommodation regardless the condition, cleanliness or safety.

The apartment is extremely well located in the heart of the east village. I would recommend booking the apartment based on the location alone but you get so much more with it. Jessica was prompt in responding to any queries we had and resolving any issues that came up. I stayed in the apartment with two other family members and the space was ideal for the three of us. It is a spacious apartment according to NYC standards but I would not recommend staying here with more than three people as it might get tight. Overall we had a great experience and definitely recommend the apartment to anyone looking to stay at a well located spot in the city.

Perfect location in Williamsbury Brooklyn.  A true New York City apartment. The hosts took great care of me.  

Bed was super comfortable. The room looks out on the air space instead of towards the train tracks so it was quiet even a pretty busy part of town. 

HIGHLY recommend if you are looking for a great local spot.
We really enjoyed staying at Santiago's place which was located at the heart of New York. The place was really cozy and it made us so reluctant to leave! I highly recommended to stay at his place.
Great accommodation, Andy welcomes you with all the comfort you need. Very Great !
The apartment is 5min walking from the subway and takes about 25min to Manhattan. Marcy is a fantastic host. She invited us to have dinner in New Years Eve with her. Thank you for everything!
A lovely apartment, very spacious and great location near two subway lines. Ideal for our family of 5 for 9 days in New York.

My mom and I really enjoyed our stay at Matthew's. He was very nice and hospitable. The location is in the heart of Chinatown so it's quiet accessible to anywhere in Manhattan: restaurants, train stations and many other New York landmarks! 
I highly recommend staying here especially if you're in town to explore!
Great place,quiet neighborhood, cozy space. No matter you come NYC for long term staying or short visit, Chris' place would be a good choice.
Nice studio in a good location close to Central Park and restaurants and shopping!
Excellent host

Jenny's place was an ideal crash pad for my Harlem adventure. It's close to the nightlife and historic places in this vibrant neighborhood. I enjoyed roaming the streets and ducking into the local businesses, in addition to my events in other parts of Manhattan. 

The best part was definitely the location. Second best was that everything worked! There are three things I look for in a room: A comfortable shower, wifi, and cleanliness. Jenny's place was strong in all of these traits. 

Sharing her coffee and produce was a nice touch. I was also in need of an iron and closet space as I was attending a wedding. Jenny readily accommodated. 

Jenny's restaurant recommendations were good, too. She steered me away from the tourist-y stuff to a fantastic soul food restaurant called Sylvia's. I ate there twice in the same day!

I had a few questions after check-in and Jenny was very responsive. She was even willing to come back to help me with a question, but it turned out to be a non-issue. 

I highly recommend Jenny's apartment.

Chelsea's place was ideal for what we were looking for during our friend's trip to NYC over New Year's! We were a party of three staying for just under a week and wanted to be in a place that was central to the main pitstops of the city. The location of the apartment was perfect, and very accessible for uber and taxi's that we were travelling in (if it wasn't so cold we would have been walking a lot more!). 
Chelsea was extremely hospitable and had left lots of personal touches for us to make us feel welcome while she was away on holiday herself. She had also left us the details of her friend who lived close by in case we needed any extra help.  
The apartment was very comfortable and there was plenty of bedding for us, so we were very happy while spending time inside. The kitchen was small but still great for what we needed, and we often were able to make teas, coffees and buy groceries and make some of our meals. The bathroom is tiny so be warned! Although with a shower cap we were able to manoeuvre around, and considering we were three women all with long hair, we did pretty well and didn't find it uncomfortable. 
Chelsea was always fast to communicate with us and answer any questions we had. We would definitely recommend her as a super duper host and would love to stay here again.
Thanks for making our stay in NYC so special Chelsea!

Though the location of this home is a bit far from Midtown, it was nice and cozy. Especially host was really nice. She is so considerate. She prepared rice and gimchi and welcoming drink for us. 
And the neighbor was nice, too. 
I will definitely visit again when I go NYC later.
it was a great place and lots of places to sleep, the host was amazing and very fast responds.
Secure access to quaint apartment with good A/C.  Charming decorations with modern fixtures and appliances.
Yoshi is really friendly and talkative like a roommate. The house is suitable for the winter, which there are two heaters in a small room. Also, it is about 5 minutes away from the subway station!

We lived in the apartment for four nights and it was a really good time. Everything was clean and well kept. To stay in the apartment was very comfortable for the three of us. Thank you, Harvard, for the great stay!
Drago and salome are lovely and super friendly the room is great.

The appartment is well situated and close to the subway.
If you want to eat on the appartment there is no chairs nor table.
The room is not so big and not so many space to place your belongings..

Liam's place was a perfect place to stay for myself and my 3 other guests. Close subway ride in & out of the city not to mention easy. Very clean and quiet. Loved having rooftop access to be able to enjoy the city views even when it's 9 degrees outside;-)
Safe place to hang out and everyone in the building we came across was pleasant and friendly. Will be staying there again in the future when and if it's available!
Excellent host, excellent location and comfortable apartment.
Excellent for a quick trip
Wonderful studio apartment! Check in and out are very easy. Response time is quick. Apartment is clean. Would definitely recommend!

Denvre was a fantastic host! This place was in a perfect location right next to the metro and multiple bus stops. Also, within walking distance of many places to eat from, coffee shops, a pharmacy and food markets. 
The apartment was clean, comfortable to be in and I felt right at home while being there. 
I was in NY as a participant for the NY Marathon and Denvre made my trip extra memorable with a sweet personalized card, wine, & snacks wishing me good luck. It was a super thoughtful gesture and very much appreciated.
 I would 100% love to stay here again next time I visit NYC due to her great communication, cleanliness, and being prepared for her guests.
It was a Pleasure Hosting Alena, highly recommend to all hosts!
Kai's place was exactly as advertised.  It's a great location and very nice apartment.  The key pickup and drop off was very easy.  And the apartment is very affordable compared to others in NYC.

This was a really nice location. The house was on a really quiet street and walking distance to an express bus stop that goes to Manhattan. My prior reservations fell through and I was able to book this place a day before I planned on arriving. There was a bit of confusion about the number of guests, but the hosts were very understanding and polite. The location is extremely nice, clean and stylish and was much better than I expected considered it is a shared space.

Ruth's place was an amazing apartment to stay at! My boyfriend and I stayed here for the weekend and it was absolutely perfect. The space itself was huge, with plenty of natural light flowing in, and the decor was so cute. The views of the city skyline from the room and the rooftop were also a great added bonus to this place. 

The apartment was also so close to the city that we easily got into the city by either train or by uber within 15 minutes.

The communication with Ruth was also excellent before, during and after our stay, which we had appreciated a lot! There were absolutely no issues at all, and checking in and out of the apartment was a breeze. 

Overall 11/10 stars. I would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat!
Place was great. It has everything you need for a quick trip in the city.

Tooraj's place was great to stay at.  It was in a safe neighborhood.  Restaurants were close by.  I stayed at Tooraj's for a month and he was would check in to make sure everything was going good with the apartment.  When there was a problem he would make sure it was fixed right away.  Overall great place to stay!

Aspen's apartment was a delight to stay in. Very warm, cosy and stylish. I would defiantly recommend this acomodation for a couple.  Her comunication and Tips on the local area where excellent. I would definitely come and stay here again.
Beautiful and spacious for a NYC apartment. Clean and super close to Grand Central which makes it easy to get around. Loved our stay here would highly recommend this apartment.
Thelma runs a smooth, clean operation
The building is very close to Subway stations and Central Park. Haakim was very responsive and was there to help me all the time.
Andy is an amazing host that prepare everything perfectly. We enjoyed the spacious room and Netflix in the huge TV. Will live in his house when we visit New York again.
Valerie was a great host that was easy to communicate with.  The apartment was modern and conveniently located close to the subway. Recommend staying here.
It was a great stay overall. Luca and his roommates were very nice and helpful.

Sandro's place is in a great location with amazing access to Manhattan and lots of cool places nearby for food and drinks. The apartment itself is very comfortable, quiet and Sandro himself is a gracious host.
This place is amazing.  There is plenty of space for people and the kitchen and living room are fantastic. Great location and price as well.
Leon is a nice host, great location, clean room and bathroom. I would definitely recommend this offer!
Location was great!  Daren was very responsive and assisted us when we need any questions answered.  The apartment is small but well portioned.

We stayed at Tina's house for a week, she was very attentive from the first moment. the house is neat, clean, modern, comfortable. The location is excellent and the neighborhood safe. the communication with her was very good. Thank you very much Tina, we would definitely stay at your house again.

This place was UNBELIEVABLY clean. It was comfortable for all of my friends and there was plenty of room for all of the guests. It's very close to the subway and in a great location. Check in and check out was easy and on time. I would 100% recommend this place or stay here again.

Perfect place under all the points of view! Good location (4 metro st. close by), comfortable house, great host!
Robert is a kind guy with lots of passions, who like to share his experiences. He also invite me for a beer. We spent good time around.
Hope to see u soon!
Riah was sweet and accommodating. The bed was super comfy and the room was really big
Great person and host.

The location of this place is great. I work in Time Square so could walk to work every morning. Unfortanelty it was a little noisier than I expected though. 

The walls are very thin so can hear lots of stomping from apartment up above and a guitar player next door that sounded like a drowning cat. Also, the heating in the room is VERY noisy. Having said that it's nothing that a set of good earplugs won't fix.

The kitchen is great but if you want to cook your own food it's a challenge as there is minimal cooking equipment. 

The bed is super comfy and Sijh bought all new bedding which was nice. 

So, if you want a good location within walking distance to lots of places than this Airbnb is for you.
Good place, very close to the subway!
Great location, close the the Q metro. Also walking distance to Central Park. Nice & clean apartment that is well decorated. Highly recommend.
Friendly hosts, great down town location. Tatami room has a screen as door, sometimes cause inconvenience .

Angelo was extremely responsive when it came to answering any of my queries during my stay. The apartment is as described however I felt like the neighborhood was a little sketchy so I refrained from traversing Brooklyn during the evening. He is very accommodating with kitchen dishes and toiletries. The television came in handy too. Overall I had a great stay and would recommend this Airbnb to anyone that would like to stay in New York!

The apartment is two blocks from utica avenue which has subway, restaurants, and shops. There is also a convenience store right around the corner. All 6 of us stayed here for NYE weekend. We did not attend the ball drop but this was a good location to stay at when visiting the big apple. Communication with the host was great. We could not connect to the wifi and the shower doesn't get super hot, but the host is working on it. Overall, I recommend this listing!

Pretty accurate description in the listing. It is a cozy place, conveniently located along a main street and close enough to a subway terminal. We didn't take a rental car but with the extensive reach of the NYC subway system and the location of this airbnb, we have np getting to all the places we need to visit. Lack of WiFi (the host does not say it has) is an issue for us and no direct control on heating is another. The stairs to this 2nd floor unit are steep but the host does point this out in the listing.

I Had a great stay at this apartment. Lots of light, high ceilings, modern and clean. Great location too (NoHo). Close to tons of shops, restaurants, galleries, bars, etc. Would definitely recommend this apartment if you are looking for an upscale loft like space in the heart of downtown. I will return.
Genial todo !!

I was a bit hesitant to book this apartment as the first renter but Adam was the perfect host! The apartment is spacious, exceptionally clean and in the perfect location, just as advertised. We were able to come and go throughout the day as we went shopping, found restaurants and took the L subway line right into Manhattan. I would love to stay here again and would recommend it to anyone!

I love Airbnb because of hosts like Lorena.  I was in New York City during Christmas and was lucky to find Lorena's apartment.  The apartment was large, clean, and beautiful as shown in the pictures.  Lorena was a great host answering all questions and going above and beyond with touches such as a beautiful Christmas tree and a full size air mattress.  Lorena was also hands-off to let us simply enjoy her home.  Thank you for your hospitality and help.

We had a great stay here. The location was in a good neighborhood, and about 9 mins walking distance from the subway, so getting around was easy. The neighborhood was really cute, and had a lot of shops and stores (including a Whole Foods)! Overall, we had a great stay here!

Michael is a lovely and his space was exactly what my party of 4 needed. He is a clear communicator, friendly and thoughtful host. His apartment was cozy and stylish, with comfortable beds and great showers and kitchen space. He had very nice touches, like clean towels/fresh bars of soap/coffee machine available and even home-made marshmallows! We would book with Michael again in the future.

Good place,large room.
Awesome cost.

Clotilde & Olivier's house is the best choice you can make for your stay in NYC. It is situated in a great neighborhood - close to shops for groceries, surrounded by wonderful opportunities to go for dinner and only a few-minutes-walk to the subway. The house is perfectly equipped, will definitely satisfy all your needs and you could not wish for a cleaner place to stay. It is an amazing place to start your NYC-day and a wonderful refuge to most comfortably end a day full of new impressions. Enjoy!

Brooke's place is awesome ! It is pretty spacious, with a big kitchen, a cosy and stylish little living room and a very beautiful room full of light. Brooke organized our arrival perfectly and was always available, responsive and nice during our exchanges about the rental. The street itself is very quiet which is great, but the neighborhood is very lively, lots of restaurants, coffee shop, groceries... 5min walk to the G line, 10-15 to Williamsburg and the L line. We felt great for those 3 days and would definitely come back.

Patricia is a great host. She offered me morning coffee, evening desserts and sometimes food as well when I returned from work late at night. She is a wonderful person who offered advice on some of the issues I have been facing. I look forward to my next stay.

Really nice place to stay on Manhattan, just a few steps to the subway with a privileged location. Everything was above the expectations Phillip was always attentive to any request and detail since the beginning. For any future guests just follow Phillip guideline closely. Outstanding service!

Best 
David
100% recomendable, buena anfitriona, situacion y alojamiento.

Lex's apartment is a cozy spot right next to Prospect Park in Brooklyn. It was incredibly convenient for my needs. S haps it worked out. 

Thanks!

Clean, well-situated apartment in a nice neighborhood with easy metro access. The host and her apartment mates were extremely responsive and helpful. Don't forget to check out her handwritten insider's guide!

Pros: 
1. room has privacy.
2. Convenient to subways.

Other:
1. Room is as "cosy" as it looks in picture.
2. Everything aside from room is "well worn."
3. You might need to work a bit to unlock some doors.
4. Bring shower sandals if you intend to shower.
Good place for a price. Decent distance from the Museum of the Moving Image.
The place is as described and displayed. Very minimalistic but new and clean. Mike is a great guy and can give great recommendations. Thanks again, Mike!
If you are looking for a cute and cozy flat, here is the perfect selection. And also the roomies are great people too.  Highly recommended.

After a hiccup on the key pick-up everything was great - the teenage boys loved the pool table and Xbox... everything was clean and beautiful, and great neighborhood. Could have used a few more towels, other than that, it was a great space. Thank you for everything!

What a beautiful apartment! Wow. And in quite possibly the coolest neighborhood in New York City. Very safe building located a block from the best restaurants and nightlife you could ask for. The apartment is beautiful and spotless. You won't regret renting from Tristan.
Honestly a great apartment, very friendly place, and I felt safe in the neighborhood. Great value!!
We really enjoyed that place!

Location couldn't have been better.  Only 2 blocks from the subway.  Quick walk to Central Park and amazing restaurants.  Host was fantastic answered all of our questions and gave helpful tips on places to see and local events to go to.  AWESOME!!
Good place. Clean and actually quite large! Kay was great with checking in to make sure everything was good before, during, and after.
Had a great stay! Cute apartment in a great location. Cansu is very responsive and friendly.
had a great time and had a perfect view when it snowed.
Kaitlin was an amazing host! So helpful, and so easy to chat to that it felt like I had known her for years. Place is nice, simple, very clean, conveniently located. Exactly what I needed!
Great place! Highly recommend!
Christopher was very accommodating by waiting for my arrival. The room was stylish in a very comfortable apartment. Christopher was a good host and very helpful in answering questions.

I was Karen's first AirBnB guest!  She very accurately described the layout of her light-filled and true two-bedroom, two bath unit's accommodations.  

The view from the living room/kitchen, day and night is spectacular!  (of note; the bedrooms have blinds, but there is so much light, you might want to bring eye shades if you are dealing with jet lag).  

Karen had brand new towels for me (literally: some had the tags still on---so--brand new); all three room heaters/air con units worked well so that even though it was freezing in New York when I visited, it was warm inside (72 degrees) and each room could be independently adjusted.  

The frig, washer, dryer, stove, and range all worked and I used all of them (Karen even had OJ and soda water for me).  

The apartment has a doorman (secure) and parking is one block away in a hotel (can't remember how much a day).

A few notable points:
1) The bedrooms are quiet.  This is not to be underestimated in New York.  I did not hear other rooms or units or occupants--no doors, voices, stereos.  The building must be a warehouse conversion with solid concrete floors and walls---seriously; never heard anyone from inside the bedrooms.
2) The views are ---spectacular 
3) Uber and Lyft found the unit easily every time, usually within 2 to 6 minutes each time
4) Karen was accessible very shortly within every time I had a question

Thank you, Karen! May you have more success and enjoyment sharing your place with other AirBnBers!
Great price-value deal. Nice little garden, easy subway to Manhattan, can recommend.

Megan was an awesome host; very easy going; very responsive; and very flexible with check-in and check-out.  Her place was a cute railroad style apartment; therefore, it will be a bit tight for those who like open spaces (but then again, most NYC apartments will be tight regardless of style :).  She had a cat who was awesome and kept to himself.

Sharmila was an absolutely wonderful host! Communication was excellent, and this was far and away the cleanest Airbnb I've ever stayed in. She uses a service, and they handle communication when she's unreachable. They were super prompt and helpful in answering my questions and very professional. I loved the apartment, and the location was great. The price and value were awesome for New York. I would absolutely come back to stay again.
Aimee was an amazing host and we felt super welcome. The apartment was lovely and the room was great!
He's too busy to be reached with any urgency.

This place is nice and clean and in a cool area of Williamsburg. You can get to Manhattan in less than 30 minutes by subway and there are lots of cool restaurants and pubs in the area. The place is nice and clean and quiet. Highly recommended!
Had a great time at this airbnb and felt very comfortable there for 11 days. Very stylish apartment and James was easy to get a hold of when needed. I would definitely stay again in the future.
Nice bright place with a eclectic mix of professional roommates.
Good place, great host and convenient access to public transportation! I liked this place!!
Agnes place waa very clean and tidy. Great value for its location and plenty of privacy. Would definitely recommend this space to other travelers.
The place is very modern and stylish, with many useful amenities. Nancy was quick to respond to my messages when I had any questions and overall it was a very relaxing stay! Thank you!

Good place. 6 room apartment. Never met either if my hosts. This is an interesting concept. Three flights of stairs. Secure. Kettle. Two shower bathrooms. When I arrived 2 other nice people, by the Wednesday we had 10 done in doubles, doubles looked smallish but my room was fine. Bit cold for couple of nights but this was rectified and NYC was unusually frozen cold at this time. WiFi worked most if the time. Nice neighborhood near shops cafes bars 30 mins walk to downtown Brooklyn along Myrtle Avenue. A nice stay with lively people from all over.
Cheap place with a super helpful host, even offered us to come back to the apartment after our flight got canceled, thanks a lot!

Very quick responses from the hosts and the flexible check in helped me a lot with my early travel times but unfortunately it wasn't the cleanest, particularly with a cleaning fee included, but overall everyone there is very pleasant and it's close to public transport which is a win!

Thank you very much for the quick response! Great and clean apartment. I will recommend to my friends. Perfect view. Super clean. Really friendly.  Wanna hang out with you guys more. Will come back soon
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Emily's place is large, well-appointed and conveniently located.  Astoria is a great place to hang out, lots of great restaurants, and it's quite close to Manhattan. We were here during a cold snap, and the apartment was warm, inviting and cozy.

Chrissy's apartment is lovely for a large group! We had a party of 6 stay the night on NYE and the space couldn't have been better for us. Not only is the apartment huge (seriously, it's SO spacious), but all of the bedrooms are comfortable and well-balanced. The hammocks were a really cool touch, and we loved using the exposed brick wall as a backdrop for festive group photos. :) 

The apt is in a great location and is high up enough that street noise wasn't an issue. There's a grocery store right across the street and the 2/3 was a 3 minute walk from the building. Chrissy was welcoming, accommodating, and easy to get in touch with throughout our stay. We really enjoyed our visit!
Mary Grace was very helpful and communicative and the apartment was comfortable and well equipped and area is great! Enjoy!

I loved this couple are very very cool .. and my girlfriend and I,have spent an amazing time at their place . I would fairly reccomend at anyone their condo. Jhon has been like an older brother and Kristy  was very kind  she helped us with tips for the city . We felt  immediatly a good connection .. Thank you guys i hope to see u soon in Italy or Montreal i will make sure my place is your home grazie !!!!
Phantila's place was great - It was spacious, clean, and had charm.  The host always responded quickly and made the entire process easy.  Would recommend to a friend.
Very cozy apartment. Very close to the metro. Alon was an amazing host.
A small bedroom but in a neighborhood I like... My host was so lovely with me. I think we will see each other again...
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A relatively spacious apartment in an amazing location with a great host! I absolutely recommend it for anyone looking to stay in a quieter area but still have plenty of restaurants/bars around. The easy subway access to get into Manhattan was a huge bonus. Great place to stay!

James was very warm and welcoming into his home. He allowed me to have my space and privacy. His responses were always speedy. I will definitely book again with him if I ever need to. The room was very spacious and comfortable. Thanks James!

My stay at Efe's home was amazing. Her home was very clean and welcoming. Efe's personality was great also she made me feel very welcomed and comfortable. Thank you for trusting me with your home. My stay was greats.

Anna has an amazing apartment that is not only perfectly located in one of the best neighborhoods, but also is warm, welcoming and has everything you need. Couldn't have asked for a better experience! Highly recommended.
Good luck

Shanee's place is as described, stylish, clean, spacious, and hospitable. Her roommates was real nice and the two cats really lovely!! I love the space also because it has two bedrooms at the ends of the living space and thus optimal privacy guaranteed for each bedroom and it's very quite at night. Plus very short walk to A/C trains to Manhattan. Ideal for travelers or those looking for a longer term stay!
Noah was a great host. He was flexible and very accommodating. The location of the apartment is perfect and very convenient. It was a beautiful place!
The room is very clean, the heater is running properly. Although it's a little dusty, but it is perfectly fine.

Jeannie was a great host and I wouldn't hesitate to stay withe her again. She is calm, orgqnized, friendly and reliable. She is happy to socialise, while also often off doing her own thing. Her apartment is clean and cosy. Astoria is a fantastic neighborhood with every type of restaurant, store, and service you could need, all only 10 minutes/3subway stop from Manhattan. I can highly recommend her as a host, and her apartment is a great place to stay!!!
So

As advertised. The room is accurate to the description and pictures. Great host and the room was fairly clean. The location can be a challenge if you want to take the subway to Manhattan. The closest train station is a mile away.

We really enjoyed our stay, Yvette and her roommates are very thoughtful hosts, they gave us very useful tips to move around Brooklyn. They were constantly checking in and making sure we felt at home.

Rebecca was really fast in replying and reacting to all our requests! She gave us lots of good suggestions and was always very polite and patient. Her flat is super quite!! you cannot hear any noise from the street and even not from the neighbors, which is definitely a plus. It is cozy and has everything to make your stay comfortable and pleasant. The area is very nice and quite and really closed to transport meanings, supermarkets and lots of restaurants for all tastes. 
If you need a quite and comfortable place I really recommend it!

Tania was a wonderful host, with incredible recommendations to explore Brooklyn and Manhattan. The apartment was super clean, great design, and loved the location, very close to Pratt where I'm teaching. Most important, I felt at home. I will stay here again anytime.

Matthew's place is the perfect refuge in the city that never sleeps. Very comfortable in a modern building next to the E & C subways. You will not find a better location than this. Wonderful local neighborhood places just a short distance away and Timesquare is just a few blocks away. The apartment is well appointed with everything you might need to be comfortable. Matthew was a great communicator and he went out of his way to make sure everything was fine throughout the duration of the trip. Really perfect in every way- oh and the best shower for a tall person ever!
Clean, cozy and chic apartment. The room is decorated mindfully. The Sonos sound system added a lot to my experience!

This AirBnB is a real home away from home.  It is new, stylish, clean and very well-kept.  The location is close to subway, yet the area very quiet and suburban with close facilities (shops, bars & hotspots).  The facilities here include washer, dryer TV and communal space.  It is a true apartment style house away from home.  Also no need to bring houseware.  Everything is provided.  Alex and co were very generous and communicated in timely manner (thanks Jacob, Karisa and Erik), house mates were amazing! I felt welcomed and had all questions answered if needed.  I honestly would not bother trying anywhere else, just because the bar and standard has been set.  This is how to run a business!  When I return for Holiday or Work,  Outpost is where I'll always be going!  Love you guys! :)
Mikaela was very nice and answered quickly any time we needed.
Emily's place was everything as advertised with a heightened sense of comfort and meticulousness in her home. If you can, absolutely stay here.
All was perfect. Great comunication, near from New metro station Q. Perfect location.

This was an absolutely outstanding experience! Apartment is very well located in Midtown East, only a couple of blocks from subway, super safe and convenient area! We loved the building, it is brand new and very high end luxury feel, with amazing amenities. Apartment is so nice, clean and cozy, we felt right at home and would love to stay here again! Bill was very responsive, and shared some great local tips!

We had a great time at Anisha's place during our trip to NY.  The neighborhood is great and very close to tons of restaurants and things to do.  The 2 bedroom/2bath setup was great for two couples and we all had lots of privacy.  The apartment overall is very comfortable!  Anisha and her roommate were both very responsive with any questions and I would recommend staying here for your next trip!
Wonderful space with a wonderful location

Beautifully decorated with art and books. Comfortable beds and plenty of space for a family. Located in a beautiful neighborhood and easily to walk to shops and restaurants. We really enjoyed our stay here.

I really enjoyed my stay at Karen and Henrique's place. It was my first trip to New York and the location was great. The subway is located right across from the apartment and is a short trip to Manhattan and all the big attractions. There are tons of great restaurants nearby, including a little cafe right across the street with amazing breakfast sandwiches. 

The apartment itself was very clean and the bed was comfortable and quiet to sleep. Karen and Henrique were responsive and welcomed us with a bottle of wine upon arrival. Overall, this is a great place to stay!
It is located in a wonderful neighborhood that offers a different experience from Manhattan.

We stayed in the appartment for 7 days and loved the experience! Very close to the subway, 5 min walking and not complicated to find the place, quiet has a lot if windows  ! Walking distance to convenience store !

The address is wrong. This is not in Brooklyn. Once I arrive to the right location. Keys were not available and could not reach the host. Did not receive any news since then. Airbnb could not reach out anyone as well. I was left to find another place at 11pm.
I definitely do not recommend this host.

GOODs
- location is very convenient as near Metro
- nice TV and WIFI

BADs
- no shampoo no body wash no tooth paste no tooth brush when you reach the host abt that NO FEEDBACK
- one of the heaters is broken but it's still warm inside even its ard 0'C during my stay
- the only living room light is broken
- shower system is half-broken

If I could rate this place with 6 stars I will definitely do! This apartment is a lot more than described on the page, it is very stylish ( we could imagine the owner is a good designer:), well arranged every little detail and super clean! Oh, and it is an entire apartment, so the size is luxury for 1-2 travelers. Then it is very close to the subway, several lines. And the host is just so responsible! You know, if you hv any question, Yan will always get back to you quickly with thoughtful and helpful long, clear message. So we found this apartment the highlight of our trip, really enjoyed the stay there, I mean even the towels, pillows, kitchenware, sofa, TV... literally everything!!! Hope we could rent it for a month soon when we come back!
Amazing place, location, and host. One of the best experiences so far with Airbnb.
Pretty nice place !
Comfortable

This is a great apartment with an awesome view of Brooklyn Bridge and the city itself. The kitchen and bathrooms were nice and clean and the hardwood floors are beautiful! It was close to both the conference I was attended and some decent barbecue. If you need a nice place to stay in Brooklyn, I recommend it.

I had a very wonderful experience! The apartment was lovely, warm, stylish and very comfortable. The apartment is located near loads of great restaurants, bars, and also walking distance to public transportation. Kristin was an amazing host as well. She was friendly, super accommodating and easy to communicate with. Overall, it was a perfect experience. I hope to rent this place again!

The host was amazing and answered our questions super quickly!
The apartment was clean and close to a lot of amenities and literally next to the metro so you can go everywhere pretty easily.
The metro can get a bit noisy but it won't bother your stay.

Thank you again!!
The girls in the apartment are super sweet and friendly. The location was steps away from the L train and we really enjoyed all of the vintage stores around Williamsburg. I would love to come back!

This place was way over our expectations! We stayed with my wife while visiting family in New York this winter and found Toto's apartment to be just right for us. Everything looks even better than the photographs and communication with Toto was very easy, he was available before we checked in to answer some of the questions we had about his place and while we were there he gave us great advise on how to get around and good places for food and coffee nearby. Transportation to the city is easy and parking too. We even had a chance to enjoy the back yard! Bed was comfy and the house is very spacious, bright and clean. We will definitely recommend it to friends and come back whenever we are in town. Thank you Toto!

My girlfriend and I had a lovely weekend stay in Matthias's place. The location was perfect: 1 min walk to the subway (4, 5, 6 lines), 5-10 minutes to the Empire State Building, 5 minutes from Little Italy and Chinatown.
The apartment had all the basic amenities, anything missing can be found at a deli a block over. 
The wifi wasn't great: no streaming as the data limit was quite low. Besides that it does the work.
Great host, apartment had great amenities, well located. Would definitely stay here again

Alex was very communicative and made it easy to get into the listing. The room was great and exactly as advertised. 

Her two roommates were great hosts and were tons of fun to hang with. They also helped me figure out my life when my phone was lost (or stolen). Really could not have asked for a better Airbnb experience. I think the three of us are going to be life-long Airbnb friends.
