Tips for Airbnb guests - always ask your host for all possible stay accommodations before you purchase. We had no idea that we would not be accommodated for basic hygiene necessities like toilet paper and clean bed linens. 

This entire experience makes me rethink Airbnb as a choice for vacation stay. Airbnb guests, please be forewarned about this listing.
Great home! Great hospitality and very cozy
Great place, good neighbourhood and great host.

This apartment was in a fantastic location in the East 50s, close to so many restaurants, a grocery store, and only a half block to the M train made it very convenient for a family of 4 to explore the city.  

Arrik was very easy to get a hold of and he made renting very easy. He was also accommodating when we were scheduling our departure.

We did notice that the amenities were a little sparse for a family of 4 that were exploring the city, but using the apartment for 2 - 3 meals a day depending on our schedule.

Kenneth's apartment has very complete facilities, and the price is reasonable.
It is about 10 minutes' walking distance from the subway entrance.
I think it is suitable for people to live.

The location was convenient to many local restaurants, the apartment was clean and just what we needed. Carrie was very responsive and attentive to our needs.

Thank you again!
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great location and building.

It was our first time using airbnb. Great couple as they were really friendly people and were patient with us. Felt like a second home. The room was enough for three guests to sleep comfortably and there was a extra sofa bed in case there are extra guests. The game room downstairs was really nice and open. They always asked if we needed anything and were also nice to accommodate some things. One of us forgot our toothbrush and Shakeal went out of his way to go get us a pack. Would rate more than five stars if possible. We will definitely be booking with them again, no doubt.
Awesome view! Good place to stay.
Great place!
Thank You so much
Disasters. Sleeping at 14 degrees freezing! No Heater working

This place is a steal. To get the obvious out of the way: Yes, the room is technically a "loft" and if you are over 5 feet 6 inches (or thereabouts) tall, you cannot stand up without bumping your head, and yes, there is not a proper door.  BUT.  For my purposes this didn't matter, as I didn't plan on spending hours and hours in my bedroom -- I mainly wanted a comfortable place to sleep at night, for low cost, and with easy access to the subway. This place fit the bill, and then some. There's far more privacy than you would guess from the listing, as the other roommates did a great job of creating a makeshift wall that shields you from the living room. I stayed for 7 nights, and at no point did I feel a lack of privacy. Bonus? The building itself is AWESOME. A solid gym, a pool, a sauna, and a large game room, of sorts, where you can chill. Two blocks to the L-train. Other bonus? The roommates are awesome. Next time I visit New York, I hope to stay here again. Recommended.
Great host , quick and responsive and helped every way possible. Is worth the stay if you're looking for a play to host a large group of friends!
Amazing apartment well furnished and in a very practical district ( metro - Line L in 5 min by walk and 3 stations from Union square)
I stayed for New Year's weekend.  Superb value, very comfortable bed, very clean and nice apartment, a great location, and friendly hosts.

This place was great! So close to so many things.  It was cozy and the bed was really comfy. We had no problems with check in or check out and Adriana was incredibly responsive. I would definitely recommend this place and will likely stay here again myself.

Good location for my son and his friend to stay while in NYC over break. Only needed one night which was a bonus that Lauren allowed it, and when flight was cancelled, Lauren was very accommodating with check out times which helped.  would stay again!
My girlfriend and I had a wonderful stay at Spencer's place. Great host and great location.
We enjoy lovely days in Pat's place: the apartment is great, very comfortable and well located. The master bedroom is great and you'll find everything you need to have a pleasant stay!
I would recommend Aloone's 54th Street PH to anyone.  The host and location were both great, and I am already looking forward to my next visit to the city.

Good communication, the flat/room was clean,  even if Matt warns about the sound we didn't hear anything mayor, had no problem sleeping and this taking in consideration they were expanding the building at street level. The view from the window is quite good and the location just amazing for the price i paid.

Great location, a very clean place and accessible to public transportations.
Mariam was super helpful showing me around and addressing any concerns that I had.
El apartamento es nuevo y lo encontramos en perfecto estado, todo el mobiliario es nuevo y funciona perfectamente, si volvemos a NY es muy seguro que volveremos a hospedarnos en este apartamento.
Great place, beautiful apartment and beautiful nice host

First of all Ben is an awesome host, very kind and flexible. He waited for my checking in and he provided to give me all the information and access at his house. His roommate is very kind and I really enjoyed stayed in the hearth of Bushwick. I am sorry to have not clean all the commons spaces due to snow problem but I hope to stay here again. Thanks a lot Ben

Location, location, location. A sweet place to lay your head at the end of a fun day in NYC. If you're looking for lux, pay more and stay uptown. If you're looking for camp and immediate access to the East Village, SOHO and all it offers, this is your place.
Great location! Kristina was very accommodating.
The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Lawrence seemed like a nice and easy going host. He was very accommodating to our needs!
Had a great stay! No complaints! Cute space and walking distance from lots of restaurants.

The suite is in an old building but very well located and easily accessible.
The room, the bathroom and the small kitchen were clean.

The heater made a disconcerting noise at night but I know this is common to old NY apartments. Our stay (4 people, 3 adults and teenager) lasted 5 nights and the problem we had were this:

1- Communication with host Marcela was very difficult. She did not know the Airbnb platform forcing me to exchange messages via text messages, phones which generated a lot of stress before and during our stay.

2- She mixed Tripadvisor links with AIrbnb always causing confusion to our negotiation.

3- After paying the reservation and as she did not accept to return the money of the reservation she imposed a contract next to me the day of our trip charging me 400 dollars against damages to be paid outside the platform Airbnb (via (Hidden by Airbnb) ) that would be returned in 14 days (I hope I get that money back).

4- We felt compelled to pay because we could not go back with the reservation.

5- The two single beds 1 was for child and the other one was too small for an adult. In addition the mattresses were uncomfortable was very uncomfortable. Sleeping on beds like this for 5 nights was not easy at all.

6- Every time we tried to contact them to sort out such small details as the beds she told us that we should settle for what we had and for the price we paid.

7- The successive requirements that were added until the day of our trip was very unpleasant.

In summary the apartment is very good but the EXPERIENCE was very negative and frustrating due to constant communication problems with our host.
Great location, attractively decorates!
Fantastic place to stay, great location, and wonderful host.
Great little space, accurate listing, bit of a walk from the subway, but absolutely worth it. Laureta wasn't present during our stay, but she is very responsive and communicative, a great host.

Richies place was absolutely unique and a quiet place to relax after a busy day in the city that never sleeps. Located in the upper east side and near some great diners and eateries. Also very close to a subway that takes you to almost anywhere you need in the city.

A great choice price-quality. 
Close to metro, the centre is relatively close. Quiet neighborhood. The hotel is clean. The temperature of the room set myself.
I am very grateful to Daniel for sensitive and attentive attitude. Unexpected and very pleasant when far away from home you are greeted as a friend. Daniel told what places worth a visit where you can see the non-touristy new York - as a result of the feeling that now I know the "real new York "...
I had difficulty at the airport, but despite the Christmas night, Daniel helped to get to the hotel, ordered a taxi for that special Thank you!!!
I highly recommend!
Everything went perfect! Great host, great space

Karina is an amazing host. She made sure I was very comfortable and all my housing needs were met. She answered my questions very promptly and showed great care throughout. 

Amazing experience all round.
It was a very pleasant stay here.

This is just a perfect place for a visitor like me in NYC. Subway and bus station are close, price is fair, a cozy and clean place to have shower and sound sleep after a day's tour around Manhattan. Hosts are friendly and helpful. Strongly recommend.

Dimitrios place was amazing! I would recommend this place with my eyes close. Check in and out was extremely smooth and the place was extremely clean. The area was amazing close to all the tourtisty activity and close to  a whole bunch of restaurants. Definitely you will not be making a bad decision choosing this place! Thank you again Dimitrios for having us stay in your place!

I did not feel comfortable entering this building or this apartment. It was much too expensive for the value. No lock on the door left my belongings exposed to strangers. The room was dark and cold. Only positive would be the location.

Perhaps the greatest house we stayed in our vacation so far. The apartment itself is small, yet incredibly cozy. Our room was lit by 3 windows overseeing the lively street below, each morning we woke up to the warm and comfortable air of Brooklyn, which is the most rustic, yet urban neighborhood in all of New York. We highly recommend this sweet home to anyone looking for a house near the area!

The room was quite nice, and having our own private bathroom was a huge plus. We were conveniently located just a five minute walk away from the subway, so it was pretty easy to get around everywhere. While we didn't get the opportunity to meet in person, Sam was extremely quick and helpful to respond to any questions that I had, and made sure that we had everything we needed.
great place in a beautiful and quiet area with good transport connection!

I had such a wonderful stay at Magda's flat. Her roommate Kamila was a very great host, very helpful and super nice. The room is big and the flat is very clean, stylish with everything you need. The location is perfect, very close to the subway to the City and close enough to all the Bushwick's attractions. I totally recommend the place if you travel to NYC !!

The apartment is located in the uptown of Manhattan, with convenient transportation and close proximity to the subway.The heating in the apartment is not very warm, maybe it's too cold in those days.The owner is warm and thoughtful.All in all, it was a good experience.

Great location. Just a few minutes walk to Central Park, subways and buses. Not far to Times Square.
Apartment was warm (-17 degrees C outside, warm inside), secure and more spacious than we were expecting. Importantly for us, the apartment was quiet.
Must be the best value in New York.

Patricia's description was accurate and concise. We actually had trouble finding the location and Patricia was very responsive and helpful. The location was in a great location. If you are looking for a place thats quiet to rest your head for the duration of your trip I'd recommend this place. However, if you like natural light "sunlight" it is very limited. The limited light wasn't a problem for me though and was explained prior to our arrival.

Devin & Sameen have a truly beautiful apartment in a great part of Brooklyn. Our first night they left us a welcome bottle of wine and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our stay. They were wonderful hosts and we had a great experience!
One of my best places where I stay with airbnb. the atmosphere is very good, clean, comfortable, they are always willing to help you, highly recommended ...

Very nice apartment, very well located, in the heart of the city and with easy access to public transport. Carlos was extremely helpful, kind and answered quickly to all our doubts. To wake up and see the Flatiron building across the street under the sundawn light was a remarkable moment in our short trip to NYC.

Taylor's property was perfect for our needs and group of 5.  The unit is very clean with modern amenities such as smart TVs and newer/nice furniture.  The location is great with many places to eat and drink just a few steps away plus the subway stop is close as well.  Taylor was very responsive and proactive in communications.  I would definitely consider this property again for another stay in NYC.

Sean's space was comfy, artsy, and only a few minute walk (4 blocks) from a metro station. Getting around was easy because of this, and Sean provided info/offered help in regards to getting to know the neighborhood.
Really great place to stay with some lovely people, it really made our New York trip something special!

In the dead of winter, Jenny's place was a warm, cozy, relief from the cold outside.  The room was big, and tastefully lit. Jenny had a great sense of humor, was hospitable, and made herself easily contactable in case I needed anything. The value is the best I've had,  hands down. I recommend this place for anyone looking for a quiet neighborhood a stone's throw away from all the NYC happenings.

The location is perfect for a first trip. Communication with Yossi could have been way better. Taking extremely long to reply or not responding for days at a time. He is not very friendly and if you have issues, do not count on them being fixed quickly. If you do not mind things not working properly like the bed being broken or the drain in the shower not draining, stay here. The doormen in the lobby are very nice and were probably the highlight of the place. Dog friendly location so you will see plenty of pets. The view is gorgeous in the daytime and at night. The furniture needs to be updated, but for a few days stay, it is cozy. I hope travelers have a better stay than we did.

Maria's place is really amazing! It is clean, big, hip , cosy anything you could wish for. I have had such a good time. She is such a warm and hospitable person  and I felt right at home! Thank you so much for everything!
Kitty Is a very nice person and very accommodating. An easy few days!

The place has been close to Kingston Throops station (C line), which was very helpful for us to use the subway and navigate through the city during our stay.  The room in which we stayed had a private bathroom which ideally I feel is like a luxury in New York. There was an abundance of natural light in the room during daytime. The host (Camila) was away on vacation when we visited her place, so there was some delayed communication with Camila at times. The overall neighbourhood was calm and safe. This place was at a distance of 40 minutes from JFK airport. Overall it was good experience staying at the location.

We enjoyed our stay and Cristian was an excellent host. We had a problem with the heating unit, but once we notified him, space heaters were promptly delivered. It is truly a large and beautiful space.
Great position not far from subway and amenities. Hosts ere brilliant. Thanks!

Lawrence was an absolutely amazing host! His condo is honestly one of the nicest condos I've seen in my life. The high ceiling and sparkling clean modern furnishings and appliances gave the condo a very classy feel. Everything regarding this Airbnb was simple -- from contacting Lawrence, to getting the keys, to having two beds ready for two people, to using the condo's amenities (like the pool table), to adjusting the temperature to our room, to checking out. Lawrence was super welcoming! He was fun to chat with, and he really went the extra mile to make sure we were comfortable and enjoyed our time there. This Airbnb was a super nice place to relax between all the bustling fun of being tourists in New York. Thank you so much for hosting us, Lawrence!
Great apt. Shawn made it very easy from A to Z and was extremely easy to communicate with. Had a great stay :-)

It's a great three-story house and you can move between the levels as you want. If nearest bathroom occupied - you can find another bathroom on any floors. Total I count around 8 bathrooms in the house! Also, the house has a great living room with very big TV and comfortable couches. From the house, it's just a 30 min to the Forest Ave station (M TRAIN).  A big supermarket around the corner. I think it's the one of the best spot to stay for around 1100 per month in NYC.
Awesome host. Nice place for artists and musicians to be.

Samantha and her Place were PERFECT. its a very stylish space with modern amenities and a size not common to Brooklyn dwellings. The bed was comfortable and the little touches are just so personal and amazing. Her energy during communication and checkin and during our stay were amazing. Its like 10 minutes form al the major eating and shopping and energy of Williamsburg. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND staying at her wonderful space.
Jahde was overall a great host! Very quick to respond and eager to meet your needs. The apartment is pretty nice, and met all of our needs. This made our stay in New York that much better.
Place great and hosts are very helpful and easy to interact with

The apartment and the room itself are very spacious and everything is clean. Henry is a great host. We had to pick up the keys at a nearby coffee shop and he left some money for us to get a coffee. On the day of departure, we were allowed to leave our suitcases in the apartment and pick them up in the evening so we could enjoy our last day in NYC. In conclusion, this apartment is perfect to make your stay in NYC amazing.

Aidan was hands-down my best AirBnB experience ever, he was so flexible, kind, created a list with where to go out, greeted us with beer, just 10/10!

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, is very modern clean, a big tv and is close to the subway, cannot ask for more.
Gyms, Bars and other shops are all around.

Highly recommended
Amazing space. The layout is absolutely perfect for 2 travelers. Also a very accessible and central location in bk.

Mathew's apartment is a lovely find in the middle of a fun and interesting residential neighborhood in SoHo. The location was great, close to Prince, Spring and Houston Sts. It is just a few blocks from the subway.  It was also surrounded with restaurants and cute little boutiques of all kinds. 

The apartment itself is cozy; it is not large. But, it has everything you need for a very nice stay.  The kitchen is very well equipped with a nice stove, refridgerator, microwave, and a dishwasher! We had all the dishes we needed. 

The living room is comfortable and includes two adjoining sofas around a little table. This is where one eats. It is practical and convenient. There are two TVs in the apartment, one in the living room, the other in the bedroom. 

The bathroom has a nice bathtub and seems newly done. 
The bedroom is very nice, The queen bed is very comfortable. The bed linens are lovely.  The bedroom is very quiet, as is the whole apartment is located in the back of the building. It is very nice to come home after a busy day and sit in a quiet space away from the hubbub of NYC.

I highly recommend this apartment to anyone seeking a nice place to spend a 
getaway weekend in NYC! 
Mimi
Sandy was great! Very hospitable. If I had questions or any problems, she got back to me in a timely manner. Would recommend staying here

The apartment was exactly as pictured. Check-in and checkout were very flexible and it was greatly appreciated. The entire apartment was impeccably clean and this made my stay very comfortable. The apartment is walking distance from a few subway stations so it was very convenient and easy to get around. Also, for foodies like myself, it should be noted that the apartment is also walking distance from the Gotham Food Market and Dekalb Food Market. Lastly, and definitely not the least, Katarina was always very quick to respond to any inquiries, even while she was out of the country during my stay.

didnt see jeremy but saw his roomate 2 days after check in, had issues with getting key as the place to get it, jeremy didnt leave his last name so got delayed and jeremy wasnt responsive. the place is decent for its location but can get bit loud say 1am due to being on 2nd floor and facing the street.

First of all, David was great! After trying to find and secure a place in Manhattan at the last minute. David was able to accommodate me, my husband, and my daughter. He waited up for our late arrival and had hand warmers and candy. He was always available.
Cozy apartment very close to transit!
Amazing place!

Shane's place is very well located in Brooklyn with plenty of food and transportation options. The apartment is bright and cozy. The bedroom and living room are large and comfortable, and there's an awesome view of Manhattan from the balcony.
Shane was very thoughtful, and gave us some really nice tips. We would definitely stay here again!
Awesome place to stay with plenty of room. Mathew was great with communication and we encountered absolutely zero problems during the trip!
Very nice location. Walk distance to NYU, Soho and Chinatown. Inside of the apartment is nice and clean and organized.

Gabriele is a very kind and considerate gentleman. He was accommodating, quiet and helpful. 

The room is large, well heated and extremely convenient to subway, restaurants and laundromat. 

Great location! Great host! Great value!
Great location, but the whole place is cold as hell.
Had a great stay at Karly's place! It was everything I needed and more. Very comfortable bed, beautiful room, and a convenient location near the A and C train. Can't recommend enough!
Nice apartment in a good area, thanks for letting us stay :)
Wonderful place with a even better host. Thoroughly reccomended.

The apartment is well located and very accessible to the metro station. It is such a lovely place to spend your days while in one of the most amazing cities. Ri is a great host, very kind and so easy to reach at all times.

Matt was traveling while I was there and he was incredibly responsive despite the time differences. He addressed the only issue I had promptly. He was also very flexible when I needed to extend my stay.
Very accommodating hosts. I won't hesitate to come back another time!

Omowumi communicated with me very well during my entire stay. She showed us around at check-in and was very accommodating for all our needs. The location is close to food and a convenient subway stop.
Enjoyable place to stay in downtown
All things are good! But this apartment is kind of small and old. Nice and friendly host!
Perfect location, perfect host
Great

Ashley's place is stylish and very comfortable to stay at! She was really helpful and communicated at all times! Right around the area, you'll be able to go to many great restaurants. There's Brooklyn's best cupcake place to Barcade nearby! Public transit is pretty close, however, since it was super cold when I went, I just ubered everywhere. You definitely get to experience Brooklyn if you stay here! The place is super clean too. And trust me, you'll love the interior.
Great location
Shalimar was an A-1 host. She answered any questions I had abruptly and made sure my checkin went smoothly. Would definitely recommend this space to anyone looking for some privacy in a chill pad.

Susan was very nice and easy to communicate with, timely responses. The room was adequate for 2 people and no issues with bathroom traffic (since shared bathroom). Location is great, so close to Time Square that we could walk to so many things without having to take the subway.

Clearly recommended option a NYC. We have had a great appartment and host. Nice hospitality and help received everytime. Host always available which is very important when you are away.  Location is excellent. We'll clearly come back to Reza's place in the future.

Nicole's place was very comfortable & suited our needs for a short visit to New York. We had never been to New York, so the neighborhood seemed a little scary, but everyone was very nice. It was very quiet, which surprised us & we were comfortable walking at night, since there were others doing so as well. We noticed a lot of people walking their dogs in the neighborhood & the neighbors were very pleasant as well. There are many places to eat nearby as well as little grocery shops. The subway is about a 5 minute walk away. Nichole kept her home nice & warm & it was a nice retreat from the super cold weather. The master bedroom bed was so comfortable, that my husband had to ask what kind it was. 
     Nichole gave great advice on nearby places to eat & shop. We would definitely stay here again. Excellent value. 
     Thank you Nichole.

My stay in Queens was fantastic. The apartment is simple and functional and it fulfilled exactly what I was looking for; a bed and my own door to it. The heated floors were a nice touch though I would bring slippers next time because it could get a little too toasty! Eric was extremely accommodating especially to my asking for a two hour extended stay time because of the late holiday festivities that revolve around New Years. Upon checking in, I received the keys, was told how everything works, and did not see our host again. However, he was readily available through text. I enjoyed the privacy of the room and that of which the host gave us. 
I recommend this place for those looking for a simple place to crash.

Margarita was an amazing host! She communicated extremely well and left notes and candies to welcome our stay. Place was exactly as described. Just minutes from the C and 1 Train and get to anywhere in Manhattan within 5 to 40 minutes by Subway. Lots of eating places around the place and a great bakery on 161 st and Broadway, La Estrella that has amazing breakfast,pastries and coffee. We went from the Holidays after X-Mas to after New Years and the weather was frigid but her place and the building was ALWAYS nice and warm! A GREAT VALUE! A EVEN GREATER HOST!

Christine was a really nice host. Very welcoming and she seemed genuinely happy to host visitors.

The apartment is really well located in the heart of Park Slope. The bedroom was very comfy and the private bathroom very clean.

Christine offered breakfast in the morning which was also a very nice touch. All together it was a really nice stay.

Highly recommended!

Not a good experience. The place needs a lot of tidying and cleaning! Also we were unlucky with noise and a smelling fridge and freezer. On the plus side, Cate kept a friendly tone through all our communication (only text messaging).
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Lovely place to stay in Brooklyn! Nicola was very responsive to any questions/ help I needed. Definitely one of the top Airbnb's I've stayed in!
He is a great host!!! He offered me a place to stay last minute and was able to make last minute accommodations!! I highly recommend staying with Daniel!!

Es excelente. Tiene excelente ubicacion y la calidad VS el precio es muy coherente.
Lo recomendamos a las personas que lo quieran rentar

Will is an attentive and gracious host.  He wants your stay to be wonderful and goes the extra mile to make that happen.  Need a 2 am check in on Christmas Day, as I did?  Not a problem.  Light sleeper?  White noise machine provided.  Spacious place in a walkable community with a great host.
Elma is een zeer vriendelijke vrouw met een kamer in een leuk appartementen complex in Brooklyn. Vlakbij de metro. Geniet van haar praatjes en slaap heerlijk.

I had a wonderful New Year's stay at Isaac and Izzy's place. Even though I was in the same apartment as my gracious hosts, the bedroom and bathroom were on a separate floor which offered me a lot of privacy. The bed was comfortable, there was plenty of closet space, and a personal heater in the bedroom enabled me to fine-tune the temperature to my liking. I also enjoyed my coffee conversations with Isaac in the morning as we mused about the different lifestyles between East and West Coast. Overall, a great stay!
Beautiful Vibes, Comfortable bed, and cozy home! Would come back anytime

Elise was quick to respond to my inquiry and was great at communicating with me every step of the way. The apartment is exactly as listed, perfect for any couple looking to relax and rest during a trip to NYC. I would absolutely stay again and recommend to people in the future.
We like this cozy apartment. It's located in a safe and convenient neighborhood and the price is quite reasonable. The host is also very helpful and responsive. We enjoyed our two nights stay.

Had a great stay over Christmas at Nicole's place. Nicole gave clear directions and instructions for the check in, and was very responsive during the whole stay. The flat itself is exactly as described, very spacious, well furnished and in good style,and in a great location.
Femi's place served my purpose for the time that I needed it. He is very responsive to the guests needs. He provides a good value.
The apartment was as described. The location was great. Hayley was super great to work with and made everything so easy.
Great place great price. Convenient.
Ok
good location, fair price

This accommodation is pretty good. There are grocery stores down pharmacy, they are closed from here, just it takes about 5-7 minutes on foot. Also, Starbucks and Shake Shucks, it takes about 10 minutes on foot from this accommodation. 
Pretty easy to go to lower Manhattan and Bronx. Also, there are Columbia University and beautiful church. You should visit those places.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good.
Allie was very nice and the place was very close to where we were going so it was very convenient.

The hostess is great, nice cozy apartment in Brooklyn with really good furniture and kitchen unit perfect for 2. The building is nice and has a small beautiful backyard. The bodega in the corner is really helpful in case of emergencies. A bit of a walk to the subway station, plenty of places to grab a quick bite. Overall an amazing place to stay.
perfect location. close to metro station and central park. walking distance to the MET.
My wife and I stayed here and we would highly recommend. Great communication with the host and the place was incredible!
Great place and great host. Will visit again when the opportunity is given.

I enjoyed resting here, and the gentle night lights located around the apartment and around the house were extremely helpful. The bed was comfortable and several great restaurants were within walking distance or easily reached by public transportation. This is a place I would definitely revisit if the opportunity arises.
Good location with an awesome private shower/bathroom. Very well hosted,  comfortable bed, and loved the cat.

This was a great location, i really loved this place and would definitely stay again. It is very accommodating for multiple people. I spend New years here with friends and felt very comfortable. Its very spacious and again central location.
Alex's place is in a perfect location, only blocks from time square. Cute, clean, modern stay for a couple or even for one. Definitely would love to stay here again! :)

Wonderful stay! Comfortable clean apartment and a short walk to the train into Manhattan. Jane was very responsive and helpful with check-in. I look forward to staying again when I get back to Flushing!

The apartment is nice and is placed in a very convenient location, next to restaurants and the subway. However, it's in a 4th floor and there is no elevator. So getting to the unit with senior people and luggage can be extremely challenging. I wish the description would have captured this fact as I'd have chosen a different one. Anyway, Brooke has been flexible with ththe check in and check out times.
Cassi's apartment is warm and comforting, she was very thoughtful on leaving tea, fruit, extra gloves and a sweater for the weather. Everything was just as described and I had a great experience!
Brad was a very hospitable host, it is a small space as you expect in NY, but clean and comfortable, with a great location near subway/buses and away from the touristy, crowded parts of the city
Awesome place; would definitely go back and stay. Hardly anything negative to say except.......please provide a can / tin opener :)

Daphne is definitely great! She is so easygoing and her room was so clean and cozy. Just near the train station and beside the Columbia University. I like this room so much and she helps us a lot in traveling in NYC. Strongly recommend!

Maxwell's place is cozy with lots of sunlight and is in a great location. He is super responsive and provided us with ample information and recommendations. From his place, the subway is easily accessible and there is much to do in Bushwick as well. Great place to stay.
Thank for the hospitality. Beautiful newly renovated apartment. It was a 2 minute walk to the subway and 15 minute commute to manhattan.
Good location but bit too much odor

This place was Amazing! Very warm and welcoming. Everyone was quite friendly. The accommodation is also quite close to the subway, with a direct connection to the airport. There are plenty of convenience stores and fast food places located minutes away.  This all makes this an Amazing place. It was my first time in Brooklyn and I loved it!
Very nice place, clean and comfortable, close to the metro station and full of stores and restaurants. Highly recommended
Really lovely room and very friendly hospitality
A great place if you need to be close to get in and out of the city. A shared bathroom but there was rarely anybody there to use It. I would definitely recommend It.

The access to the suite is through Lance's personal main living space. I only actually only saw him twice during my stay. Pleasant host and was very communicative and accommodating with check in/check out bc of my early travel time. Once down there I was pleasantly surprised to know the suite space is an entire unshared 1br apt. Although it is a basement apartment, it does not feel like a basement at all! And literally around the corner from the subway.  

The space is clean, warm, comfortable and well appointed with modern streamable smart TVs, dinnerware, utensils and even coffee, tea, and bottled water. The stairs to access the suite is a bit much as it's two flights down but it's well lit and the furniture and brand new bedroom set/mattresses were very comfortable. It was too cold to utilize the backyard space but it was very spacious and looked inviting. Thx Lance for being a great host. I'll be back!!
Great place in the Rockaways! Charming ground floor apartment facing a backyad. Tastefully decorated. Comfortable barhroom even though it could do with a brush-up.

Erik was a great host, he was quick to respond to our queries and even gave my friends and I a few extra hours to checkout. The room is very spacious, depending on the number of people you're with, and the pictures do accurately depict it. You should also know that you do share the apartment with one other person, but she's really friendly and kind.
It is really near the subway, and around the apartment has a lot of shopping place to buy living stuff, food. In a word, it is a good place to choose for living when you have a trip in New York.
The place location is great

Christian was very helpful and a great host.  Room was comfortable and the bathroom was always clean.  There's a nice living room area and the kitchen has everything that you need if you bring your groceries.   I would highly recommend Christian and if I visit NY again I would look him up.  Thank you one more time.
New apartment and a great location, perfect for a couple. Go for breakfast to Bearcat, across the street!
Really wonderful staying at your place. It was quiet, centrally located and the shower was amazing! Perfect find for our really fun trip to NYC. Would not hesitate for a second to stay there again!

Teddy's place is in a great location in the Village. I was able walk to the majority of the bars and restaurants. Even taking an Uber was quick and efficient. For some back story, I was looking for a last minute place to stay for New Years Eve and most Airbnbs were booked. However, Teddy's was free and he responded very quickly to my request. I would stay here again.

Rebecca's place is super nice and comfortable  in an great location! She has a big kitchen, amazing mattress in private room and cute little active kitty. She was very quick with replys and welcomed us with a cute little welcome tea and biscuit basket. Can only recommend it and we were proud being her first AirBnB guests! :)

The location of the place is unbeatable in the heart of East Village with access to restaurants, bars, and attractions within just a few steps outside. The room is very large with desk space. Carolina is very responsive and considerate and went out of her way multiple times to ensure my stay was comfortable.
Wonderful place, perfect location near main subway lines and supermarket. One of the best views of Manhattan. Hans is a great host, he help us in everything we need.

I had a great stay. Excellent coffee, hosts took care of anything I needed and were available and helpful. The room is nice with a useful writing desk and comfortable bed. Location a few steps from subway, very convenient.
Excellent value, great location. Easy check in and check out with the box. Comfy bed and clean apt
The studio is very spacious and the location is great. Martani was an excellent host and had great communication skills so there were no worries when checking-in. I give this home five stars.

Emily is a fantastic host! The space is tucked away, perfect for privacy while visiting the big city! Emily was a great source of info about local events, and her art is beautiful! We'll definitely stay again!

Sheyla was a very welcoming host who was there at check in to give us a quick tour of her home. She truly went out of her way to let us know things we can use in the bathroom/kitchen, how we can use her Apple TV and even her portable speaker! She also made herself very available by messaging us during our stay to make sure everything was going smoothly. The area is very convenient with a subway station within a 10 minute walking distance and a public bus route right outside the apartment, which can take you to a nearby Trader Joe's, convenience stores, and local restaurants. Would highly recommend Sheyla's place to anyone wishing a very cozy stay in a delightful Brooklyn neighborhood!
Good place to stay

The place was clean and well equipped. Alberto was very nice and willing to help. The building was a hotel where some people live and there was a lot of noise from the neighbors and the heating system.
We had a good time in nyc. It would be better if there's a laundry machine in the apartment!
Was ok
The apartment is really clean and well maintained. It quiet and safe. The location is great with easy access to subways and restaurants. Connie is a great host and very helpful.

Possibly my worst experience wirh a host. Dom, was not at the location when I arrived. He was not answering his phone or messages. I had to stand out in the cold for a while to try to contact Airbnb. I happened to run in to Dom on the street while on the phone with  a rep. He was surprised that I was there and that I recognized him. He showed me to room, and at first glance .. the place was very dirty. There werw pile of trash and diry dishes everywhere. He showed me to the room and tol me he was going to have some friends come from out of state for NYE. The friends showed up and they started smoking marijuana and and have drinks. Im military,I was very clear to him before and during checking in, that I could not be around marijuana. But he still smoked and was having a great time. I told him I had to leave, and that I would call to cancel. He was very nice and just let me out, and was reseanoble about my request. After I left, all his friends started laughing as if to make fun of me for not being able to be around such a lifestyle. I booked a hotel, Airbnb refunded me after they tried to contact Dom with no aswer. Airbnb also gave me a voucher to help pay for my hotel. It was a nightmare, being in the cold trying to get this issue resolved, while looking for a place to stay after having travel from a long distance.

Very nice cozy quiet place....nice living areas kitchen and bath..the bedroom is a nice size with a queens size bed..very clean safe neighborhood..bus and stores on the corner..Wi-Fi was good too..thank you
Vanessa was a great host, she made everything very easy and was very accommodating. The place and view was immaculate. Steps away from Grand Central. Lots of options for food downstairs.
The apartment is in a safe neighbourhood and close to the subway station, restaurants, and convenience stores.
Es un excelenete lugar, espero pronto regresar.
Lovely studio in a really nice apartment building in lower Manhattan.
Loved the location and the apartment building was beautiful! The room was very clean and was exactly like the description!

Such a great location for making your NYC basecamp. Great access to amazing food within walking distance, the subway, the sights, and it's still removed from the bustle of Midtown. Ali and Mathilde are very attentive hosts when you need something and I'm grateful they made us comfortable.
John was an incredible host. His communication was great for whatever I needed definitely would stay here again.
Good stay for single traveler

Good for short term stays. Close to subway station. Nice places to eat around. 
Room was nice and the hosts were helpful regarding the heating problems in our room.
Everything ok
Kate is quick to respond and her place is a short walk from the L subway station. Overall a cozy apartment recommended for the budget traveler!

Ben was very thoughtful and would check in with us to make sure we had everything we needed while staying at his place. Quick responses with open communication. Ben was helpful making suggestions on how to go about traveling in the city. Would stay here again. Thank you for opening your home up to us!
They made my stay really easy, even going so far as to do my laundry and the location is convenient for midtown.

Yves' home is amazing! The decor is modern and chic, the appliances up to date and high quality, and overall he made our stay very nice. 

The space was a warm and welcoming one with a friendly feel, and it was SO nice to have a washer and dryer in unit! 

Finally no review would be complete without talking about the best amenity of all. Panda! She is Yves' dog, and the two of us quickly became best buddies!

5 stars and 10/10! 

Thank you Yves!

Chris is superb. Fantastic hospitality. We got a perfect stay in Chris's place. Quite neighborhood and good location. Very close to A line subway to downtown. And it is an express line. Very convenient. The surrounding also good. There are some varied resto and convenient store. We had a wonderful stay in Chris's place. Really looking forward to staying there again if we have an opportunity to visit NYC next time...

Stewart was very friendly and attentive. We stayed one night and he offered us the keys and showed us the apartament then left us to ourselves for the rest of the night. The location Is a bit deceptive as it's Is definitely not Williamsburg. I lived several years un Bushwick one stop away on Morgan Ave where there Is much more going on. That Is, theres not much nightlife within walking distance but the Subway Is 3 blocks away so you can still get to some place that is more lively.

Ekaterina was very kind and generous.  She offered breakfast items and replied pretty quickly.  She was very helpful and kind.  Her place is located within 5 minutes of a subway, by many stores and the brooklyn botanical park.  It's located about an hour away from Manhattan by subway.  Her dishes and the set up of the house are very simple yet cute.  I would definitely stay here again.
Great apartment, close to everything! Very clean and spacious, and Shay is a great and friendly host! Would definitely come again

The place is very convenient, and the price is good for locating in Manhattan. Additionally, it will be a plus if you like eat some Chinese food because the apartment is very close to the Chinatown. However, it may be a little bit noisy because it is near the street. Totally, it's a nice apartment!

We stayed at Patricia's for two days, and regret not staying more. She's a great host and a wonderful person, we loved talking to her. The apartment was super clean, cozy, warm, and beautifully decorated. Also, it's really near to the A and 1 subway. I can't find anything I didn't like about our experience there. There's a lovely cat, so maybe if you're allergic to cats you can't stay here - but anyways, the cat is super playful and cool, might be the best-cat-ever. I highly recommend the place, and would definitely come back. Bye Patricia, see you!

Great modern apartment, felt very safe walking around the area. Very close to markets, coffee shops and a nice short walk to the subway. The bed was big and comfy, loved the closet space and dresser to allow us to settle in. Ermina was super kind and greeted us/answered our questions right away, we felt right at home. The one and only negative is the shared wall between the bathroom, those pipes can be quite loud when running water. However we did a lot of sleeping in and I don't think this was an issue until the late morning. *We were supposed to leave the day that a giant snow storm hit and all flights were cancelled. Ermina didn't hesitate letting us stay an extra night.* We loveeeed sweet bunny (the cat) and would definitely here again!
Not good
Very good host, Understanding and 5 star hospitality. Would recommend to anyone that would need a nice apartment with a very nice view.

Omur is a phenomenal host! Even before booking she was very responsive and helpful. On our arrival day, she made sure to be home so that we would have a place to go to since we flew in the morning to NYC. 
Her apartment is beautiful, very organized, and extremely clean. 
The room was very comfortable with a large bed and she made space for us to hang our clothes. 
Her welcome kit was great! My girlfriend loved it. She had fresh towels, slippers, earplugs, and a mask. Everything was set up perfectly on top of the bed with a card containing the wifi information. The attention to detail was phenomenal. The room was also equipped with 2 chargers: 1 iphone and 1 samsung. In the corner she had a water and 2 glasses for us. 
She even printed out maps highlighting the places she recommends near the apt and in manhattan. 

Omur made the entire place available for us and even invited us to make ourselves at home with her coffee, snacks, and fridge. My girlfriend was also very excited to have a salon quality hair dryer she could use for the cold winter days. 
The apartment is located in a very nice area with easy access to the subway. Plenty of restaurants walking distance. 
If I come back to NYC, i will certainly look to stay with Omur again. THANK YOU SO MUCH and greetings from Hollywood!
Very nice host, always available to help you, location is great, house is formidable
Free nice & cozy place, the location is perfect and the room was sparkling clean!

Yael's place is everything you want for a great experience in New York. It is walking distance from all great attractions and it has a beautiful room with a great view to enjoy your stay. Yael's hospitality was outstanding and the room is impecable. You want more? There is a WeWork two buildings away and a laundry service just in front. In sum, this is the place to stay in New York.
Great and stylish place and unbeatable location! Annamaria gave us an early checkin and replied to questions very fast!
Outstanding Hospitality and Great Hosts! It was a chilly new year's weekend but Marcia and her family made us feel warm. The cake place in teh neighborhood was also a gem. Thank you, Marcia!

Needed a place to stay in Brooklyn at the last minute after having some issues with a prior Airbnb and luckily came across Wassym's room. Simple, but nice and comfortable accommodations. Great location being close to many subway stops. Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn, like central Williamsburg were easily accessible. Great value too!

Beautiful luxury home in one of the best locations in NYC ! Had such an amazing experience- great friendly and welcoming host , beautiful views , and just an overall perfect ambience. Much better than any hotel! Highly recommend and will return
Lovely, spotless place in quiet residental neighborhood. Host very attentive, which was very fortunate as we locked ourselves out one night!
Perfect place, perfect price and perfect renter give us a perfect experience.

Thanks Pablo for offering such a great space for my youth group. The amount of beds and proximity to grocery were perfect for us. A 24 hr pharmacy below for quick items was nice also. We enjoyed Time Square and Central Park among the many tourist attractions with easy subway access. We hope to see you again in the future. Michelle

Great view of the city, very convenient location to the subway. A very short trip to Times Square. The linens were dirty with something crusty on the top sheet, and the apartment had a strong odor, almost like cigarette smoke. The bathroom was shared, so a bit messy. Overall a very nice, quiet building but there were some cleanliness issues for me.
Its a good pick for a traveller who only looks for a place to lay his bags and have a sleep after a day in NYC!
Good location and small little cozy room.
Great value for a very cool new hotel in a great area!

Alex was extremely helpful with everything. His check in time was very flexible and the room was very clean. If you want places to go, you can always ask him and he'll give you a spot and maybe a connection at the place too. My experience was extremely good at this place.

It was such a luck to be her first guest.! :) I really enjoyed staying her place and location is perfect in Brooklyn. There was a subway station 59sec away from the house. I could go to downtown in Manhattan within 15~20 min. 
Williamsburg is great place to feel Brooklyn.

And Amanda is so friendly, she would love to share local info. It was helpful to travel. I like her dog Walter. So adorable!! You can see him talking haha.

The best things about her house are the rooftops where you can see the skyscrapers of Manhattan and the high ceilings. 

If I go to NewYork again, I will definitely stay at her house again.
Thank you, Amanda!
Garret has a nice small house but includes everything you need. Like this small house uses all space .

The host is very friendly, helpful and respond quickly. My flight is 6:00 pm and I wanted to visit some attractions during the daylight. The host allowed me to check out after 11:00 am. Very nice apartment and host.
Very cozy place in Harlem. The value of this apartment is like none other. Highly recommend! The place is close to the subway as well which is a bonus.

First time to NYC, first time using airbnb, first time saw the snow! Thanks Sophia provide us such a perfect place and the information. Thanks Sara, we have a really good time to stay with you, you're so kind to take good care of us,  must be visit again these lovely family in the future!
Very clean apartment with a kind, responsive host. Room is very spacious, would room again if I needed to!
Nice place
The private room was clean. Location is a short walk from Jamaica Station. Overall good value for the price. Would highly recommend for students or couples on a budget.
Janae was a kind and thoughtful host, we really enjoyed talking to her. The room is cozy and nice-- really good value for the price. Safe and convenient location. Thanks for everything!!!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

He was very responsive and always taking care of us.
Although I booked one day before my arrival, he responded shortly and arranged baggage drop off before check-in time.
However, the location is a bit far from the metro station (10 min walk) and the room was not very sufficient for three.
Perfectly clean and in a decent neighborhood. Room pretty small.

Very nice room, great location, and very easy check in and check out. Maria responded very fast and was very helpful. I would definitely recommend this spot if you need a place to stay in the city for a few days!

Eduardo's place was sparkling clean. The wooden floors shined and the white tiled bathroom felt like a spa! I loved the little yardley soaps they left out for guests as well as dental hygiene products. Eduardo was very welcoming and kind, recommended restaurants in the area, and let me know I could contact him for anything. The place is perfect if you are visiting students at Columbia but is also a quick subway ride to midtown or downtown manhattan. It's nice to be away from touristy aspects of manhattan but with a quick bus or subway ride be able to check out the Met, the Guggenheim, the Natural History Museum and more. Great space, beautifully decorated and it made me feel instantly at home.

I did not meet Johana but her friend Diego. He was really nice! The apartment  was perfect! Very nice location, near a lot of restaurants, close to the subway. Despite meeting Johana, she was texting me to help me finding the apartment and to make sure everything was ok. Thank you very much Johana! I just can recommend her apartment! 

Marc
Great stay and great host! Place was neat and clean, very stylish and close to everything!
An absolutely beautiful apartment, people would dream of living in this place. Also in one of the best areas in nyc right next to Soho were there is tons of shopping and great food. 5 stars.
This apartment is beautiful. There are several windows allowing for a ton of natural light, the bedrooms are wonderful, two bathrooms are a plus, and their communication was excellent.
Room had the basics, super friendly host, and very good location in a very quiet neighborhood.
I booked this bedroom for a night and the stay was better than we expected. The room was very big and neat, the bathroom was clean and the guy has been available.

Katy's a great host. My previous host cancelled on me last moment and she got back to me quite quickly, so I didn't get stranded. However, a better furnished room would be better, even though its quite clean. She is also very helpful, in terms of lending local tips.

Jennifer is in the house a lot which is not an issue because she is an effective communicator. The location is perfect and I was able to get everywhere I needed to go. She's a great host, always kept the space super toasty which made for a nice return from the bitter NYC winter cold each evening. Know that her dog Mindy may seem scary at first but once you give her a treat she is ridiculously sweet after. I'm going to miss that pup.

What a wonderful place to stay in Greenpoint. Wonderful people, great eats, and worked really well with the things we had to do in the area. Very nice place, would highly-recommend if you're looking in the area. Great value, wonderful space, couldn't have found something better.
Super clean and access to some really great subway lines!
Really nice,  helpful and funny person!
Great experience.  Zihui and her roommate were very friendly, helpful, and hospitable.  Highly recommend.
Great value place in perfect Greenpoint Location. Great communication with the very kind host.
Great host. Great stay. Excellent communication and happy to offer extra information/tips if requested.

The place is clean and quiet in a  trendy neighborhood. The communication with Erin was fast and easy. She gave me the information that I asked on the neighborhood,restaurant, things to do. I would definitely go back without hesitating and recommend.
Excelente ubicacion

My best friend and I stayed at Asha's place after our previous Airbnb reservation fell through. It was a blessing in disguise. Our NYC experience rocked largely because of Asha's hospitality and lovely space!

SPACE: Asha has impeccable taste. Though she recently moved into this apartment, the space is wonderfully decorated. It is obvious to the undiscerning eye that she put a lot of thought and love into the endeavor. We felt at home and the room in which we stayed in was cozy and inviting. Though the building is historical, there was a perfect balance of old-school charm and modernity. 

LOCATION: You will not be disappointed. The neighborhood is safe and approximately a five-minute walk from the Utica subway station. My friend and I were able to get to many areas of the city fairly quickly and appreciated the convenience. 

COMMUNICATION: Asha is incredibly responsive. She responded to our reservation in a matter of minutes and addressed all of our questions. She communicated her house rules, none of which were unreasonable, and was understanding and flexible when we had to push back our check-in time. We were also impressed with her thorough check-in. She walked us through the space, informed us of every thing we could possibly need to know about it, provided us with local recommendations for dining and shopping, and encouraged us to reach out to her if we needed additional assistance or to relay feedback that could help improve our stay.

HOST: Asha is one of the most warm, friendly, and charming hosts we have met. We could not be more thankful for her hospitality and generosity. Asha ensured we felt comfortable and at home. Her expectations of us were reasonable and straightforward. We appreciated that she wanted us to feel at home and struck the perfect balance between being involved and allowing us the space to be independent. 

BOTTOM LINE: Book this space! You will not regret the value, convenience, or experience!
Nice room and great location!

The place was fairly nice but smaller than it looked in the picture.  The situation with the elevator was troublesome (one being out of order) (second was very slow) . There is a 3rd elevator but you have to do some navigating through the building to get to it. Also, wouldn't hurt to upgrade the tv. I never spoke with Alberto directly,  but he did always respond in a timely manner.
Jeffrey was a great host. Very easy to communicate with both him and Mike who helps take care of guests when Jeffrey is traveling. Good location and value.
From the small touches throughout the apartment to the local nuances, this conveniently located airbnb is a great place to stay.
This was my first time trying AirBnB and it turned out to be a really good experience. Karries is such a nice host. Her place is clean and very comfortable. Would definitely recommend her place.
Travis place was beautiful and spacious. Located in a lively neighbourhood, there were plenty to do and super convenient for transportation - would definitely stay again!

The room is a good place to stay for a short layover and has enough facilities (refrigerator, shower, small kitchen, etc).

Less suitable for friends, families or for staying at the apartment for an extended period of time (more than a few days).
Great place to stay! A short walk to the nearest subway station, beds are super comfortable and space is very accommodating.
A charming space in Chelse, close to restaurants, High Line and subway.  Emma was a gracious host and quick to respond to any questions we had.  Lovely visit!
Very clean and quiet atmoshere

The host was amazing, extremely friendly and helpful with my luggage. I only wish it was listed as bunk beds and rooms shared with more than one occupant. The cleanliness of the rest room and bedroom weren't as clean as I'd hoped and the girl I roomed with was super noisy. Felt bad that I changed my reservation because the host was so nice but I hope this review helps further assist both the host and guests going further.
Very reasonable price in a premium location. Almost like you're staying in a hotel!
A really lovely space that we managed to snag very last minute - everything was clean and the view was nice. Thanks !
The host is amazing! He is so friendly.
Overall i had a good experience.
This is a very affordable and quiet place

Great and clean place, good location and easy access, very spacious and all new and stylish amenities. Host was extremely professional and helpful. The best host we have had. Gustavo (the host) is an Ace! Many thanks and hope to rent the place on next occasion in New York (Website hidden by Airbnb) net, the place is a great value. You will not be disappointed!
The place is perfect for small get togethers, and an over night stay. The description is very accurate and the host is super friendly.
Awesome location! Loved the place. Very cozy! Would definitely stay again

Lina is awful as host , a liar , a racist,  a waist , a scam ...
Never book this place cuz u will be definitely disappointed ....
Nice space, one bathroom doesn't have cold water, and there isn't 2 queen beds just one
Don't do it !

The apartment looks even better than the pictures! Very clean apartment and very comfortable bed. It's just a short 5 minutes walk to get to the Times Square. If you are easy disturbed by street noises you better have some earplugs with you, but that's big city life.
Great place

Vitaly is a great host
Very good communication 
He did a mistake by listing is place with entire place but it was a private room 
I think he made the corrections already

Brian is a great host with great communication. Brian's place is very comfortable, clean, and spacious compared to other NYC locations we've stayed in. Thanks for helping to create a great trip for us.

Sandra was super fast to reply to all my messages and she was super flexible in accommodating my check in time with my flight arrival time.
The place is perfectly located near the Bedford L train stop, the neighborhood is great and there are plenty of options to have amazing food.

I will definitely come back !
Nice location. Definitely a sweet deal regarding to the price.

Esti was a fantastic host. She was very responsive and helpful, and the apartment was very comfortable and clean. The neighborhood around the apartment has a lot of great food and culture to offer which was a huge plus. The space was perfect for 5 people and anytime we had questions Esti and Mayer responded to us quickly and made the whole process of being there very easy. If you're looking for a nice spot in a great neighborhood in Brooklyn I would highly recommend Esti's place!

Stayed here as part of family of 4.  It is a basic studio apartment, probably better suited for 2 people but still comfortable enough for 4.

Here is what we liked:
- apartment was very clean
- excellent location - many shops and huge variety of restaurants on 37th street or Northern Boulevard are a short walk away.   Also the 7 train, which we took to/from Manhattan, has a stop on 90th street which is very close to the apartment.  
- main bed was very comfortable.  Note that second bed is an air mattress, my kids slept on it, this was included in the original listing so we were fine with this.
- Host was very responsive and helpful - host had forgotten to provide a hairdryer and made the effort to deliver the following day.

Here are some things to keep in mind:
- We stayed in the apartment in February.  The apartment is in an older building and in the winter the upper floors get very hot as the heat can not be finely controlled.  We had to sleep with some of the windows open.   From experience, I believe this is out of the hosts' control, it is just the way these buildings operate.  I did not check with the host to determine if there was a way to turn off or turn down the heat.
- the apartment was missing some basic items.  These are easily correctable for future guests and I have communicated details to the host.  As mentioned above, the host is very responsive and wants her guests to have a comfortable stay.

Overall I would recommend this place and would stay here again in the future.

When you put an architect and a designer living together in Brooklyn you are bound to have a beautiful space. The apartment was huge and bright with a distinct touch and the people living there were nice and hospitable, there is a really comfortable access to the subway making it close enough to the main city to make it easy to get there but distant enough to not be bothered by its loudness and intense pacing. The neighborhood is distinct, making it a nice location by itself with a really strong Brooklyn vibe. Even though Emmet was in Thailand he responded my questions quickly and precisely, I never felt lost and was extremely satisfied with its great price tag. Soooo: nice place, nice people, nice location, nice price. Nothing to complain about really.
Was a super cool host, friendly and very considerate. Really stylish place with some really cool artwork of hers over the place and pretty well priced - great value.
Great place, great treatment by Alex. Will come back
Its a good place , super clean apartment and comfortable bed. Would recommend it to others

Our short stay at Jackee's place was delightful and much better than expected. Her kindness and attentiveness during our stay made the experience outstanding compared to our previous experiences while staying in NYC. Jackee assisted us with a late check-in after going through a snow storm while on our way to NYC, promptly responded to all of our messages and guided us while we were in town. Her place was neatly clean and organized.  She even provided vegan-friendly breakfast to us, which we found to be a great plus. We will definitely stay at Jackee's place again on our next visit to NYC. Thank you and many blessings to you, Jackee!
IT WAS A VERY GOOD PLACE TO STAY .

Vincent is a fantastic host! He always responded within minutes, and he was very accommodating. His apartment is in a great location, and it was super clean and stylishly decorated. Plenty of room for 4-5 people. I would definitely stay here again!
its an okay place

This place is perfect! Caitlin is a wonderful host, who knows a lot about the area, has great taste in coffee, and really keeps the apartment in good shape. The couch and pillows were unexpectedly comfortable.

The loft is in a great location very close to the subway. The place is newly renovated, modern, bright and very spacious. The hosts were communicative and even accomodated a late checkout for us, which really helped.
It was a very clean, cozy, and lovely place! I strongly recommend it.

Amber's place is amazing, my favorite thing was the perfect view from the bed (which is beyond comfortable), everything was way better than I expected, well located, cozy, clean and you can even meet the best cat ever... Amber is a great host! Super friendly, sweet and kind. I really enjoyed my nights there... Highly recommended!
Great place right in the heart of Time Square. The hosts were quick to answer any questions we had immediately. Cozy space yet very comfortable.
Great Location and comfortable stay. Close to train station and great restaurants. Highly recommended.

Good location, just a few blocks from Penn Station in Korea Town. Apartment was cleaning and well kept. The bed was a bit small for two people if one person is on the large side but a second mattress is available. Apartment is a fourth floor walkup so there are a few stairs to climb. Yejin was very responsive and gave us plenty of information to find the apartment and get in.
The location is in hip bushwick which was super convenient for what I was in town for. The place was very clean and adorable. Great value & find! Would definitely stay here again!
Maria's place was everything we needed! Great location, super clean, and very functional. Maria was also great at communicating and was a wonderful host! We had a great stay!

Got to the place and werent able to check in right away since we didnt get any of the information we needed. Had to wait outside 30 minutes before we got any kind of response. One we got a hold of Ryan it took us about 15 minutes to check in. Make sure you get app and key code before hand. The place was nice and the area was quiet. The only issue we had besides check in was that one of the showers fell and we wasted half of our Saturday while people came in to fix it.

Lindsay's place was everything we could ask for. We have stayed in dozens of Airbnbs and this was the nicest, by far. The fixtures and furnishings were all high quality. The bed was comfy. Everything just felt right. Lindsay was accommodating and quick to respond to any questions we had. If you are looking for a place in one of Brooklyn's best neighborhoods, look no further than Lindsay's.
Hosts were very friendly, hospitable and caring. The apartment is clean and located in a nice neighborhood, walking distance to the subway. 2 miles from Brookdale hospital. Would stay here again.
The apartment was just as described. Host was very quick to responding to our messages. Overall, a great experience!

Had an awesome stay at Levent's place. He is a sweet and caring person, even though my flight arrived late at 12 am on a weekday he waited for me outside in the chilling winter cold to make sure I didn't miss the apartment for check in. The location is superb, surrounded by local restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets and laundromats, all within 1 minute walking distance.
I had to book this place at the last minute but the host James was very fast to respond my questions and super helpful!
Great value, in a convenient area with free street parking, host was very easy to communicate with and there were no issues! My friends and I had a great stay overall:)

This place is amazing. Far beyond my expectations. Luciano and his wife were wonderful hosts, with great communication and a care. The view was magnificent and the building is just spectacular. The house is beautifully decorated and features all modern appliances and fixtures. I would love to stay here again one day.

I booked & paid for the room for an entire month, then found out a day later that I only needed it for the first two weeks. I requested a change and a refund for the second half and expected to be denied since the host is under no obligation to accept a change after you pay. But Mark is a really good guy and accepted the change with zero hassle. That's worth 5 stars in my book!

Leslie was a superb host. Clear and easy communication for check in, and everything in the space was completely accurate. Safe and hip neighborhood as well. She was a pleasure to meet and get acquainted with. Recommend this space for sure!
Great time
Thank you
Great Airbnb for the price. Stylist clean. Sonia is also very friendly and is around to answer any questions you might have

Not located as advertised. The front door lock has issues - I got locked in twice with no one around to help, and missed an important meeting. There was evidence that the host went into my "private" room in my absence (bedroom door cannot be locked from the outside). Otherwise, the place is clean. Your call!
Adrian is a great host. He is very helpful and friendly. Not great location but it is close to subway. Good place for crashind and awesom price. Thank`s!

Amazing location, very clean and homey. Barbara and Michael were great hosts they were extremely helpful suggesting places to eat and places to go around the area! Will love to come back in the warmer months to use the private backyard

I found there were a few things that weren't expressed up front. Like hidden fees later. And some things were unclear like whether or not we could use cleaning supplies. And I know fees were sprung on the other person staying too. And sometimes I was unsure if he enjoyed my company or not. But other than that, it was a very clean house, with a really kind host. I always felt safe and it was very close to the subway.
Neeraja is a fantastic host. My stay at her place was great, really nice and great location.
Surrounded by nice places to eat.
Shannon is very responsive and available if need be. Her location is awesome with it only being a few steps away from the metro station in a great neighborhood.
Tiffany was an outstanding host! The space was clean, beautiful and comfortable. The location was outstanding and communicating with Tiffany was a breeze. I would highly recommend!!
Very great place to stay in, private as well. Felt comfortable staying there and very close to the subway and local restaurants, nightlife and bars.

I had the pleasure of staying in Carissa's while doing rotations at a nearby hospital. Carissa is an excellent host, very accommodating,  considerate, clean, and respectful. The room is large with high ceilings, 4 huge windows, a comfortably sized bed, and tidy. The room has it's own private entrance and guests have their own full bathroom that is very clean! Carissa's room is located all the way on the other side of the apt, which allows for more privacy and minimal noise. The apartment is located near the M and J lines ( quick 5min walk to the station). The neighborhood is trendy, with plenty of restaurants, cafes, and bars to explore around the Bushwick area. I have no problem recommending Carissa's place to other students looking for temporary housing.
Great place, quick responses, very hospitable

CJ was a great host. She knows the area really well and offered great tips on where to eat. She's also very friendly! The place was VERY clean and the apartment is spacious. The location was very conveniently located on top of a convenient store. There's a soul food place right across and a hip French restaurant close by.  And many other food stops. Best of all, the subway station for the A and C line is just a 6 minute walk. It was a great choice!

Host was very good about communication and was able to provide a smooth check in even though he was not there when I arrived. The apartment is very modern and clean. The host was very welcoming and provided amenities. Would definitely stay here again!

Michelle is a wonderful host! Super responsive and thoughtful, and the apartment is great as well. Beautiful building, and very conveniently located to landmarks, as well as to transportation around the city.

This was a great location in a clean one bedroom with an excellent host.  The neighborhood has a lot to offer if you wish to explore. Neighborhood  is alive with many place open til 4AM. So many cultures represented here and it is reflected in all the diverse food/restaurant options. Mama's Empanadas are a must.
Convenient to midtown  from a short walk to subway. Accommodations where very comfortable. Bed and  pull out couch, where my son slept, were very good.

Marko's place is an amazing value! It's an old building and not in the best part of town but the convenient location, host response, cleanliness, and spacious room made it a great stay. Would recommend.

Jonny is truly one of the kindest people I've met in the world! He was so responsive to my messages and went out of his way to meet me ASAP at the apartment. This is the perfect spot for a comfy night's sleep, centrally located in Hells Kitchen, very comfortable bed, pillow, and duvet, a kitchen that you can cook in!! I couldn't appreciate his hospitality more- such a kind person, nicely decorated apartment, very grateful for him!

Very nice apartment on high floor, building directly above subway station. One of the best I have been to in the upper east side. Contact was very friendly and responding quickly. Would love to come again.

The stay at Kennedy's place was quite interesting. First of all, his roommates were very welcoming and nice! The room was in the basement next to the working studio which was also listed in the description but it wasn't listed that there was no real window, so you didn't get any fresh air or sunlight down there. The room itself was nice and the bedsheets were clean. But the bathroom really wasn't, it felt quite unsanitary.. The location of the accommodation on the other hand is good and within a couple of minutes you reach bus and subway. So, since the airbnb is quite cheap for New York you can't expect luxury, but you could expect cleaner facilities.
Maxim was a great host, very friendly and hospitable. Very welcoming and always there if I needed help. I really enjoyed my stay. The place was very fresh and clean and comfortable with nice decor.

Needed a place to disconnect couple days from the city and Carmen made it happened, she accommodated us like we were at home. She also prepared a delicious breakfast I'm not gonna forget. This place is all related with the sea and the ocean. If you wanna feel like you're at mikonos, this is the place.

Carmen is one of the best hostess I've ever met. She's the most funniest and friendly person!! Highly recommended.
Beautiful Brooklyn apartment. Access to the roof for stunning views. Would definitely stay again!
Clean!

Rasmy is a wonderful host: my late afternoon flight from London into NYC continued to be delayed throughout the day. This would have resulted in a middle of the night arrival. Rasmy was unphased by this and remained in contact throughout as things got more and more delayed. The flight was eventually cancelled and I arrived the following evening. 

The flat is very clean, nice amenities provided and is conveniently located 10 mins walk from Grand Central station. Great value.
Malcolm is an awesome host. Although he was not physically available at the place but he made sure I had no problems. I strongly recommend his apartment
He was super nice and easy to communicate with. A great host! Towels and sheets were clean. And clean drinking water was available. He was super thoughtful.
John is a great host. Clear instructions. The room was clean and warm. I would recommend

What a great place! The view of the Hudson is priceless. Convenient walking distance to the theater district, subways and great restaurants. Communication with Alex was clear and easy! Perfect NYC getaway!
Perfect Place!
Mehmet was extremely courteous and knowledgeable about the neighborhood. The space is very clean and close to the subway and many restaurants and stores.
Great location, great place, great host, would totally recommend!
