Loved our stay.  Great location to trains.  Great italian pizza on the corner.
Great place to stay. The host are great and the process was not comolex at all. This is a no brainer. However, if you drive, parking sucks...its Canarsie brooklyn so take note

Bella and her friends were very accommodating and welcoming. Check-in and check-out were flexible, which was really convenient for me. Everything you need is within a couple of blocks of the room, whether it's the post office, grocery store, bar, barber or public transportation. Overall, an enjoyable stay.
The accommodations are bare bones, but clean and quiet. I ran into the building maintenance manager and she was very friendly. The host is very friendly and professional.
Great location because it  was close to the train, the room was clean, the host was responsive

A good place to flop your head at night. Close to airport and subway. A clean basement apartment with a comfortable mattress and a TV to stream your Netflix and Hulu, hot shower. It is very minimal but worth the price. Host is friendly and communicative.

Very clean, comfy and sooooo quiet.
I will definitely stay when I am in town.
Thanks,
Miranda
Great guy
Enjoyed my stay here. The place was clean, super convenient and close to everything! Thank you!
Great, very stylish, comfortable place, so easy to get anywhere else in the city, great communication- 10/10 Will  (hopefully) stay here again some other time.
Very clean and spacious property...
Nice place, friendly people

The hosts of this home were ABOVE and BEYOND accommodating! We "broke" one of the "rules" and brought an under two year old. *****PLEASE NOTE WE WERE VERY UPFRONT WITH OUR HOSTS.***** They agreed to take us on. Let me tell you our hosts were not only accommodating but took the time to make sure the little one was safe. We even got a call to see if we needed a high chair! This is NOT the experience we have had with other airbnbs. Our hosts were so attentive to our needs without being intrusive. The apartment was PRISTINE!  We were steps away from the subways. We could have made it into Manhattan in a "New York" minute if we so desired. BUT the reason for our trip was to meet Granddaughter #3! We only traveled around Brooklyn. BUT Brooklyn....What can I say? So many things to do! From this apartment you are "steps" away from the Children's museum! I could go on from here but urge anyone seeking a family friendly place with all the amenities available to you right outside your door to contact Michael!

Amazing spot and very clean! Just a 3-4 minute walk to the ACD lines especially if you catch the A you'll be in Times SQ in 10 mins. Great host who makes you feel so welcomed but also gives you free range to do what you want.
My friends and I are really thankful for a friendly atmosphere and hospitality Wilson and his family provided. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

Tetiana and Olga are amazing hosts, they are very kind, helpful, responsive and flexible. They also take care of the details to make sure you are very comfortable.
The apartment is extremely clean, spacious, quiet and fully equipped. The location is very convenient, steps from the subway station, bus stops, Target, stores, bakeries and restaurants.
I mean this place was great. Also right next to subway station.
Had a great time and the host was amazing !!!
Great location and communication.

This apartment is well located ! Williamsburg is very nice, you have everything around. Visit my profil to look at my map.

We were 5 min walk from the subway, which was fantastic but because of that the apartment was vibrating every time a train was passing underneath.  We had no problem sleeping though ! 

Jolene was a sweet host. She gave us everything we needed, answer my messages as soon as she got them. You can not ask for better. She and her roommates were cool and not noisy. 

The apartment was clean, we had our own bathroom. 

I highly recommand Jolene and her apartment!

The hotel was really good.  They have some kinks to work out, but I'm confident they will very soon, as the hotel was only open for one month when I stayed there.  The staff was really nice and did what they could to make it up to me for having to change rooms.

The one thing I will note is that the hotel tax is collected by the hotel at checkout, and can be significant.  This was a surprise to me because in other cities, AirBNB collects hotel taxes directly, so I thought the tax was included in what I paid AirBNB.  This complaint is more about the AirBNB platform than the Freehand hotel.
Very central located. Down the street from a food market
I unfortunately could not stay through the weekend, but dealing with Yi Qun has been a delight! I look forward to my next trip back to ny!

Very positive experience! I felt welcomed by my hosts, the bed was comfortable, and the apartment was clean and organized. The room is a bit small and doesn't have windows to the exterior (there is an interior window) but that didn't both me because I wasn't spending too much time in the apartment. It's super close to the L subway line (less than 20 minutes to Manhattan) and there are lots of great places to eat in the area (try Roberta's pizza!). One thing to note is the lock for the apartment door is very tricky. It took me a couple days to get the hang of it and quickly unlock/lock. I absolutely recommend to anyone looking for a clean, convenient, and welcoming place to stay in New York.
very clean, completely renovated nice space.. neighborhood in process of gentrifying....very pleasant host...

Taj was an excellent host. Quick to respond and very attentive. He made sure throughout the trip that my stay was of satisfaction. He wasn't available to personally meet and greet however his room mate helped pass the keys over. The location was excellent, right by Bedford ave, centrally located in the heart of Williamsburg and had an amazing time exploring there with the myriad restaurants and bars.
Great host! Comfortable and cozy place in the nice area of Brooklyn - workable to the beach. I would recommend.

Sarah's place is in an amazing location in Tribeca - close to all the amenities & 3 subway stations. It also always felt safe walking around even late at night. The apartment is spacious, light & warm & has all the basic kitchen necessities you need (aka kettle & coffee maker). Sarah was really friendly & communicative and helped arrange everything we needed. I would definitely recommend this place & would stay again.

I cannot stress enough how amazing the location is. This place is literally two blocks away from Time Square. Honestly this is such a steal. I had a 7AM bus out of NYC and I could literally wake up at 6:30AM and walk the 10 minutes over the Port Authority and still be at the front of the line.
Vale is a very experience Airbnb host. She's also super friendly and accommodating. I really enjoyed getting to meet up with her and talk about her lifestyle as a New Yorker over coffee (honestly this alone was worth the trip).
The apartment itself was very much adequate. There was a nice little kitchen with all of the necessities (cups, hot water maker, stove, fridge, etc) and a nice bathroom. The room was clean and functional. It's certainly not like a hotel with a big-screen TV and marble flooring, but for someone looking for a central location to get the most out of their stay in NYC, this is the place.

The place is cute and near to many nice places at Brooklyn. We had everything from kitchen we needed which is awesome for a vacation trip. Wi-Fi stoped working but it was a detail. Definitely would recomend it.
Great location and cool host! Very responsive and a warm welcome
Great stay! Would recommend and stay again.

We loved our stay at Veronika's loft. You'll love it if you like hipster and industrial. Very convenient to the subway and the organic supermarket. Veronika's accurate communication was great. We didn't check out the rooftops, it was too cold!

This was my first time in NYC. I was looking for somewhere to make me feel at home. - Well I found it!When I landed Rosemary offered to arrange for transportation to her place. Great touch. Rosemary and her husband took the time to show me the neighborhood. Lots of great food in the area!! The place was so well kept. I really felt at home. If your looking for a great host and a great place, you definitely will fit right in here.
Enjoyable place! Despite confusion at check in, it was very agreeable.
The host canceled this reservation 35 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had such an amazing stay in Marissa's room. It was peaceful and comfortable. It was located in prime downtown with lots of trains near by, making my commute to midtown super easy. Had a really great time and will definitly book again! Thanks marissa!
Nix was a good host very prompt with  responding to any issues or questions we had ....The home was comfy we did give nix a few suggestions for the next guest which he was very open to

Amazing location in the authentic East Village, a real true New York experience. Plenty of space for a small group with two big beds. Cleanliness could use a bit of a boost but overall a really nice place.

The place was really nice and clean. If I have other events to host I will definitely contact Ali again. It was easy to contact her and she always responded back quickly. She greeted me at the door and was very sweet.
One of the best best on AirBnb. Would definitely stay again
Very nice people
i like the place
Really decent place, nice host!
Everything was as described

I really enjoyed my stay at Dmitry's and Victoria's place! They are really nice, responsive and fun! The contact about my stay before hand went really well as Dmitry replied very fast, was very flexible and willing to help. The appartment is great, the room has a very comfortable bed, a big closet to hang your clothes, and it is situated at the back of the apartment so it is quite in case you want to get some sleep. I would certainly stay here again the next time I am visiting New York and I can definitely recommend everybody to do the same!
Thanks!
Great Host

Came here to watch the Super Bowl game with a couple of friends. One of the first things I told Russell when I checked in was that this place looks even better in person! Truly such an amazing looking home with great amenities. The rooftop is huge and private, everything is remodeled. I felt so comfortable as if I were in my own home. Thanks so much!
Safe place to stay and easy to get to everything you need.
Enjoyed  my stay

The house was good and we enjoyed the stay. All the amenities were available as suggested. Did not face any problems. 

PRO:
The location is pretty convenient to a majority of the tourist places. 
Good for friends visiting the city, more like a hostel. 
Great price for a quick visit. 

CONS:
Only 1 bathroom between a lot of people. 
Might not be suitable for a family with kids.

This is a great place in an unbeatable location! The apartment was absolutely immaculate and well kept. The room + bed were comfortable and kept us warm on a cold weekend, and both looked even better than the photos. Flavia and Amanda were gracious, hospitable, and very easy to get in touch with, which made our stay relaxing and enjoyable. Also, want to give a shout out to Flavia's wonderful cat who was so sweet and fun to play with (seriously, even for those who may not be the biggest fans of cats this guy is friendly and gentle)
Cumple con lo publicado

My stay was great! Kevin was very responsive to my messages, the rooms were clean and spacious, and the apartment is less than a minute from the subway, making it easy to go anywhere in the city. I highly recommend the place to anyone and will definitely be staying again!
Clean, comfortable spot in a convenient location. Nik's communication was great.
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! <3
Great value and communication. Definitely worth every $ spent and the apartment was very clean

Danika and her family are awesome! There were so hospitable and always available in case we needed anything. Since they have a family too, they understood our needs given that we have a little one too. The space was very high end and clean. It is perfect for a family and worth every dime compared to hotels in New York. Though Brooklyn is busy, it's on a quiet side street but not too far from the express subway line and grocery store. It was the perfect home away from home. We loved it.

I've used Airbnb several times before, and this was by far my worst experience.   The neighborhood seems unsafe and gross with trash everywhere.   There is no parking anywhere. Parking isn't allowed on the street, the host doesn't allow parking in her driveway, and the nearby parking garages either don't allow overnight parking or have a non- working phone number. The host didn't know where to park, and didn't even know the color of "her" own house.  Before I even checked in, she kept asking what time I was checking out.   I'm suspicious that this isn't her home, but maybe a friend or relatives home she's using without permission.  Why else would she be so paranoid about what time I leave in the morning.  Airbnb needs to investigate this because she might be running a fraudulent business at a parent's or relative's home.
Linda's home was fantastic, great area, clean, great view, and superlative bedroom. Very thoughtful and accommodating. Would recommend to everyone. Linda is a gracious host.

This was a beautiful, artistic apartment in the perfect location in New York. Jenn was a fantastic host - very responsive to our numerous questions! The apartment feels larger than the pictures, especially for Manhattan, and the beds were very comfortable. We were three guests and could have comfortably accommodated a fourth easily. Highly recommend and amazing digs especially for the price point!

This is a great apartment, location is absolutely perfect. You have everything you need. The dining room it's beautiful and spacious, with a lovely terrace. In the master bedroom you have a balcony. Water pressure couldn't be better. You have a convenience store a pharmacy, bakery and so on within a block. The apartment was super clean. I absolutely recommend it!!
Clean, quiet and great place to stay.
Good location, nice interior.

Great appartement, very clean and warm.
Close to a subway station.
With amazing accommodations.

I stayed in David and Angela's room for 1 night.  The house was easy to find and their home is large, comfortable and fully furnished with all the amenities.  It is a safe neighborhood with lots of conveniences like nearby restaurants.  Everything was extremely clean and there was lots of storage in the room.  The room was very quiet so I slept well.  

David and Angela were extremely gracious hosts and provided local food recommendations when I first got in (I was starving) and also let me use the kitchen to make some food I brought back.  This place was an amazing value and my hosts were super friendly... They made me feel warm and welcome. Would love to stay here again...  thanks!

Jannices' place was great! My friend and I stayed there one night for Valentines day. We stayed in room 6; the space was great (2 beds just in case we got tired of each other lol). Cable TV, total privacy, everything from the photos is what you can expect. Overall great experience, just bring your own necessary amenities such as toothpaste and lotion (however we were only there for a night, so that may be different for longer stays). Jannices and her husband were readily available despite what other reviews say about communication.
Yaroslav's place is spacious, beautiful and quiet despite being in the heart of Park Slope. Super convenient and clean

Thomas' place is absolutely amazing and I would highly recommend it to anyone. It's extremely well-designed and everything just feels nice and clean. There are large windows that provide an abundance of light and a pleasant city view when you're just lounging around. The apartment seems new or recently renovated, so if you're looking for something more modern-feeling, this is the spot. There's also a washer/dryer in the unit, which is quite rare to come across. 

As a host, Thomas was very friendly and made the check-in/check-out process easy and convenient. He was quick to respond and even checked in (over text) during my stay to ensure that everything was going well. 

All in all, I have only good things to say! I would definitely stay here again.
Great up and coming neighborhood paired with a new building makes for a good launching pad for NYC adventures.

For business reasons, I often need a place to sleep & shower for a couple of nights at a time.

This is a great option, very clean and comfortable.  Andre went above and beyond to make sure I had access to anything I needed.   I had a little trouble finding parking the first night, but after some guidance from Andre, I immediately found a spot my second night.

I will certainly stay there again.
Dope pad
Nice place great host
Great location for anyone new to the big apple! Everything you will need is in 5 min walking distance. Very peaceful & clean.
Lovely space! Great service! Will book everytime I need an air bnb!
The location was great. Katya is extremely welcoming , sweet. Extremely clean. Convenient. Cozy. Peaceful even. Highly recommend.

Otavio was a friendly host, however, we did not meet him in person the weekend we stayed at his place. There was a mishap with check-in arrangements and the key to our Airbnb could not be found in the set location indicated by Otavio. We ended up having to stay in a new location provided by the host. This was not a pleasant way to begin our stay.

However, the new apartment was clean and Otavio did his best to accomodate.
Great one bedroom studio apartment close to multiple local eateries and Subway access to enjoy the many locations in NY!  Thank you to Alli and her husband for allowing us to feel welcomed in NY!
Enjoyed my stay at Christiane's apartment. Great location in Astoria close to Manhattan and lots of nice places to eat nearby.
Jared is very nice and helpful. The two Chihuahuas are very kind and lovely. The apartment is very close to Line 3.  The price is very good.
fantastic space in Times Square. easy to access. highly recommended

Mr. Ziaul an his wife are very nice people their home is beautiful an felt like home. I was glad there was parking on site an i didn't have to worry about parking. Stores an trains are very close walking distance. Respond time was excellent as well. But me an my family will definitely stay at their home again thank you so much.
You get what you pay for. Very easy check in.

Cat hair was all over the apartment when we checked in. Cat is very needy - would meow all throughout the night and therefore we needed to constantly distract it by feeding it more food. On a positive note Gal was responsive to our needs.

The place was amazing and the location was terrific. I was in a walking distance of Times Square, Herald Square, Union Square and so many other touristic attractions. The apartment was quiet which is hard to believe since it was in the heart of Manhattan. Carolle was super helpful when I had a few travel arrangement issues. Great host, very quick to respond and thoughtful. I look forward to visiting again!
Arnaud is a friendly and available host. The place is cozy, convenient, and close to the subway. The neighborhood is lovely. I strongly recommend

this place is awesome.  the building is amazing.  the location is great.  it's a luxurious and new apartment.  the host communicates quickly.  but the best thing about this place is the amazing views.  really incredible.
Very large bedroom with a variety of amenities. Very friendly host
Thank you Joshua. Amazing appartment and epic location!!! Was dry clean no complaints

Beautiful space, child friendly, hosts went out of their way to make our stay easy.
Apartment is only a few blocks from the former site of  Ebbets  Field  , where the Brooklyn Dodgers played.

Great apartment! The host responded very fast to my inquiry. The space is very nicely decorated and everything looked brand new. I was given some great recommendations for restaurants and bars during my short stay. The apartment was very clean with plenty of linens / towels / shampoo... etc. I would definitely stay here again in my next visit!

It's a nice, clean comfortable apartment. I'm pretty impressed that I saw how tidy clean it was. It's in a quiet and good area. Host is a very nice person.  I'd love to stay here when I come next time.
It was a vey stylish space and the host was always reachable. My friends and i loved every bit of the apartment and were happy about the extra amenities. Will definitely book again.
Great Fun location.
Dee's place was very homey and accommodating. Do not hesitate to book!

Stayed here for a weekend to attend a friend's engagement party. Building is easy to find and so was parking. Access to the building was easy and the elevator made things easier. Pari's apartment was small but stylish with tons of natural lighting. It's close to many restaurants, bars, and store so you do not have to uber to enjoy a night out. Would definitely stay here again.

We did a cousins trip to NYC and four adults stayed here for 3 nights and 4 days. We could not have asked for a better accommodation and location! The place was very clean and spacious and there were more than enough towels, pillows, and sheets for all of us. Dan was very communicative and clear about where everything was and how to operate all devices. We felt at home right away and looked forward each night to unwinding at the condo after being out in the city all day. The location was great and we were also able to save a lot of time when planning our schedule since there were so many great restaurants and places nearby. We felt very safe in the neighborhood and even more so in the building, where we were greeted both by a doorman and someone at the front desk. Overall, this was a pleasant and smooth experience and we highly recommend staying here!
Great host and great place to stay

The location of this apartment is fantastic!  Close to the subway and Times Square. We were met at the subway which was unexpected but awesome :)  Connie and her sister both respond very quickly and are super helpful.

Great location, very comfortable apartment, has everything you need and sparkling clean! Victoria was very helpful, great communication and gave us lots of very useful tips about bars and restaurants in the area.
Would definitely recommend!
Host is very great at communicating and checking in, place was very comfy
Alyssa was an excellent host! Friendly, informative, cleanly, amazing location and comfortable bed.

dear olivia  there is nothing to complain  about your place and your hospitality, i had the best time in nyc and i couldnt choose the best place to stay, I loved that I had my own entrance because I felt that I have more privacy at the moment to get home at any hour... good location, very cozy room, super clean restroom and social areas. thanks for all your attentions and good advices see you next time.
The accommodations were great for a long weekend in the city. The apartment was cozy and well provisioned. An overall great experience in the East Village.
Great place, excellent location, very near the metro station, and it's just 5 five minutes away from the best Bagel shop in NY!
Emily was very helpful, and her place was really nice and in a great location!
Great apartment, a lot of space and privacy, especially when I had my own bathroom. I loved the area, great restaurants around, metro few steps away. Also amazing rooftop.
It is a very lovely room with a comfortable bed. Check-in and check-out were very smooth. Loved my stay here.
Great place

Loved the feel of this apartment and creative vibes throughout the space. 
Apartment across from the subway station - extremely easy to access. 
Great spot to wind down after taking in the hustle and bustle of the city.
Courteous and helpful hosts/roommates.

Jon's place was so funky, and is definitely a very authentic and cool apartment if that's what you're looking for. He consistently went out of his way to make me and my friend comfortable, and offered a few thoughtful touches. The apartment isn't for everyone, but the people who are into it will absolutely love it. Thanks a mil, Jon!

Louis and his apartment were incredible.  The place was incredibly clean and updated with very nice furnishings.  It was a nice and cozy space and had a great location right next to the Brooklyn bridge.  It's hard to beat a value like this. Louis was very accommodating and provided us with everything we needed. He responded almost instantly to all of my messages. Will stay again when I get the chance.
We had no problems! It was super easy to check in, the place was very clean and it was very close to the subway. Hardest part was to find a place to park our car on the street!

Excellent host !!
He upgraded us to a bigger and nicer room ever since we got there
He just provided great advise
We literally love the neighborhood five star Michelin places to eat just around the corner 
Subway was 5 minute walk away
It was Great experience !

Julia is a wonderful host the apartment felt cozy and clean ; & it felt super homey ; With princess LeeLu :) & all the wonderful little memories on the fridge ; me & my friends hope to book with her in the near future <3
Great apartment, great location, incredibly nice and helpful and accommodating host.
Great place to stay at.
The hospitality was great the host was in good communication with me and made sure that everything was ok.
Great place
Very nice place. Very spacious room, very reasonable price and accommodating hosts. Had to move out earlier than planned due to unsafe neighborhood.
Great place, very private. Nice for solo or couples. Del's place is in a very lively part of town, right on the 1. Enjoy!

The hosts were very gracious and accommodating, especially since my daughter and I had  an uncertain schedule. Their unit is in a completely renovated and contemporary-style condo building on the second floor; there was virtually no street noise.  Security in the building is very good. The location is superb, being two blocks from the Montrose Ave "L" subway line station (just 20 minutes to Union Square).  There are lots of good places to eat around there too.  The parking was surprisingly easy to find right on the same street (by contrast, this is a constant issue in NYC).  The bedroom we used was cozy; my daughter used the comfortable loft bed, while the foam mat I used was also quite comfortable.  You may use their kitchen facilities (which we did not actually need). One note: they do have a room mate in his own room; but he kept to himself and we never saw him; there is a lock on the door of the bedroom you will use if that makes you feel better.  Overall, great value.
Very communicative, flexible, and welcoming. Would stay again!

Olga was so friendly & welcoming! She reached out to ask if I needed anything before the trip and she always responded really quickly! Awesome host and beautiful space :) I would definitely recommend!

What a find! This was the perfect space to get a good night's sleep and still be close enough to explore the area. Very peaceful and soothing energy to the place, which had all the comforts of home. Daniel was very accommodating with pointing out local tips for getting around. Great experience.
They were so kind. I had really good time. They were artistic and I could learn a lot

Saygin has been a great host, very friendly and approachable. He met me on time, showed me the apt, and told me about the neighborhood.

The apt was true to the description. It was really clean, well furnished, and I had plenty of privacy.

The neighborhood feels safe. The apt is close to Central Park and a few minutes walk from two subway stations. Overall, I am very happy with my stay and I would welcome the opportunity stay here again.
Super nice. Extremely welcoming. Flexible check in. Amazing hospitality.
I loved the rooms - they were large and airy.

Alexandra was a friendly host. The place is clean, artsy and cozy. Lots of food and stores close by. During our trip there was a short circuit in the living room, so we couldn't watch tv that night but other than that was a nice trip.
Great location on upper east side close to great restaurants, bars, subway, Central Park! Alex is a great host. Communicates well and very quickly. Would highly recommend!
Great host, great house, and great space. Will not be disappointed.
Madeleine is quick and responsive. Her apartment is very clean and nicely decorated. Very close to subway (Astoria blvd)
Great host and a great location!

David is a friendly host. The unit and the location are very convenient. The room as a larger bed with newly purchased linen but regretfully no curtains. Some improvements like cleanliness and removal of trash from under bed and being swept would make this a better place.

I stayed at Johns place for my birthday with a few friends we had a blast the apartment was modern and exactly like the photos the outdoor patio was amazing as well. When we walked in we were kindly greated by wine and glasses all set up for a drink at the table. There was also birthday candles on standby. He absolutely thought of everything I would not change anything about my visit and would 10/10 recommend he also is easy to contact In case you have any questions
You should stay....centrally located..
Excellent trip w/ Charlene. We got there a little early.  No issue.  Was able to rest up and hit the town.   Clean and excellent location.   Will bot forgettgistrip

Awesome place to stay IF you love cuddly kitties!
Hosts were super attentive and answered all of our questions in regards to transportation and places to eat.
The house is super cozy and warm, the room big and clean.
Would recommend and come back in a near future.
Very nice place!
Near train station, good to go everywhere

Good people. Strait forward. You can be at home and not feel like your imposing or anything. Open to all walks of life. They have a sweet dog who is older but is very lovable. The neighborhood is emerging and has some excellent food etc if you know where to look. Not for everyone. For me I like diversity and the emerging parts of Brooklyn especially after living in prospect heights were I felt it was too gentrified. Most of all people are real and honest. I appreciate that above all.
Pick up and drop off was a breeze, they were flexible with both and made it a breeze.

Jirapong was a great host. He met me at the location and handed me the keys. The apartment was very clean with cool censored light features through the home. He had plenty of disposable toiletries available which was very convenient. The neighborhood was very quiet with plenty of restaurants nearby. The train if close by with easy access to the city. Right before Check out Jirapong came to the apartment with homemade authentic (delicious) Thai breakfast. I enjoyed my stay there and would recommend it others. Thank you JR.

I recommend to every one, great value, clean room/bathroom and super comfortable bed. very close to everything (subway, tons of shops). Mr. Jirapong is nice guy and always available when I needed help. Off course, he deserves 10/10.

First experience with Airbnb went superb.

Emily's place was great as was she. Especially for a anyone who has spent time in NYC before the quirks of the building give it some character. New apartment extremely well kept and close to a ton of shops and restaurants. Thanks Emily.
Thank you Brandon for everything, you're awesome! And special thanks to Francis (the cat),which makes my stay in NY  unique!
Really nice space in an interesting neighborhood, with great access to the city and the rest of Brooklyn. Highly recommend!
Great location, nice and quiet but close to the L.
Stefanie is so sweet and easy to get in touch with. Her apartment is perfect for a weekend getaway!

The location is excellent there is a deli and a couple of restaurants just across the street as well as a laundromat. You also have easy access to the q23 and q11 buses to transfer to the E train or the J train. I am planning on starting cree again.
Great place for the weekend. Enjoyed it a lot.

We had a great stay at Eddie's place. I never had to wait long on a response and check-in was a breeze. The location is excellent (only 1 block from the L train) and there are a bunch of great food options within walking distance. The apartment is modern, yet cozy, and Eddy has some tasteful decorations. My personal favorite touch was the Edison lightbulb in the room that gives off pleasant, soft lighting. There are also two adorable cats running around, and they really like to hang out in the guest room, so be ready for some feline play-time.
Great location, great nights sleep.

I enjoyed staying here, so close to all the restaurants and the train. I felt safe walking at night too. The MET museum was just a few short blocks walk too! For a very old NYC building, it was clean. The only thing is that I wish it were a little quieter at night. Staying on the 3rd floor means you hear each and every horn honk and people out partying on Friday and Saturday night.
Great apartment with fantastic light and a thoughtful use of space. I highly recommend it.
They were great hosts.  Very responsive.

We had a great experience! Andre was easy to communicate with and gave us our space within the apartment while still being available if we needed anything. He let us know about some local bars and restaurants to check out-
 all of which were awesome. The room was private, bright, clean, and easily accessible to multiple subway lines. Would definitely recommend!
Xime is a great host! She is very attentive and made sure my stay was perfect. The apartment was very clean and is perfectly located for all the excitement of Williamsburg.
We loved the place, it's super clean, well located and look very stylish! I will stay there again for sure, 100% recommendable!!!!

The apartment was great! Paul was very easy to communicate with. The location is fantastic, right by the train a great deal for the price. The place was clean and stylish, and check-in and out was very easy. I will be coming back to stay again and would recommend it to anyone visiting New York!

A fantastic place to stay on the UWS. George was an incredibly gracious and responsive host. The room was clean with large windows offering lots of light. Easy check-in / check-out. Would certainly recommend staying in this flat!

We were the first to stay here and found it perfect for our long weekend trip. The hosts we're gracious with their check in time, even greeting us later into the night. Upon arrival parking was surprisingly easy, we only parked a few blocks away and had no problems walking with our luggage. The car was safe, no dents or accidents. Listing is spot on and as advertised, there are many added comforts which made the space welcome. Great lighting. Heated  fan in the bathroom was welcome during our February stay. Location was perfect, 2 blocks from the subway that was a 10 min ride into Manhattan. Surrounding neighborhood was safe and eventful, good late night eats and bars. Walking around late at night was safe, as there was plenty of street lights and other people out. Overall location, communication, amenities and stay were great and we will return.
I absolutely loved this place. Extremely nice and a friendly host! Would definitely book again.
Sana was really great and helpful. Thanks once again :)
Very nice room and Manuela was very helpful & friendly.
Their place is just perfect and cozy. Great location. Description is accurate and the hosts are amazing!!
No remarks
Very friendly! It was a pleasure!
Very nice room in a clean apartment.  Vas was a great host. Subway is very close. Highly recommended!

I really enjoyed staying here. The host was super nice and easy to talk to. The commute to the city was fast and the trains are convenient. The space was both neat and comfortable. I have another trip coming up and I plan to stay here again.

Great stay.  Couldn't be happier.  Great communication with Amon.  Place is clean, spacious, Great location with a 5 min walk to Grand Central Station.  Times Square 20 min walk.  Would definitely look to book this place for future stays
It is what they say it is, a family apartment they opened a room for travelers

David is a very friendly and nice host. Communication with him prior to arrival was very nice and when I was being late for two hours due to some construction he was very cooperative and met me at his place at a later time. He also gave me recommendations about what I could do there during my time in NYC. The easiest way to get to the apartment from JFK airport is to take LIRR from Jamaica to Nostrand Ave which takes about 15 minutes. From there you can either take a uber or walk 15 minutes to the apartment. My eight night stay in the apartment was very nice and cozy. I had everything I need for my stay. The bed is comfortable and could easily fit two people. Bathroom is also nice. WiFi ist fast and stable. The apartment is great located with just two minutes to the Franklin Ave subway station. Subway line 2,3,4,5 brings you to Manhatten in 30 minutes. Very close to Prospect Park. Plenty of food options close to the apartment, as well as shops for daily things just around the corner. Due to my flight was starting in the evening I could even stay longer and checkout late without additional costs.
Can highly recommend this place to anyone who search for a nice and affordable place to stay in NYC.

Sankey was a great communicator. Unfortunately, we did not meet him since he was traveling, but his roommates were very welcoming, and Sankey checked in with us via (Hidden by Airbnb) to be sure we arrived and everything was okay. We could tell the apartment was cleaned often, but there were a couple cockroaches in the bathroom. Probably just a fact of life in an older Brooklyn apartment building. The whole apartment smelled strongly of weed, which may not bother everyone, but gave me a bit of a headache. The price of the room was great, but we were surprised to discover it wasn't a full room but a part of the living room that had been walled off. That wouldn't be a problem except that the new walls didn't reach all the way to the ceiling, so it was easy to hear everything happening in the apartment. The first night was fine, I was so tired. But the second night I was woken up around 7:30AM by the pet birds in the kitchen, and again later by a roommate making breakfast. The bed was also pretty uncomfortable, and the mattress easily moved and seemed slanted to one side. Again, we probably wouldn't have been able to come to New York without such an affordable Airbnb, so if you need a safe and well-located place to stay, this neighborhood was pretty quiet and very close to the subway.
Great brooklyn location close to stores & subway
This is definitely a cool apartment. Every thing is perfect.
Very nice, and chilled. Real big clean room . Two beds. & a great area for local stores and train literally around the corner.
Nice and clean apartment.

Such a great experience!! If you ever dreamed about the NYC skyline... this apartment is going to leave you speechless!! Luxury touches and sparkling clean. Train was just a block and a half away. Couldnt be happier with my stay! will definitely recommend it and stay again!

It's not an exaggeration to say that it was an absolute privilege to be the first guest to stay at Elizabeth and Bruce's lovely Victorian home. (And I say that as an actual New Yorker.)

First and foremost, they were wonderful and very attendant hosts. They were gracious and considerate and kept in touch throughout my stay to make sure that my experience at their home was both comfortable and enjoyable. They were accessible and communicative and it was wonderful getting to talk to them about their home and their lives here in New York.

Secondly, their home is truly a beautiful and well-preserved piece of Brooklyn history. While it's architectural detail and design is grand, romantic, and sophisticated, its place and influence in the political and cultural landscape of Brooklyn is unique and remarkable in its own right. (Be sure to have Elizabeth and Bruce tell you more about the history of this building!)

Lastly, the fact that their home is just a stone's throw from the best that New York has to offer is an absolute perk that should not be taken for granted. Within a short walk you have the beauty and vibrancy of Prospect Park, the culture and diversity of Church Ave, the thriving nightlife and local bars and restaurants along Cortelyou Rd, and the stunning (and enviable) historical stately homes of Ditmas Park. Though if you really want to stay close to home, there's also a cozy bodega next door as well noteworthy bars and restaurants within a block or two. And for those dying to get into Manhattan, their home is just down the street from the BQ line, making a trip into the city a breeze.

To sum my review up, this place is a labor of love for Elizabeth and Bruce and if you're looking for a true and authentic New York experience while avoiding crowds, tourists, and scenesters you will not be disappointed with your stay here.

Thank you Elizabeth and Bruce!

Really wonderful stay! Raquel was very communicative and check-in / check-out was super easy!  I was really surprised how quiet the apartment was given its location in the heart of West Village.  There were plenty of cool restaurants and shops just a few steps away, but inside of the apartment I couldn't hear anything from the street!  There was a lot of space to do work and the kitchen was Huge.  The bed was very comfortable  (I think it is a temperpudic mattress)
and everything was clean.  Will definitely try to stay again on my next trip to NY.
The view from the bedroom window was incredible. The location is ideal, very close to a train station. I would stay there again.
It is very conveniently located and is very affordable! The host was very kind, and I would absolutely recommend if you are looking for a place you can crash in.
Very stylish, very clean and close to everything! Hosts were great and quick to respond!

If you're looking for a great place with a great location in Manhattan - this is the place. It's great. May is a wonderful host. The location is easy to get around on the F-train. There is everything you need nearby. 

If you are considering May's place. Stop considering and book it.

The apartment was very clean, nice, and cozy. The host was very quick to respond, very accommodating, and very sweet. They were flexible with the check in time. They provided towels for you, TV for you to watch, or listen to music, and had heating/AC. Also, had WiFi. Not to mention, they had a warm and comfortable bed, nice kitchen and bathroom as well. The only downsides there was no kitchenware and it was hard to find parking. Overall,the stay was great.
Overall good place
Her hospitality was great, it was perfect for our needs, we didn't had any issue in her place, always clean and pretty, i would stay there on my next trip, i would recommend this place 100%!
Very nice place, clean and close to everything.
The best place
Adorable place in the heart of Williamsburg!

This Airbnb is an easy and close walk from the subway stop, especially practical for people like me who are totally unfamiliar 

tota

The apartment was nice, good size of rooms and good location, 2-3 blocks from 2 different subway stations. I left my car on the street and used subway and uber to go to places. There are grocery stores 2 blocks away. The apartment is fully functioning and was fine during the snow storm.  Checkin and checkout were flexible. Would Recommend and stay here again. Thanks Sarah!
Great place and Eudia is a great host

I needed urgent stay for a single night and booked pretty late into the day. But, Adam is quick to accommodate the booking.  Adam is very empathetic and asked him to contact if I were to face any issues with next Airbnb Booking. This place has a large backyard, which is a place if you can use it.

Overall, Adam is a wonderful host.
I do recommand this place for people who doesn't need more than a comfortable place to sleep.

5 stars across the board! Thanks FM for the hospitality and for letting me stay at your place! Enjoyed the old NY feel of the building and architecture with a nice hostel bunkbed flow! Also, met cool and interesting guests from all over the world. Backyard space is peaceful as well. Will def book again in the future! Thanks again Fm!
Great location, Excellent host, prompt and etc. Disappointed I reserve for 2 nites!!!!

The room is very clean, located close to subways. The room only has a bed, a chair and a stool. That's it... I'd say it's just a place to sleep (bed is good). Bathroom and kitchen are very clean. Sara was nice, she answered quickly and allowed me to check in early.

Very small room with a host who is not around. The location is excellently located in Greenwich Village, a short walk to soho. 

The host provides an air mattress. Luckily, another housemate provided me a foam mattress. This housemate has moved out so expect an air mattress.
The place was very nice looking, i felt like at home, i would reserve again on my next trip!

This apartment is a gem!! The 3 bedrooms were perfect for our group and the beds themselves were so comfy. The location cannot be beat!! Dakota was very responsive and helpful. I cannot recommend this place enough! Wonderful experience!
Vasily was nice and friendly. Apartment is very clean and close to subway. It have taken just 25 minutes to get center of Manhattan.

The space is great! Clean, and a lot of cool art on the walls. I'm familiar with this area of Brooklyn, but this was a different experience - I got to the cozier side of Bushwick this time. I had business meetings around Union Square in Manhattan every day, and it only took me 20-25 minutes to get there (I took the L train), so location's pretty convenient. Vasiliy is a great host, very helpful!

It was really nice. The apartment is huge and stylish. Room is cozy and private bathroom is a big plus. Vasily is very friendly and gave me helpful advices. 
Hope to stay here again.
Relaxing studio room, desk and chair for thoughts w a spacious closet. Had a good experience.
Nice host!

Stayed here for one night. The price was very good and the host was very kind and answered texts fast. It was close to the 1 train which made it easy to travel to and from. The place was very clean. We even left a cell phone there by mistake and she kept in touch with us until we were able to come back to get it. I highly recommend this apartment!

Almond was a very responsive host. We had some issues with checking-in and checking-out, as things weren't made very clear, but we figured it out. The floor was a bit dirty, since its tiles dust and debris seem to accumulate quickly, so I would recommend bringing a pair of shoes/socks to walk around in (I like being barefoot).  There was no window in the room, which I didn't realize while booking so that was a bit of a bummer, but that's just my own preference. Lastly, the place is a bit far from the city, so be prepared to drive a ton if you're looking to get to the main city. Everything else was great though!
Cool place
It was ok.
I would really love to go back there when next I come back.
Awesome!! HOME away from Home. Very clean and host is the best !!!
Cheap, easy location from the L. Would recommend for a solo trip.
Great place to stay
Perfect

The guest room in Paola's home is right by the entrance, so it almost feels like a private entrance.  We were able to come and go as we pleased.  It is super clean and the bed is firm but comfortable.  The neighborhood was nice, with some great food / drink places just steps away along the main drag.  Paola knew the area and was able to suggest the best trains/buses for where I had to go.  I would happily stay here again.
Very accommodating and kind host, very clean and comfy place. Loved it.
Good location, Great Host, and close to many restaurants! I will return.

This was the absolute perfect stay! Erin was so easy to get in contact with and she answered any and all questions I had. Her apartment was beautiful and spotlessly clean, and had touches that made it feel wonderfully homey. I would love to stay again!
the apartment is bigger than the pictures show and the location is incredible, I really loved staying here. Thank you jess for your hospitality and being a wonderful host!

Staying at Molly's was an absolutely excellent experience on all counts. The building is beautiful -- a classic Brooklyn brownstone only two blocks from the famous Prospect Park. There was a real classic New York family neighborhood feel to the area. It was very charming, and not hectic/unsafe. That said, the flat is literally one block from the subway that takes you straight into the craziness of Manhattan in about 15 minutes. So you really do get the best of both worlds. The room was immaculately clean and very tastefully decorated. Perfect for a solo traveler like me, or perhaps a couple. As for Molly, she is one of the kindest and most hospitable ladies you will ever meet. She keeps the place clean almost to a fault. She's very well traveled, is a joy to talk to, and she made me feel very welcome in her home. She's just a good, honest person and it becomes apparent immediately. I'd stay here again without hesitation. Thanks Molly, and sorry I couldn't be more useful at pub trivia!

- Peter
Linda was vert kind and hospital. My stay was short but the view and room was great.
Really good host, great hospitality, Antonia gave us some good information about New York! Very friendly and she is also very cutee :)

This was my first time doing Air Bnb and Ana place was as exactly a s mention. Nice Area in Brooklyn easy access her roommates welcomed me with drinks she made my night stay really great. Everything was clean and everything g was nicely neat with great taste of decor. Great place to stay when u need a place to stay.
Great place to stay. How ever,  parking is not on the same property!
Kate and her friend were super helpful, friendly and gave good advice. It was in a great location, got to taste delicious foods in the area. I really recommend staying here!
